title: Automationstekniker
description:
För kunds räkning söker vi dig som har rätt kvalifikation, erfarenhet och personlighet för detta uppdrag.,
   

  

 För kunds räkning söker vi nu en Automationstekniker till kundens Autoamationsavdelning. Arbetet är omväxlande och du styr din arbetsdag utifrån aktuella projekt och uppgiftslistor. Med stora utvecklingsmöjligheter inkluderas du i ett sammansvetsat och familjärt team där vi ger varandra gehör för idéer, beslutsvägarna är korta och effektiviteten hög.
   

  

**Uppdragsbeskrivning**
**Dina Huvudsakliga Arbetsuppgifter Är**
* Felsökning
* Reparation av el-komponenter i system och terminaler
* Idrifttagning
* Optimering av nya och befintliga system
* Vidareutveckling av produkter och system
* Support till serviceavdelningar runt om i Sverige


**Grundläggande kvalifikationer**
**Vi Söker Dig Som Har/är**
* Utbildad ingenjör, har en YH examen eller gymnasieutbildning med inriktning mot el och eller automation
* Har minst ett par års erfarenhet som elektriker, elmontör eller automationstekniker
* Dokumenterad erfarenhet av ritningsläsning
* B-körkort
* Goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska, både i tal och skrift.


**Meriterande Är Om Du**
* Arbetat i programmeringsverktyg som tex Codesys, Twincat, IX Developer, GX IEC Developer eller liknande
* Elritningsprogramet E3 eller liknande


**Personlig egenskaper**
 Du trivs med att arbeta under eget ansvar och drivs av att arbeta effektivt och målinriktat, är handlingskraftig och förstår vikten av att prioritera. Med ett lättsamt sätt bidrar du till gruppen med dina idéer och ser fram emot att kunna utvecklas i din roll samt dela med dig av dina erfarenheter.
   

  

**Formalia**
* Uppdragsperiod: ASAP - 2024-12-31
* Omfattning: 100%
* Ort: Stockholm
* Distansarbete: 0%
* Kompetensnivå: 2


 Läs mer om kompetensnivåer på följande länk: https://www.addilon.se/konsult/kompetensnivaer/
   

  

 ,
 **Vi erbjuder** 
 Som konsult hos oss får möjlighet att arbeta hos kunder som ligger i framkant inom svensk industri och näringsliv. Uppdragen anpassas för att nivån ligga i linje med kundens förväntningar och vara så utvecklande och stimulerande som möjligt. Till din hjälp kommer du att ha många duktiga kollegor och ett aktivt erfarenhetsutbyte. Vi
 **transformerar karriärer och bygger framgångsrika företag** 
 genom att alltid utgå från våra värderingar.
 **Ansökan** 
 Din ansökan (CV och personligt brev) skickar du in snarast via länken nedan. Urval sker löpande och tjänsten kan tillsättas innan ansökningstiden gått ut. Frågor om tjänsten besvaras för dig som går vidare till intervju. För att arbeta som konsult hos oss krävs det att du: 1. Delar våra värderingar 2. Är etablerad i ditt yrke 3. Har relevant erfarenhet för uppdraget 4. Gärna har erfarenhet från olika roller och olika branscher Vissa av våra uppdrag omfattas av försvarssekretess. Det innebär att du behöver ha svenskt medborgarskap samt genomgå och godkännas i en säkerhetsprövning.
 **Om Addilon** 
 Rekrytering och uthyrning av rätt chefer och specialister inom främst teknik, försäljning, inköp och logistik i Stockholm, Göteborg, Mälardalen, Helsingfors, Köpenhamn, Oslo och Chicago. Följ oss på: LinkedIn | Facebook | Instagram Vi undanber oss vänligt men bestämt direktkontakt med försäljare av ytterligare jobbannonser, kandidater etc.

title: RPA-utvecklare inom Pega till Arbetsförmedlingen
description:
Är du en erfaren utvecklare med kompetens inom RPA-teknik och Pega-plattformen? Arbetsförmedlingen söker skickliga utvecklare till vårt RPA-team för att automatisera och förbättra våra digitala processer. Tillsammans får vi Sverige i arbete. Vill du bli en av oss?
   

  

**Vilka är vi**
 Arbetsförmedlingen tar nu sikte på 2026 - en reformerad myndighet med ett tydligare fokus. För oss på IT betyder det såväl omfattande utveckling av externa digitala tjänster som utveckling av våra interna digitala lösningar. Med tekniken transformerar vi myndigheten – i grunden.
   

  

 Enheten Digitala beslut och ärenden arbetar med att utveckla arbetsförmedlarens olika systemstöd med fokus på att arbeta mer ärendeindelat. Under tiden som vi flyttar över processer till nya system använder vi RPA-teknik (robot process automation) för att hantera administrativa arbetsuppgifter och nu behöver vi fler utvecklare som kan RPA-tekniken och gärna i Pega-plattformen. Vi ska nu förstärka RPA-teamet för att kunna utnyttja tekniken och automatisera fler processer. Du kommer ingå i ett mindre team och delar produktägare och scrum master med ett annat team. Vi är ett trevligt gäng som har roligt ihop och hjälper och stöttar varandra. Vi samarbetar även gärna och ofta med andra team och funktioner inom organisationen.
   

  

**Vem söker vi**
 Som medarbetare på IT kommer du att vara en viktig spelare i arbetet med att transformera myndigheten med hjälp av ny teknik. I arbetet ingår att kontinuerligt förbättra arbetssätt, processer, metoder och verktyg. Du har god förmåga att driva arbetet för att nå gemensamma resultat i nära samarbete med övriga inom utveckling och test, samt även mot plattformar och infrastruktur. Arbetet sker i en omfattande teknisk miljö med många systemintegrationer i ett modernt IT-landskap. Du tycker om att utforma din roll, hitta din plats och skapa ditt bidrag inom organisationen. Som robotutvecklare på Arbetsförmedlingen har du kontakt med användarna för att hitta nya processer att automatisera och du behöver därför varar analytisk och tycka om att ta personligt ansvar för din leverans.
   

  

**Grundläggande krav för tjänsten**
* Minst ett års erfarenhet av processmodellering och användartester
* Minst ett års erfarenhet av robotisering med RPA-teknik och behärskar väl någon av de RPA-tekniker vi använder på Arbetsförmedlingen (UiPath och Pega)
* Minst ett års erfarenhet av att designa, träna, felsöka och rätta robotar och se till att de utför sina inprogrammerade arbetsflöden på ett förväntat sätt
* Erfarenhet av att ha ansvar för minst två RPA-processer


**Övriga meriter för tjänsten**
* Erfarenhet av att ha arbetat med komplexa system med omfattande integrationer och anpassning till API:er
* Kunskap om plattformen Pega t.ex. som kravanalytiker eller utvecklare
* Erfarenhet av arbete i statlig myndighet eller stor organisation


 Utöver dessa kvalifikationer har du personlig förmåga och fallenhet att arbeta i enlighet med Arbetsförmedlingens medarbetarkriterier.
   

  

 Medarbetare på Arbetsförmedlingen:
   

  

* Tar ansvar för sina arbetsprestationer och sitt bidrag till helheten
* Anpassar sig till förändring och oförutsedda händelser
* Tar initiativ till utveckling och bidrar till förbättring


 Stor vikt kommer att läggas vid personlig lämplighet.
   

  

**Vårt erbjudande**
 Tjänsterna är tillsvidareanställningar på heltid som inleds med sex månaders provanställning. Tillträde enligt överenskommelse. Placeringsort Solna.
   

  

 Vi erbjuder förmånliga semesteravtal, friskvård på arbetstid samt friskvårdsbidrag. Vår arbetsplats består av över 11 000 engagerade medarbetare. I denna tjänst erbjuder vi möjlighet att arbeta på distans upp till 49 procent på årsbasis. Genom att samarbeta och vara öppna för nya perspektiv utvecklas vi som individer och verksamhet. Tillsammans frigör vi möjligheter som får Sverige i arbete.
   

  

 Läs mer om vår organisation och vårt uppdrag på vår webbplats https://arbetsformedlingen.se/om-oss
   

  

**Ansökan**
 Välkommen med din ansökan
 **senast 2024-08-11.** 
 Bifoga ditt CV och ett personligt brev där du beskriver varför du söker jobbet. När du skickar din ansökan kommer du att få svara på några urvalsfrågor.
   

  

 För att du ska få en så rättvis och korrekt bedömning som möjligt är det av stor vikt att du uppger år och månad för varje anställning samt en kort beskrivning av arbetsuppgifterna. Om den informationen inte framgår har vi svårare att göra en korrekt bedömning av din kompetens och erfarenhet och du kan därför riskera att bli bortvald i urvalsprocessen.
   

  

 Har du skyddade personuppgifter kontaktar du den Rekryteringspartner som finns namngiven i annonsen så får du hjälp med att skicka in din ansökan.
   

  

 Urvalstest kan förekomma och vi kommer ge dig mer information om processen via e-post efter ansökan.
   

  

 Vi arbetar aktivt för att vara en myndighet fri från diskriminering. Det är viktigt för oss att all kompetens tas tillvara och vi välkomnar alla sökande. Vi ser positivt på om du har kunskaper i något av våra nationella minoritetsspråk. Välkommen till jobbet som får Sverige i arbete! Här arbetar du på regeringens uppdrag för en arbetsmarknad som hjälper människor framåt. Vi frigör möjligheter så att arbetssökande hittar sysselsättning och arbetsgivare sin nästa medarbetare. För att nå målet behöver vi samarbeta, i myndigheten men också med olika externa aktörer i hela landet. Tillsammans driver vi förändring, utvecklar nya arbetssätt och skapar lösningar som gör att Sverige kan fortsätta framåt. Mer om vår organisation och vårt uppdrag
   

  

 Anställningsform: tillsvidareanställning | Anställningens omfattning: heltid | Antal lediga befattningar: 2 | Sysselsättningsgrad: 100% | Ort: Solna | Län: Stockholms län | Land: Sweden | Referensnummer: Af-2024/0063 5648 | Kontakt: Malin Löfqvist, Sektionschef malin.lofqvist@arbetsformedlingen.se, Ebba Hägglund, Rekryteringspartner ebba.hagglund@arbetsformedlingen.se, | Facklig företrädare: Eva Vigant, ST 010-4870922, Ulf Törnkvist, Seko 010-4870446, Louiza Asoyan, Saco-S 010-4884743, | Publicerat: 2024-06-24 | Sista ansökningsdag: 2024-08-11

title: UX designer, Solna
description:
Be a part of creating the digital customer experiences of the future with us at PostNord. Join the UX designer team in Stockholm!
   

  

 Join UX designer team for Postnord and be part of creating great customer journey for our business customers. You will be part of an UX/UI team where you will as UX designer have an ownership for the business portal. You will also be part of a team UX designers that continuously improving how we work with design.
   

  

**Join us**
 We, the UX are working in an agile environment where the team independently owns the product from start to finish. Within the team, it is important that everybody has their say, and we always strive to improve our way of working.
   

  

 Our head office is in Solna, Stockholm. Three days in the week we make sure to meet each other in our office in Solna.
   

  

 Find out more and follow us on LinkedIn!
   

  

**We are looking for you**
 To be successful in this role, we believe that you are a UX designer with a project manager mindset. Together with the product team you need to set the customer journey and roadmap going forward. You will work closely with business, product owners, developers and other UX designers to prioritize design work and make sure we build the best customer journey in our business portal.
   

  

 As a person, we believe that you are full of initiative and solution oriented. You have good communication skills and thrive when you get to work both practically and close to our users and are used to facilitate meetings and visualize requirements.
   

  

 You have a great personal drive and adapt efficiently to new information and insights. Like us, you value teamwork and building great solutions together.
   

  

**Your profile**
* Relevant education in UX design, interaction design, service design or equivalent field.
* Minimum 3 years of work experience as a UX/UI designer
* Facilitation skills and able to take ownership and get things done
* Design user flows and interfaces for our digital services in Figma.
* The ability to analyze and design user flows based on insights collected via interviews and other mediums such as Hotjar/Google Analytics
* Experience in designing user interfaces for web
* Understands graphic design and typography.
* Understands designing for accessibility and WCAG requirements
* Experience in planning and conducting user tests.
* Fluent Swedish and English


**Job Responsibilities**
* Conducting user research, both qualitative and quantitative, as well as analyzing and presenting insights to revenant product teams and whole department
* Analyzing and following up on user research
* Designing overall user flows and interfaces for our digital services on the web
* Working closely with product owners, other designers and other stakeholders within PostNord
* Responsible to align their part of PostNord’s Customer Journey with other product areas and UX Designers
* Take ownership for what should prioritized in in the business portal


**We offer you**
* A great team, you are both part of the market web team but also a bigger team with a focus on customer-facing solutions at Postnord.
* Agile is our way of working, we have daily's, refinement meetings and sprint retros.
* Flexible hybrid workplace with an open working climate.
* To be part of a large organization with endless development opportunities for you as a developer and individual.
* Good insurance and occupational pension conditions.
* Wellness allowance and access to office gym and swimming pool.
* Employee benefits through PostNord's own employee foundation PostNord Plus.
* Employment according to a collective agreement.


**We make everyday life easier**
 PostNord is the leading supplier of communication and logistics solutions to, from, and within the Nordic region. We ensure the provision of a postal service to households and businesses in Sweden and Denmark. We aim to make everyday life easier and more sustainable for everyone who lives and works in the Nordic region. We are accountable, brave and committed, effectively leading change regardless of if we lead ourselves or others. We emphasize teamwork, sincerity and positive relationships in the workplace. We build on our success and learn from both colleagues and mistakes. People with different backgrounds work with us. You will therefore be part of a workplace with great diversity, which contributes to better results for the business. Visit us at postnord.com.
   

  

**Apply**
 What are you waiting for? Welcome with your application. Selection is ongoing, so apply as soon as possible. If you have any questions about the position, email sonja.prest@postnord.com.
   

  

 We look forward to hearing from you!
   

  

 Click here for union contacts
   

  

 #UXdesigner

title: Microsoft Dynamics System Owner to AxFlow Group!
description:
*Do you have a background as a Dynamics developer or similar? Are you looking for a hybrid position and won’t mind visiting different countries and collaborating with international colleagues? Then this might be what you are looking for!* 




  





**About the position** 




 Perido is looking for a Microsoft Dynamics System Owner for our client, AxFlow Group, a division of Axel Johnson International, specializes in marketing, distributing, and providing comprehensive sales engineering services for premium fluid-handling equipment. Serving customers across industries such as chemical, petrochemical, food, power generation, environmental, dockside, facilities management, and wastewater, AxFlow offers top-quality products from leading manufacturers. This is a hybrid position, where you can work a couple of days a week remotely. The position will involve close collaboration with people across the AxFlow organization and might entail some travelling within Europe, and potentially South Africa and Oceania.
 



  





**Your daily tasks** 




 In this role you will manage and develop the Dynamics F&O platform, including ISV’s, and have a close collaboration with other systems such as Microsoft CE, PIM, CRM and e-commerce. The role includes supervising the roll-outs to more than 50 companies throughout the group and making sure they are all aligned with the common processes. The role also includes to set up structure for, and perform, end user training.
 



  





**Main responsibilities:** 



* Develop, maintain and plan improved functionality in our Dynamics Platform
* Advise on relevant new services, technology and functionality
* Improve current processes
* Align way of working and common processes throughout the group
* Coordinate third party resources and consultants
* Structuring required documentation
* Educating our company users in D365 through workshops and e-learning
* Build relevant integrations to other systems



  





**Your characteristics** 




 We are looking for someone who possesses proficient analytical and communication skills. You enjoy working in a fast-paced and varied environment that challenges you in a positive way. To succeed in this role, we believe that you have a good understanding of business logic and requirements and a great intuitive way of presenting and educating. Furthermore, you are a humble team player with a keen attention to detail. Is it you that we’re describing?
 



  





 Send in your application today!
 



  





**Qualifications:** 



* Experience and strong understanding of the Dynamics Platform
* Background as Dynamics developer or similar
* Business acumen within Sales, Supply chain or Finance
* Good level of English, both written and spoken



  





**Meritorious:** 



* Experience from consultancy company
* Knowledge also in Dynamics Customer Engagement CE



  





**Contract type and hours** 




 Full-time, assignment initially 6 months through Perido, thereafter possible takeover by AxFlow Group. Start as soon as possible.
 



  





**Application** 




 Please apply on our website perido.se/lediga-jobb/. Click on the apply button in the job ad and fill in your information and attach your CV and portfolio. We recommend that you submit your application as soon as possible as selection is ongoing.
 



  





 The recruiter responsible for this position is
 **Amanda Delvén** 
 , you can reach her via amanda.delven@perido.se. If you have questions, you are more than welcome to contact us at fraga@perido.se and one of our recruitment administrators will do their best to help you. Always enter the reference number
 **34403** 
 in the subject line.
 



  





**About Perido** 




 Why are we called Perido? It is from the Latin word Peridoneus which means “well matched”. Matching our consultant’s competence and career focus with our clients’ needs is what we do best! Perido is a consulting and recruitment company in the white-collar sector that helps you to the next step in your career and our vision is for everyone to thrive and be engaged at work. We have grown steadily since the start in 2003 and have over 1300 employees across the country, of which about fifty works at our offices in Stockholm and Gothenburg. As a Perido consultant, you become an important part of our organization and you grow together with us by strengthening our clients’ organizations with your skills. Please visit our website www.perido.se for more information.

title: Danish Business Development Representatives to Reliable AB!
description:
Do you speak Danish and have an interest in customer relations and business development? If you are looking for a role where you can develop your sales ability and gain relevant experience, this is the role for you! Apply today as we work with ongoing selection.
 


 Apply here!
 
  

**Company :**
 Reliable AB
 



  

**City :**
 Stockholm
 



  

**Job Category :**
 Sales
 



  

**Extent :**
 Part time, 1-3 days a week, 50h/month minimum
 



  

**Start date :**
 End of August 2024
 



  

**Type of work :**
 Staffing
   




**About the role**

 Reliable AB staff develop their sales assignments with niche talent recruitment, directly from universities and colleges. They work in a youthful environment with unique conditions to be able to staff and optimize results for all types of sales assignments. Every customer contact is a marketing opportunity and they place great importance in the person who represents a customer always having a relevant education, knows the market, the company and the product it represents. In this role your main responsibility will be to book appointments for Reliable's customers, and offer them the best conditions for their business growth.
 


  


  

**You are offered**



  

  
* **An exciting experience where you can develop your sales skills**
  
* **A dedicated consultant manager to help and guide you in your role and future career path**
  
* **A competitive salary with the possibility of a generous provision salary**
  

  


**Work tasks**
  
* Prospecting and lead generation: Identify and research potential clients or partners through various channels
  
* Relationship Building: Develop and maintain strong relationships with clients, understanding their needs and ensuring exceptional service delivery
  
* Pipeline Management: Manage and update the CRM system, keeping accurate records of interactions, leads, and opportunities
  
* Booking meetings: Putting clients together with their prospects and organizing these meetings.
  

  


**We are looking for**
  
* An ongoing tertiary education, with at least one year left of studies, of at least 50% study rate
  
* High speaking and written proficiency in Danish
  
* An interest in business development, sales, and customer relations
  
* Previous experience from sales or customer service
  


  


  

**To succeed in the role, your personal skills are:**



  

  
* Self-developer
  
* Service-minded
  
* Results-oriented
  


  

  

**Our recruitment process**
  


 This recruitment process is handled by Academic Work and it is our client’s wish that all questions regarding the position is directed to Academic Work.
 


  


 Our selection process is continuous and the advert may close before the recruitment process is completed if we have moved forward to the next phase. The process includes two tests: one personality test and one cognitive test. The tests are tools to find the right talent for the right position, to enable equality, diversity, and a fair process.
   




**Reliable AB**

 Read more about Reliable AB here.
   




**Become a part of Academic Work**

 When you apply to this job, you are becoming one of many consultants at Academic Work. This means that not only will you gain fantastic benefits, but also a team of consultant managers to support you through your career with us.
 


 Read more about Academic Work
   

**Do you have questions about this job?**

 Emma Nydén or a colleague in the recruitment team will gladly answer you on sth1@academicwork.se Please specify advert-ID in your email: 15105334

title: Technical Project Manager (Cloud & Connectivity) – Stockholm
description:
Vi söker nu en teknisk projektledare till vårt Cloud & Connectivity-team, där du har chansen att arbeta med de senaste teknikerna i projekt med fokus på molnbaserad integration. Hos oss är flexibilitet, teamarbete, kompetensutveckling och projektrotationer centrala inslag – kanske är det just dig vi söker som vår nästa kollega?
   

  

 Hos oss har du möjligheten att jobba teamorienterat i meningsfulla och kundnära projekt. Vårt Cloud & Connectivity-team ansvarar för att designa, utveckla och implementera integrationslösningar i molnmiljöer. Vi har en cloud-first strategi sedan flera år tillbaka och är ett av de ledande företagen i Norden när det gäller offentliga molnlösningar och -tjänster – i samarbete med viktiga aktörer som Azure, GCP och AWS.
   

  

**Som Technical Project Manager Hos Oss Kommer Du**
* Planera och leda arbete kopplat till en eller flera kundleveranser
* Planera och hantera de resurser som krävs för att möta projektets behov
* Samordna tekniska team, förstå komplexa tekniska krav och fatta beslut som påverkar tekniska lösningar.
* Fungera som en kommunikationsbrygga mellan tekniska team och andra intressenter.
* Hantera och minimera tekniska risker och utmaningar som kan uppstå under projektets gång.
* Samarbeta med kollegor i en miljö som präglas av hög grad av eget ansvar och tillit.


 Vi jobbar främst med molnbaserade plattformar eller ramverk i molntekniker som Azure, GCP och AWS. Några av de tekniker som ofta används i våra projekt inkluderar bl.a. Boomi, Azure Logic Apps, Azure API Management, Software AG (webMethods). Storleken på projekt kan variera men de är vanligtvis relativt småskaliga från 3-10 personer.
   

  

**För Att Lyckas i Rollen Har Du**
* Erfarenhet inom teknisk projektledning eller service delivery i IT-projekt gentemot kunder
* Bra förståelse för utveckling och leverans av tekniska lösningar från krav till färdig lösning
* Erfarenhet från hela utvecklingsflödet och gärna arbetat med någon strukturerad utvecklingsmodell/process
* God erfarenhet av att jobba agilt


 Vi ser även att du har erfarenhet av att delta i eller leda:
   

  

* Kravinsamling och kravanalys
* Lösningsdesign
* Utveckling
* Test i olika nivåer (enhet, integration, acceptanstester)
* Samordning med användare och andra intressenter


 Din arbetsplats kan vara belägen i Stockholm eller Göteborg. Vi erbjuder både möjlighet att arbeta på plats och på distans med flexibla arbetsmodeller – resor till kund kan ibland förekomma.
   

  

 Hur definieras rollen som Project Lead på Solita? Läs mer i vårt globala Project Lead Manifesto.
   

  

**Karriärbanor på Solita**
 Jobbet som konsult hos oss innebär ofta en brant utvecklingskurva och variation sett till både arbetsuppgifter och roller. Vi värdesätter individanpassning och ser på karriärvägar som inte enbart en stege utan snarare som ett landskap med flera möjliga riktningar, både vertikalt och horisontellt, inom olika kompetensområden.
   

  

 Sam jobbar exempelvis idag som People Lead parallellt med sin roll som Service Delivery Manager.
   

  

 Lia har haft chansen att bära många hattar under sin tid hos oss – från developer till lead developer och arkitekt i både lokala och gränsöverskridande integrationsprojekt.
   

  

**Vem är vi?**
 Vi är ett värderingsstyrt konsultbolag med expertis inom data, design, moln, integrationer och mjukvaruutveckling. Med över 2000 medarbetare (varav 200 i Sverige) är vi tillräckligt stora för att våga ta ut svängarna och tillräckligt små för att bry oss om varandra och våra kunder. Genom att värna om kontinuerligt lärande ser vi till att vi har intressanta projekt för framtiden, och även möjligheter till projektrotationer.
   

  

**Som anställd hos oss kan du vänta dig;**
* Projekt som skapar avtryck, både hos kunder och i samhället;
* Variation; i branscher, i team, i nya teknologier och system, i angreppsätt;
* Flexibilitet och autonomi för att utforma ditt arbete – läs mer från vår blogg;
* Growth Academy – vår kunskapsportal för att stödja din utveckling och dina ambitioner. Vi har en lärande kultur och uppmuntrar våra medarbetare att växa och bredda sina kunskaper genom en rad kompetensnätverk, info sessions, föreläsningar och certifieringar;
* En trygg och human arbetsmiljö för att främja innovation, motivation och välmående;
* Konkurrenskraftig, fast lön i kombination med ett komplett förmånspaket bestående av exempelvis 30 semesterdagar, Friday breakfasts, AWs, bike leasing, intern coach för att stödja ditt välbefinnande, och pensionsavsättningar även under din föräldraledighet.


*Lyssna inte bara på oss – läs mer om Solita på* 
*Glassdoor* 
 !
   

  

**Låter det spännande?**
 Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!
   

  

 Berätta om dina färdigheter och önskemål, så tar vi tillsammans reda på om det kan bli en bra match. Detta är en löpande rekrytering; vi går igenom ansökningar och kontaktar löpande de kandidater som bäst matchar vår kravprofil för denna roll.
   

  

 Om du har frågor får du gärna nå ut till oss på LinkedIn eller via mail: Head of People & Culture Patrik Rafstedt (patrik.rafstedt(at)solita.se); People Lead Sam Odeh (sam.odeh(at)solita.se) eller Talent Acquisition Specialist Kajsa Törnroos (kajsa.tornroos(at)solita.se).
   

  

**Vi rekryterar också till vårt kontor i** 
**Göteborg** 
**!**

title: Chief Operating Officer
description:
**About the job** 





 Are you a seasoned professional with a strong background in operations and finance, a knack for internal process structuring, and a commercial drive? If so, you might be the ideal candidate to join us at The Humble Co. as our new Chief Operating Officer!
 





  
 





 In the role of COO at The Humble Co., you will work closely with the CEO in Sweden, the CEO of the US entity, and the rest of the team to drive business development, streamline internal processes, and manage various operational aspects of the company. Your ability to enhance operational efficiency and collaborate with different stakeholders will be crucial to your success in this role. You will also oversee certain financial aspects, ensuring compliance with accounting standards such as K3, IFRS, and GAAP, with the support of our external accounting firm.
 





  
 





 Additionally, experience in supply chain management will be considered a plus as managing factory contacts and supporting the structure of the supply chain will be part of your responsibilities.
 





  
 





 The position is full-time and based in The Humble Co.’s office in Stockholm, Kungsholmen.
 





  
 




**About The Humble Co.** 





 The Humble Co. is a Swedish sustainability-focused company offering eco-friendly and innovative products that don’t compromise on functionality or quality. We believe that choosing sustainable personal care products should be easy, and are here for conscious and curious people who want to make their everyday lifestyle more environmentally friendly.
 





  
 




**What you will do** 





 •   Work closely with the CEOs and the entire team to develop and execute the overall business strategy.
 





 •   Oversee, implement and optimize internal processes to ensure operational efficiency.
 





 •   Manage factory contacts along with the product developer and support the structure of the supply chain.
 





 •   Help drive sales initiatives and support the company’s commercial objectives.
 





 •   Supervise day-to-day accounting and administrative tasks, focusing on efficiency and cost-effectiveness, with support from an external firm.
 





 •   Ensure compliance with K3, IFRS, and GAAP (for our US entity).
 





 •   Collaborate with partners and Humble Group for CSRD reporting.
 





 •   Act as a key member of the executive team, contributing to strategic decision-making.
 





 •   Foster a collaborative and inclusive work environment, engaging effectively with all levels of the organization.
 









**Requirements** 





  
 





 •   Experience in an operational leadership role, with a background in finance or auditing.
 





 •   International experience, particularly in the US, and familiarity with both GAAP and IFRS standards.
 





 •   Proven ability to structure and optimize internal processes.
 





 •   Strong commercial acumen and entrepreneurial spirit.
 





 •   Self-reliant, proactive, and ambitious, thriving in fast-paced environments and enjoying being part of an entrepreneurial culture.
 





 •   Excellent interpersonal skills, able to work closely with a tight-knit team and interact effectively across all levels of the organization.
 





 •   Ability to manage relationships with external accounting firms and oversee financial reporting to Humble Group, as well as see through the compliance aspect.
 





  •   
 
*Experience in one of the Big Four accounting firms is a plus.* 




*•   Experience in supply chain management is a plus.* 




*•   Experience in working with CSRD reporting is a plus.* 





  
 





  
 




**Other information** 





  
 





 •   Start: As soon as possible
 





 •   Location: Stockholm, Kungsholmen
 





  
 



* To apply, please send your CV and Cover Letter to patrick@thehumble.co. We look forward to hearing from you!

title: IT RISK AND COMPLIANCE MANAGER
description:
**IT Risk and Compliance Manager**
 We believe in security by design and privacy by design and enabling our teams to proactively work with risk management and cybersecurity. The IT Risk and Compliance Manager will work on the areas of Governance, Risk & Compliance to ensure cyber security and data protection across SAS operations. In this role, you will be responsible for IT risk management including vendor risk management, data privacy policies and standards, governing risk management and data privacy processes, and ensuring compliance to these. You are directly reporting to the Head of IT Ops and SecOps, and you are a vital part of the SAS Cybersecurity Skill Hub.
   

  

**As IT Risk and Compliance Manager, your main responsibilities are to:**
* Work together with the different teams within Digital and IT to enable the teams to work more hands-on with risk management and cybersecurity
* Develop and enhance cyber and data security policies, control objectives, controls, risk management processes and standards aligned with information security regulations, best practices, and frameworks
* Oversee and drive the cyber risk management processes, incl. cybersecurity controls follow-up and vendor risk management across SAS
* Align key stakeholders on cybersecurity policies, data privacy, guide and enable cybersecurity and data privacy practices across the organization
* Assist with internal and 3rd party audits and address associated findings, such as EASA, IOSA and PCI-DSS
* Own, develop and be system administrator of our IT risk and privacy management system OneTrust


**To Be Successful, We Believe You Should Have**
* A Degree in Information Security, Privacy Management, Information Systems or Computer Science is preferred or commensurate relevant work experience
* Minimum of 5 years’ experience with focus on regulatory compliance and involvement in either data privacy management or cybersecurity management
* In-depth knowledge and understanding of global privacy legislation (e.g., GDPR)
* Knowledge and experience of cyber security standards. Specific knowledge of NIST Cyber Security Framework seen as an advantage
* Experience in translating privacy and/or security regulations into workable and implementable policies and processes
* Experience in implementing enterprise IT risk and privacy management systems, experinece from OneTrust seen as an advantage
* Fluent in English, Swedish or other Nordic languages considered as an advantage
* Experience from aviation, e-commerce and/or from large enterprises seen as an advantage
* Experience from working in a developer intense organization close to development teams seen as an advantage


**Personal Qualifications**
* Professional with a positive attitude and capable of contributing to a dynamic and team-oriented culture
* Strong analytical and interpersonal communication skills, including the ability to communicate effectively and build consensus with teams across organizational lines


 If you feel inspired by the position and feel this is the right challenge for your career, we are looking forward to receiving your application and CV! Last application day is 23rd of August 2024.
   

  

 SAS, Scandinavia's leading airline since 1946, operates from its principal hub at Copenhagen Airport (CPH), complemented by hubs in Oslo (OSL) and Stockholm (ARN).
   

  

 Our mission is to connect Scandinavia with the world and the world with Scandinavia. Each year, SAS serves more than 25 million passengers and transports 55 tons of cargo to 135 destinations across Europe, the USA, and Asia. With a passionate workforce of over 10,000 colleagues, we collaborate with partners and customers to drive transformative changes in aviation. We are committed to achieving net-zero emissions by 2050, embodying the visionary spirit of our founders: “To move from the old to what is about to come, is the only tradition worth keeping”. Innovation and societal progress are at the heart of everything we do.
   

  

 For more information, visit our website at www.flysas.com or follow us on social media for the latest updates and promotions.

title: UI/UX Designer för kund inom logistik (50%)
description:
**Start****14-09-2024****Duration****10-12 months**
  
**Om Uppdraget**


emagine söker nu ytterligare en driven UI/UX Designer för att förstärka utvecklingsteamet hos vår logistikkund och bidra till vidareutvecklingen av Androidappen för logistikprocesser.

**Om Rollen**


Som UI/UX Designer kommer du att spela en central roll i utformningen av kundens mobila systemstöd, som syftar till att säkerställa att rätt varor hamnar på rätt lastbil och når rätt butik i rätt tid. Du kommer att arbeta nära utvecklare, projektledare och andra experter för att skapa intuitiva och effektiva mobila arbetsverktyg inom logistik.

 **Arbetsuppgifter**

* Användarintervjuer och kartläggning: Genomföra användarintervjuer och stödja i kartläggning av systemarkitektur.
* Utveckling av appfunktioner: Formge och utveckla appfunktioner som i vissa fall tidigare endast varit tillgängliga via desktop.
* Samarbete: Arbeta i nära samarbete med experter, utvecklare och projektledare för att skapa flöden som förenklar och effektiviserar viktiga och återkommande funktioner.
* Designsystem och gränssnitt: Bygga och underhålla designsystem samt rita användargränssnitt som möter både beställarens och användarnas behov.
* Idégenerering och flödeskartor: Generera idéer och skapa flödeskartor som visualiserar användarresor och interaktioner.
* Kvalitetssäkring: Säkerställa att designen stödjer kvalitetssäkring av processer på mottaget, lagret och vid utlastning.

**Kvalifikationer**

* **Utbildning** - Relevant högskole- eller universitetsutbildning inom UI/UX design, interaktionsdesign, grafisk design eller liknande.
* **Erfarenhet -** Minst 3 års erfarenhet av UI/UX design, helst inom logistik- eller lagerhanteringssystem / produktion / industriella appar
* **Verktyg** - Erfarenhet av designverktyg som Figma, FigJam, Jira, Miro samt Microsoft Office och Teams eller motsvarande
* **Färdigheter -** Starkt visuellt sinne, god förståelse för användarcentrerad design och erfarenhet av att skapa användarvänliga gränssnitt.

**Information**


Omfattning; 50%


Start: mitten av September, uppdraget löper tills vidare, en månads uppsägningstid


Arbetet utförs på plats i kundens lokaler

title: Senior UX/Service Designer
description:
We are looking for you who want to help customers move forward with their UX and service design! You understand the importance of a structured work with UX and are dedicated to improving the design process in product development.

  



You inspire others and is engaged to help customers and colleagues move forward, as well as the ability to see the business value at our customers. You are an expert in your field and we can offer you a work environment where you will develop further with us. As part of our already strong team in UX and as a consultant at our customers, it is important that you sort out both large and small problems in the everyday life.

  


#### **RESPONSIBILITIES**

  


Example of tasks  


* Lead the UX and service design efforts for our clients.
* Coach teams and organizations in adopting a structured approach to UX.
* Develop strategies and establish conditions for high-quality UX work.
* Provide education on UX methodology internally at QESTIT, during consulting assignments, and at universities.
* Drive forward UX and service design initiatives, ensuring the work is future-proofed at both strategic and operational levels.
* Contribute to shaping our internal culture and advancing QESTIT's capabilities in UX.

  



You want to be involved in developing future products using modern methods. Internal engagement is important, and we regularly meet within the company for strategic discussions as well as social and professional development activities. We highly value personal qualities such as social skills, teamwork ability, initiative and responsibility and a strong business spirit.

  


#### **QUALIFICATIONS**

  


* You have several years of experience working with UX in product development.
* You hold a relevant education in the field.
* You communicate effectively with development teams, stakeholders, management, and customers.
* You are fluent in both Swedish and English, spoken and written.
* You are detail-oriented and dedicated to exceeding customer expectations.
* You are curious and actively pursue your personal development.

  


#### **WE OFFER YOU**

  



We offer a collaborative and open environment with streamlined decision-making processes and colleagues who share common values of curiosity, creativity, and commitment. Our work culture empowers you to influence and make independent decisions. We provide the necessary tools to create an optimal setting for your personal and professional growth, contributing to the company’s long-term success. We trust in the abilities of our employees and appreciate the value of leveraging each individual's unique strengths.

  


* Manage your own development plan.
* Market salary.
* Ability to customize part of your salary according to your own priorities.
* Flexible working environment.
* Full-time
Role Senior UX/Service Designer
 Gothenburg
 Full-time permanent position

### **Senior UX/Service Designer**


  
Want to know more
### **I WILL BE HAPPY TO ANSWER ALL YOUR QUESTIONS.**


Alixander Ansari GOTHENBURG
+46 704 74 31 71



alixander.ansari@qestit.se

title: UX designer, Solna
description:
*Be a part of creating the digital customer experiences of the future with us at PostNord. Join the UX designer team in Stockholm!*

*Join UX designer team for Postnord and be part of creating great customer journey for our business customers. You will be part of an UX/UI team where you will as UX designer have an ownership for the business portal. You will also be part of a team UX designers that continuously improving how we work with design.*

**Join us**
-----------


We, the UX are working in an agile environment where the team independently owns the product from start to finish. Within the team, it is important that everybody has their say, and we always strive to improve our way of working.


Our head office is in Solna, Stockholm. Three days in the week we make sure to meet each other in our office in Solna.


Find out more and follow us on LinkedIn!

**We are looking for you**
--------------------------


To be successful in this role, we believe that you are a UX designer with a project manager mindset. Together with the product team you need to set the customer journey and roadmap going forward. You will work closely with business, product owners, developers and other UX designers to prioritize design work and make sure we build the best customer journey in our business portal.


As a person, we believe that you are full of initiative and solution oriented. You have good communication skills and thrive when you get to work both practically and close to our users and are used to facilitate meetings and visualize requirements.


You have a great personal drive and adapt efficiently to new information and insights. Like us, you value teamwork and building great solutions together.

### **Your profile**

* Relevant education in UX design, interaction design, service design or equivalent field.
* Minimum 3 years of work experience as a UX/UI designer
* Facilitation skills and able to take ownership and get things done
* Design user flows and interfaces for our digital services in Figma.
* The ability to analyze and design user flows based on insights collected via interviews and other mediums such as Hotjar/Google Analytics
* Experience in designing user interfaces for web
* Understands graphic design and typography.
* Understands designing for accessibility and WCAG requirements
* Experience in planning and conducting user tests.
* Fluent Swedish and English

**Job Responsibilities**
------------------------

* Conducting user research, both qualitative and quantitative, as well as analyzing and presenting insights to revenant product teams and whole department
* Analyzing and following up on user research
* Designing overall user flows and interfaces for our digital services on the web
* Working closely with product owners, other designers and other stakeholders within PostNord
* Responsible to align their part of PostNord’s Customer Journey with other product areas and UX Designers
* Take ownership for what should prioritized in in the business portal

**We offer you**
----------------

* A great team, you are both part of the market web team but also a bigger team with a focus on customer-facing solutions at Postnord.
* Agile is our way of working, we have daily's, refinement meetings and sprint retros.
* Flexible hybrid workplace with an open working climate.
* To be part of a large organization with endless development opportunities for you as a developer and individual.
* Good insurance and occupational pension conditions.
* Wellness allowance and access to office gym and swimming pool.
* Employee benefits through PostNord's own employee foundation PostNord Plus.
* Employment according to a collective agreement.

**We make everyday life easier**
--------------------------------


PostNord is the leading supplier of communication and logistics solutions to, from, and within the Nordic region. We ensure the provision of a postal service to households and businesses in Sweden and Denmark. We aim to make everyday life easier and more sustainable for everyone who lives and works in the Nordic region. We are accountable, brave and committed, effectively leading change regardless of if we lead ourselves or others. We emphasize teamwork, sincerity and positive relationships in the workplace. We build on our success and learn from both colleagues and mistakes. People with different backgrounds work with us. You will therefore be part of a workplace with great diversity, which contributes to better results for the business. Visit us at postnord.com.

**Apply**
---------


What are you waiting for? Welcome with your application. Selection is ongoing, so apply as soon as possible. If you have any questions about the position, email sonja.prest@postnord.com.


We look forward to hearing from you!


Click here for union contacts


#UXdesigner

title: UX/UI Designer (iOS/android), Solna
description:
*Gillar du att skapa fantastiska upplevelser, intuitiva flöden och vill förenkla komplexa processer med mobila appar i fokus? Grymt! Det gör vi också och därför letar vi efter en person som dig.*

**Bli en del av vårt team**
---------------------------


Vi på Digital Solutions and Development bygger kundlösningar för PostNords nordiska marknader. Vårt mål är att ge våra kunder de absolut bästa tjänster inom logistik. Du kan läsa mer om oss på Linkedin


Efterfrågan på bra logistiktjänster har ökat och vi vill vara en självklar del av lösningen. Att skicka eller ta emot att paket med PostNord ska vara så smidigt det bara går. För att lyckas med detta spelar UX och UI en viktig roll. Vårt UX-team ser till att vi kan skapa bättre, mer användarvänliga och enhetligt designade tjänster riktade mot konsumenter, e-handlare och större företag. Vi söker nu ytterligare en erfaren UX/UI designer som vill arbeta med hela designprocessen från idéer på post-its till high-fidelity prototyp och stödja utvecklarteamen tills din design är live för hundratusentals användare.

**Arbetsuppgifter**
-------------------


I rollen som UX/UI designer kommer du bland annat arbeta med att:

* Genomföra användarresearch, både kvalitativt och kvantitativt samt analysera och presentera insikter till produktteamet.
* Analysera och följa upp användarresearch.
* Designa användarflöden och gränssnitt för våra digitala tjänster inom Retail-området med användaren i fokus.
* Arbeta nära våra produktägare och andra intressenter inom PostNord.

**Vi söker dig med**
--------------------

* Relevant utbildning inom interaktionsdesign, service design eller motsvarande område.
* Minst 3års arbetslivserfarenhet som UX/UI designer för mobila appar.
* Erfarenhet av att planera och genomföra användartester.
* Förmågan att analysera och designa användarflöden och kan UX best practices.
* Har erfarenhet med att designa UI för mobila appar.
* Förstår grunderna i grafisk design och typografi.
* Förstår grunderna hur man designar för tillgänglighet och WCAG-kraven.

### **Meriterande**

* Har jobbat med design system och förstår att det du designar ska passa in i vårt varumärke och i ett digitalt ekosystem.
* Har jobbat med att designa UI för webb.
* Har arbetat med, eller till och med tagit fram, UI libraries i Figma.
* Kunskap och erfarenhet inom UX writing.
* Förstår IT-processer som Scrum och Agile.

**Vi erbjuder dig**
-------------------

* Inflytande att skapa produkter och tjänster som används av hela Sveriges och nordens befolkning.
* Friskvårdsbidrag & tillgång till kontorets gym och simhall.
* Personalförmåner genom PostNords egen personalstiftelse PostNord Plus.
* Goda tjänstepensionsvillkor.
* Goda utvecklingsmöjligheter.

**Vi gör vardagen enklare**
---------------------------


PostNord är den ledande leverantören av kommunikations- och logistiklösningar till, från och inom Norden. Vi säkerställer postservicen till privatpersoner och företag i Sverige och Danmark. Vi strävar efter att göra vardagen enklare och mer hållbar för alla som bor och arbetar i Norden. Vi är ansvarstagande, modiga och engagerade, och leder effektivt förändring oavsett om vi leder oss själva eller andra. Vi uppmuntrar lagarbete, uppriktighet och positiva relationer på arbetsplatsen. Vi bygger vidare på våra framgångar och lär oss av både kollegor och misstag. Människor med olika bakgrund arbetar hos oss. Du kommer därför vara en del av en arbetsplats med stor mångfald, vilket bidrar till bättre resultat för verksamheten. Besök oss på postnord.com

**Ansök**
---------


Låter det intressant? Hör av dig till oss med ditt CV och lägg gärna med en PDF eller länk till dina bästa portfolio-exempel. Vi ser fram emot din ansökan! Har du någon fråga eller fundering är du välkommen att kontakta Sonja Prest på tel. 070-211 11 71.


För fackliga kontaktpersoner se Fackliga kontakter.

title: Product Designer
description:
**What makes us Qlik?**  

A Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ Leader for 13 years in a row, Qlik transforms complex data landscapes into actionable insights, driving strategic business outcomes. Serving over 40,000 global customers, our portfolio leverages pervasive data quality and advanced AI/ML capabilities that lead to better decisions, faster.  

We excel in integration and governance solutions that work with diverse data sources, and our real-time analytics uncover hidden patterns, empowering teams to address complex challenges and seize new opportunities. **The****Product Designer****Role**  

Our growing design team is uniquely positioned to impact the company's future direction. With approximately 38,000 customers worldwide, we have access to a rich user community to help inform our decisions. Our highly collaborative environment means we work with a diverse group of talented people worldwide, continuously innovating and improving the company’s ways of working with data.
Qlik’s design team is a global organization with various talents, including user research, usability research, visual design, and UX/product design. The team focuses on the user's experience and maximizing the user value that our customers can get from our product through great design.  

  

As a UX/product designer in the Analytics Business Unit, you will be working to ensure that our users get to next-level insight and action from their data and making the consumption of those digestible and desirable.
You will work with a diverse group of highly talented people within design and other teams to influence our products' future direction, continuous innovation, and improvement. **What makes this role interesting?**  

* Driving product design for our SaaS-based platform, supporting execution and delivery, and ensuring we build solutions users love to use
* Engaging with Product Managers, customers, other designers, internal stakeholders, and product engineering to ensure all relevant inputs are included in the design and delivery.
* Analyze and understand product usage telemetry and feature usage metrics to champion data-driven design and development.
* Interacting with users to understand their needs and behaviors

 **Here’s how you’ll be making an impact:**  

* Can empathize with the users, understand their pains and needs, and build their user journeys
* Curious about users and what they can achieve with our solutions and understanding their needs for creating and consuming analytics and turning that into new or improved solutions
* Ability to help build awareness of the importance of design excellence
* Keep up to date with current market trends and technology
* Excited about how data can transform companies and help users make better decisions
* Find simple solutions to complex problems

 **We’re looking for a teammate with:**  

* Successful completion of a Bachelor’s Degree in a relevant program of study, or equivalent.
* Minimum of 3-5 years of relevant experience
* Previous experience working with a cloud-based Products and/or R&D organization
* Previous experience of enterprise company needs around creating and consuming analytics.
* Strong communication skills, and likes to give and receive feedback
* Experience working with customers in the field, counseling them on deploying solutions, and developing data and analytics-related solutions is a plus.
* Previous Qlik products and/or other analytics and visualization products experience, Industry background, and business intelligence domain experience is a plus.

 **The****location****for this role is:**  

Lund, Sweden **Apply****now and****help****change****how****the world****transforms complex data landscapes into actionable insights and turns complex data challenges into new opportunities!** **More about Qlik and who we are:**  

Find out more about life at Qlik on social: **Instagram**, **LinkedIn**, **YouTube**, and **X/Twitter**, and to see all other opportunities to join us and our values, check out our **Careers Page**.  

What else do we offer?  

* Genuine career progression pathways and mentoring programs
* Culture of innovation, technology, collaboration, and openness
* Flexible, diverse, and international work environment

  

Giving back is a huge part of our culture. Alongside an extra “change the world” day plus another for personal development, we also highly encourage participation in our **Corporate Responsibility Employee Programs**  

The anticipated base salary range for this role is $108,960.00USD MIN – $136,190.00 USD MAX per year. Final compensation offered by Qlik will be based on factors such as the candidate’s location, job-related skills, education, experience, and other business and organizational needs. Qlik offers a comprehensive benefits package.
Qlik is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer. We are committed to fostering a workplace that is diverse, equitable and inclusive.  

Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to actual or perceived: race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, pregnancy and related medical conditions, genetic information, national origin, age, marital status, protected veteran status, disability status or any other characteristic protected by applicable law. title: UX Writer [Ubisoft Connect]
description:
**Company Description**  

Massive Entertainment is a world-leading AAA studio located in Malmö, Sweden and part of the Ubisoft family. We’re a multinational team of more than 750 passionate and highly skilled people from 50+ different countries. Our studio’s goal has always been – and still is – to craft the finest gaming experiences for all players.


At Massive, you get to do what you love most while bringing your own experience to our ongoing projects, like Tom Clancy’s The Division 2, Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora, and Star Wars Outlaws. We're also developing new tech here, such as our in-house engine Snowdrop, and Ubisoft Connect - Ubisoft's digital ecosystem and distribution platform.

 **Job Description**  

Ubisoft Connect is the ecosystem of player services for Ubisoft games across all platforms. It aims to give the best environment for all players to enjoy their games and connect with each other on any device.


We're looking for a skilled UX Writer to join our team. You will foster a user-centric approach, be instrumental in boosting the quality of player-facing communication and help establish global writing processes for Ubisoft Connect’s products.


You will join a multi-disciplinary team where everyone is willing to expand their knowledge and is encouraged to continue learning new things. The team is characterized by passion, comradery and the love for PC gaming.


You will work closely with teams located around the globe including the Online Services development teams, game development teams as well as other stakeholders within the company. Within the role there will be room for other developing tasks depending on your interests.

**We're offering a permanent position in Malmö, Sweden, with the flexibility to work partially from home (up to two days a week) under our Flexible Workplace Policy. Please apply using English, our company's primary language.**

**What you'll do**

* Write concise interface copy in English for player facing features (descriptions, menus, settings, notifications, etc.) as well as internal tools
* Iterate based on design, technical, and localization needs
* Set tone, voice, and the overall writing style for our products in English
* Partner with UX Directors and transversal teams to understand the overall vision and develop our communication strategy
* Establish a UX Writing guide as part of our design system; set up and maintain documentation across our teams
* Work closely with designers to discuss intentions and write content to transform designs into user-friendly products
* Collaborate with UX Research, Accessibility, and Quality Control to grasp player needs, motivations, behaviors, etc.
* Structure sustainable workflows for our writing processes
* Work closely with localization teams who will adapt your text into different languages: give context, provide feedback, and continuously improve on best practices
* Brainstorm and research content ideas + identify opportunities to improve the player experience through copy
* Support marketing teams and user research in their communication with our players.
* Follow up on content post-launch and iterate based on feedback

  

**Qualifications** **What you'll bring**


As a UX Writer joining our team, you’ll play a crucial role in enhancing the user experience through well-crafted content. We’re looking for someone who can find user-friendly ways to communicate in an international context. You’ll make data-informed decisions, gather insights, and create empathetic content that resonates with our gamers. Attention to detail and a knack for innovation are essential as you balance the big picture and ensure excellence in your delivery. Besides the above we’re looking for someone aligned with our core values and the following skills and experience:

* Related experience in copywriting, technical writing, or content strategy
* Proficiency in English at academic level (C1-C2) or native speaker
* Bachelor's or master's degree or other relevant vocational education programs is a bonus
* Experience in writing user-centric copy adapted to various platforms (e.g. PC, Console, Mobile, Web)
* Knowledge on how to work with data to inform your content choices

**Nice to have**

* Passion for video games and esports
* Experience in collaborating with international teams
* Experience with digital distribution platforms (such as Ubisoft Connect, Steam, Epic Games etc.)

  

**What to send our way**


We would enjoy reviewing your CV highlighting your experience & a few samples of your best work (attach files or send us a link to your personal website or online portfolio).

 **Additional Information**  

Ubisoft’s 19,000 team members, working across more than 30 countries around the world, are bound by a common mission to enrich players’ lives with original and memorable gaming experiences. Their commitment and talent have brought to life many acclaimed franchises such as Assassin’s Creed, Far Cry, Watch Dogs, Just Dance, Rainbow Six, and many more to come. Ubisoft is an equal opportunity employer that believes diverse backgrounds and perspectives are key to creating worlds where both players and teams can thrive and express themselves. If you are excited about solving game-changing challenges, cutting edge technologies and pushing the boundaries of entertainment, we invite you to join our journey and help us create the unknown.


You can also find a summary of the Massive Job Perks here.


All your application information will be kept confidential according to EEO & GDPR guidelines.
company_description: We're committed to enriching player's lives with original & memorable gaming experiences. Join us & create the unknown!

title: UX/UI Designer
description:
**UX/UI Designer Job Ad**
**Company:** 
 Metrea Simulations
   

  

**Location:** 
 Stockholm
   

  

**Position:** 
 UX/UI Designer
   

  

**About Us**
 Metrea Simulations is at the forefront of flight simulation and services, blending physics, engineering, and artistry to create the most realistic and immersive training experiences. Our cutting-edge technologies offer efficient training, design, development, and tactical analysis across the aviation sector. Our core strength lies in advanced AI, flight, and sensor modeling, which enable us to deliver next-generation augmented reality products and services.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are seeking a dedicated UX/UI Designer to lead the design efforts for our next-generation professional military simulation software, NOR. This role requires a collaborative team player who thrives in a multidisciplinary environment and can work independently. You will be responsible for formulating, presenting, and iterating on designs, and evaluating their effectiveness post-implementation.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Lead UX/UI design across all Metrea Simulations (MSIM) solutions.
* Collaborate closely with design, tech, and art teams to ensure UI meets both functional and aesthetic standards.
* Ensure MSIM software is intuitive, user-friendly, and easy to understand.


**Skills And Requirements**
* Proven experience designing UX for PC software, such as professional tools or strategy games.
* Passion for software development and creating exceptional user experiences.
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
* Excellent interpersonal skills, with the ability to clearly communicate design concepts to non-design team members.
* Strong organizational skills, capable of planning, prioritizing, and managing your design workload independently.


**Preferred Additional Skills**
* Experience with Unreal Engine.
* Passion for military-themed games and simulations.
* Interest in strategy/map games.
* Military experience, especially in aviation.
* Experience with mission planning or management systems.
* Background in the video game industry.
* Experience working with international teams.
* Additional language skills (e.g., Swedish, Polish, German).


**Why Join Us**
* Work on cutting-edge simulation technology.
* Be part of a dynamic and innovative team.
* Opportunities for professional growth and development.
* Contribute to products that make a significant impact in the aviation sector.


**How To Apply**
 Submit your resume, portfolio, and a cover letter detailing your relevant experience and why you’re passionate about this role
   

  

 Metrea Simulations is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.

title: UX designer, Solna
description:
Be a part of creating the digital customer experiences of the future with us at PostNord. Join the UX designer team in Stockholm!
   

  

 Join UX designer team for Postnord and be part of creating great customer journey for our business customers. You will be part of an UX/UI team where you will as UX designer have an ownership for the business portal. You will also be part of a team UX designers that continuously improving how we work with design.
   

  

**Join us**
 We, the UX are working in an agile environment where the team independently owns the product from start to finish. Within the team, it is important that everybody has their say, and we always strive to improve our way of working.
   

  

 Our head office is in Solna, Stockholm. Three days in the week we make sure to meet each other in our office in Solna.
   

  

 Find out more and follow us on LinkedIn!
   

  

**We are looking for you**
 To be successful in this role, we believe that you are a UX designer with a project manager mindset. Together with the product team you need to set the customer journey and roadmap going forward. You will work closely with business, product owners, developers and other UX designers to prioritize design work and make sure we build the best customer journey in our business portal.
   

  

 As a person, we believe that you are full of initiative and solution oriented. You have good communication skills and thrive when you get to work both practically and close to our users and are used to facilitate meetings and visualize requirements.
   

  

 You have a great personal drive and adapt efficiently to new information and insights. Like us, you value teamwork and building great solutions together.
   

  

**Your profile**
* Relevant education in UX design, interaction design, service design or equivalent field.
* Minimum 3 years of work experience as a UX/UI designer
* Facilitation skills and able to take ownership and get things done
* Design user flows and interfaces for our digital services in Figma.
* The ability to analyze and design user flows based on insights collected via interviews and other mediums such as Hotjar/Google Analytics
* Experience in designing user interfaces for web
* Understands graphic design and typography.
* Understands designing for accessibility and WCAG requirements
* Experience in planning and conducting user tests.
* Fluent Swedish and English


**Job Responsibilities**
* Conducting user research, both qualitative and quantitative, as well as analyzing and presenting insights to revenant product teams and whole department
* Analyzing and following up on user research
* Designing overall user flows and interfaces for our digital services on the web
* Working closely with product owners, other designers and other stakeholders within PostNord
* Responsible to align their part of PostNord’s Customer Journey with other product areas and UX Designers
* Take ownership for what should prioritized in in the business portal


**We offer you**
* A great team, you are both part of the market web team but also a bigger team with a focus on customer-facing solutions at Postnord.
* Agile is our way of working, we have daily's, refinement meetings and sprint retros.
* Flexible hybrid workplace with an open working climate.
* To be part of a large organization with endless development opportunities for you as a developer and individual.
* Good insurance and occupational pension conditions.
* Wellness allowance and access to office gym and swimming pool.
* Employee benefits through PostNord's own employee foundation PostNord Plus.
* Employment according to a collective agreement.


**We make everyday life easier**
 PostNord is the leading supplier of communication and logistics solutions to, from, and within the Nordic region. We ensure the provision of a postal service to households and businesses in Sweden and Denmark. We aim to make everyday life easier and more sustainable for everyone who lives and works in the Nordic region. We are accountable, brave and committed, effectively leading change regardless of if we lead ourselves or others. We emphasize teamwork, sincerity and positive relationships in the workplace. We build on our success and learn from both colleagues and mistakes. People with different backgrounds work with us. You will therefore be part of a workplace with great diversity, which contributes to better results for the business. Visit us at postnord.com.
   

  

**Apply**
 What are you waiting for? Welcome with your application. Selection is ongoing, so apply as soon as possible. If you have any questions about the position, email sonja.prest@postnord.com.
   

  

 We look forward to hearing from you!
   

  

 Click here for union contacts
   

  

 #UXdesigner

title: UX/UI Designer (iOS/android), Solna
description:
Gillar du att skapa fantastiska upplevelser, intuitiva flöden och vill förenkla komplexa processer med mobila appar i fokus? Grymt! Det gör vi också och därför letar vi efter en person som dig.
   

  

**Bli en del av vårt team**
 Vi på Digital Solutions and Development bygger kundlösningar för PostNords nordiska marknader. Vårt mål är att ge våra kunder de absolut bästa tjänster inom logistik. Du kan läsa mer om oss på Linkedin
   

  

 Efterfrågan på bra logistiktjänster har ökat och vi vill vara en självklar del av lösningen. Att skicka eller ta emot att paket med PostNord ska vara så smidigt det bara går. För att lyckas med detta spelar UX och UI en viktig roll. Vårt UX-team ser till att vi kan skapa bättre, mer användarvänliga och enhetligt designade tjänster riktade mot konsumenter, e-handlare och större företag. Vi söker nu ytterligare en erfaren UX/UI designer som vill arbeta med hela designprocessen från idéer på post-its till high-fidelity prototyp och stödja utvecklarteamen tills din design är live för hundratusentals användare.
   

  

**Arbetsuppgifter**
 I rollen som UX/UI designer kommer du bland annat arbeta med att:
   

  

* Genomföra användarresearch, både kvalitativt och kvantitativt samt analysera och presentera insikter till produktteamet.
* Analysera och följa upp användarresearch.
* Designa användarflöden och gränssnitt för våra digitala tjänster inom Retail-området med användaren i fokus.
* Arbeta nära våra produktägare och andra intressenter inom PostNord.


**Vi söker dig med**
* Relevant utbildning inom interaktionsdesign, service design eller motsvarande område.
* Minst 3års arbetslivserfarenhet som UX/UI designer för mobila appar.
* Erfarenhet av att planera och genomföra användartester.
* Förmågan att analysera och designa användarflöden och kan UX best practices.
* Har erfarenhet med att designa UI för mobila appar.
* Förstår grunderna i grafisk design och typografi.
* Förstår grunderna hur man designar för tillgänglighet och WCAG-kraven.


**Meriterande**
* Har jobbat med design system och förstår att det du designar ska passa in i vårt varumärke och i ett digitalt ekosystem.
* Har jobbat med att designa UI för webb.
* Har arbetat med, eller till och med tagit fram, UI libraries i Figma.
* Kunskap och erfarenhet inom UX writing.
* Förstår IT-processer som Scrum och Agile.


**Vi erbjuder dig**
* Inflytande att skapa produkter och tjänster som används av hela Sveriges och nordens befolkning.
* Friskvårdsbidrag & tillgång till kontorets gym och simhall.
* Personalförmåner genom PostNords egen personalstiftelse PostNord Plus .
* Goda tjänstepensionsvillkor.
* Goda utvecklingsmöjligheter.


**Vi gör vardagen enklare**
 PostNord är den ledande leverantören av kommunikations- och logistiklösningar till, från och inom Norden. Vi säkerställer postservicen till privatpersoner och företag i Sverige och Danmark. Vi strävar efter att göra vardagen enklare och mer hållbar för alla som bor och arbetar i Norden. Vi är ansvarstagande, modiga och engagerade, och leder effektivt förändring oavsett om vi leder oss själva eller andra. Vi uppmuntrar lagarbete, uppriktighet och positiva relationer på arbetsplatsen. Vi bygger vidare på våra framgångar och lär oss av både kollegor och misstag. Människor med olika bakgrund arbetar hos oss. Du kommer därför vara en del av en arbetsplats med stor mångfald, vilket bidrar till bättre resultat för verksamheten. Besök oss på postnord.com
   

  

**Ansök**
 Låter det intressant? Hör av dig till oss med ditt CV och lägg gärna med en PDF eller länk till dina bästa portfolio-exempel. Vi ser fram emot din ansökan! Har du någon fråga eller fundering är du välkommen att kontakta Sonja Prest på tel. 070-211 11 71.
   

  

 För fackliga kontaktpersoner se Fackliga kontakter .
