title: Salesforce Technical Solution Owner
description:
**Location:**  

Malmö, SE
  
  

**Job Family:** Information Technology
  
**Country/Region:** Sweden
  
  

Do you want to take part in our ambitious Salesforce implementation journey? Become a true trailblazer using e.g. Health cloud, B2B Commerce and OMS And are you motivated by the chance to influence the solution which will play an important role for our future strategic initiatives?
  
  

In Coloplast, we are in the exciting process of rolling out Salesforce.com globally. Currently, we are live in 30 countries with 4000+ users, with more to come. So this is not just a sales or CRM system – this is THE system. And we use it to ultimately make life easier for people with intimate health care needs.
  
  

Welcome to Atos Medical, Coloplast and the Salesforce division
  
  

From our Atos Medical office in Malmö, you will be joining our global CRM and Commercial Solutions division, anchored in our Digital, Data & IT unit. Here, 3 teams with more than 50 committed and skilled colleagues across IT and business, a perfect mix of internal and external consultants, work every day to deliver a best-in-class CRM & Commercial solution – with a solid focus on our global Salesforce implementation.
  
  

“We work in a top priority program surrounded by extremely skilled colleagues, who strive to do a little bit better every day, having fun along the way – and when you also get to make a difference for people with health care issues, it is really a great place to work,” says Head of CRM Platform and Architecture, Jacob Karlstad.
  
  

**Responsibilities:**  

Owner and refinement responsible of technical solutions in Salesforce where we are really working in a trailblazing environment with e.g. Health Cloud, B2B Commerce, OMS, Sales Cloud, etc.
  
Bridging the gap between Coloplast business capability requirements and the solutions signed off by the architects
  
Bring solutions together into an end-to-end product
  
Understand selected customer facing solutions
  
Secure a robust, global and scalable solution serving our 4000+ users globally in 30 markets
  
Making sure solutions are maintainable not only from a development perspective but also from an operational perspective.
  
Be involved in- and supervise the development. In some cases, manage the configuration yourself
  
Define and ensure that best practices and development principles are communicated and followed including securing that external resources deliver according to guidelines and architectural cornerflags
  
Sparring with but also challenge external vendors
  
Manage technical risk in development phase and in operations
  
Work with PI planning and proactively contribute to the entire sprint process signing off the technical solution including test scripting and test documentation
  
  

**Requirements:**  

Salesforce experience is a prerequisite and preferable + 3-5 years
  
Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field
  
Functional development skills
  
Excellent technical, diagnostic, and troubleshooting skills
  
Strong communication, motivational and interpersonal skills
  
Visio diagrams and presentations
  
You are used to work in JIRA or similar
  
Speak fluent English
  
Proactive and team player with a quality mindset
  
Experience with working with integration systems like ERP and Mulesoft
  
  

We offer
  
  

A trailblazing team using e.g., Health cloud, B2B Commerce and OMS
  
Flexible international working environment
  
Working with a very skilled Salesforce team in a professional set-up
  
Part of a company were values matters and the focus is “….so you can be you” both from a customer focus perspective and a employee perspective
  
  

Interested?
  
  

If you would like to know more about the position, please contact Head of CRM Platform and Architecture, Jacob Karlstad at dkjkar@coloplast.com. We will take candidates into the recruitment process continuously, so do not hesitate to apply. This position will remain open until a suitable candidate has been found.
  
  

Founded in 1986, Atos Medical is the global leader in laryngectomy care as well as a leading developer and manufacturer of tracheostomy products. We are passionate about making life easier for people living with a neck stoma, and we achieve this by providing personalized care and innovative solutions through our brands Provox®, Provox Life™ and Tracoe.
  
  

We know that great customer experience involves more than first-rate product development, which is why clinical research and education of both professionals and patients are integral parts of our business.
  
  

Our roots are Swedish but today we are a global organization made up of about 1400 dedicated employees and our products are distributed to more than 90 countries. As we continue to grow, we remain committed to our purpose of improving the lives of people living with a neck stoma.
  
  

Since 2021, Atos Medical is the Voice and Respiratory Care division of Coloplast A/S
  
  

57264
  
#LI-AT
company_description: Join the team at Coloplast where our mission is to make like easier for people with intimate healthcare needs.

title: Data Scientist - Acceleration Nordics
description:
**Welcome to join an experienced and growing team of Data scientists and Consultants who work to drive increased marketing effectiveness for some of Sweden's and the world's largest brands.**
As part of the leading media agency group GroupM, we at Acceleration work to transform large amounts of data into solutions to complex problems in media and marketing. The projects include a broad mix of econometrics, media buying algorithms, dashboards and strategy projects/consulting services.  


Acceleration drives GroupM and the rest of the industry forward through technology and data innovation and works closely with the largest advertisers, publishers and technology companies in the industry. This is a position with a plethora of opportunities for growth both professionally and personally.  

**About** **the position**
The position includes working in a team with experienced colleagues:* Be a driven data scientist for projects in econometrics, attribution, experiments, algorithms and other data science-related projects
* Together with the rest of the project team, analyze, package and present to our customers
* Participate in and drive development projects within automated reporting, algorithms and other data science commitments


**Professional and personal qualifications**
We are a team with entrepreneurial drive. Professionally, we believe that you are a recent graduate or have worked for a number of years in data science or analysis with the following skills:* Education with a solid foundation in mathematics and statistics (e.g. MSc in mathematics, industrial economics, alternatively economist or statistician)
* Experience with PowerPoint
* Experience in project management
* Ability to present and communicate your results in a convincing manner
* Knowledge of different Excel, R, PowerBI is an advantage (but not a requirement)
* Knowledge of applications within Cloud environments is an advantage (but not a requirement)
* Knowledge of the ecosystem for digital media and environments within, for example, Google Marketing Platform, Facebook and Xandr is an advantage (but not a requirement)


**On a personal level, we believe you are interested in:*** Present and communicate your results to relevant stakeholders
* Drive dialogues and deliver projects in both Swedish and English
* Work thoroughly, detail-oriented and independently (proactive and entrepreneurial)
* Be a "team player" with a willingness to work both individually and in a team


**Our offer**
With us, you get the opportunity to work with many of Sweden's and the world's most ambitious brands, together with a team that is passionate about digital marketing, and with market-leading technologies.

You will sit in central premises on Birger Jarlsgatan with inspiring colleagues from different backgrounds, who together drive digital marketing to the next level through innovation and solid work. Furthermore, there are great opportunities for personal development and career development within GroupM Sweden, as well as within our global network.
We are part of WPP, a large international group, and we work to combine the best of these two worlds. You are offered to work in a stimulating and developing workplace with a high comfort factor and colleagues who are close to laughing.

In addition to the obvious, such as good working conditions, pleasant working environment and exciting challenges, there are a couple of things that make working here a little extra good:* Great participation and opportunity to be involved and influence your daily work
* Family spirit, short decision-making paths and great closeness between management and employees
* We think that a balance between work, leisure and personal development is important
* Wellness allowance of SEK 3,000/year and several attractive staff benefits
* We offer market-adapted pension terms and private pension advice via our partner Nordea
* We have occupational health care via Feelgood and additional health insurance via Euro Accident
* Conferences, kick-offs and other fun that we do together
* Office centrally located in the middle of Stockholm city on Birger Jarlsgatan


**Application**
The position is a full-time permanent position with entry as soon as possible. We apply a six-month probationary period.
Selection and interviews take place continuously, so submit your application with CV and personal letter as soon as possible.
**Contact**
If you have questions about the position, you are welcome to contact Filip Stjernfeldt, Senior Data Scientist & Team Lead at filip.stjernfeldt@groupm.com. We do not accept applications via e-mail.
**About GroupM**
GroupM is one of Sweden's largest media agency groups and consists of Wavemaker, EssenceMediacom, Mindshare, Nexus and Acceleration. GroupM's primary goal is to create benefits for our clients through collaborations with the group's agencies. We do this, among other things, through economies of scale in trading, technology and data. We are part of WPP, which is one of the world's largest groups in marketing communications with over 190,000 employees on a global basis. GroupM Sweden has around 375 employees in Stockholm, Gothenburg, and Malmö.

title: Nattreceptionist Scandic Alvik
description:
Scandic Alvik är ett hotell beläget i Alvik, endast 10 min från Stockholm city och ett stenkast från Mälaren. Vår ambition är att vara bäst på gästupplevelser. Hos oss ingår du i ett härligt team med engagerade medarbetare som hjälper varandra och sätter gästen i fokus i allt vi gör. Hotellet har en variation av gäster bestående av allt ifrån affärsresenärer, nyfikna turister till konferenssällskap. Älskar du att leverera oförglömlig service i världsklass och att skratta på arbetstid? Då passar du perfekt i vårt team!

  


**Nu söker vi en Nattreceptionist till Scandic Alvik 85%**



Ett varmt välkomnande ansikte kan göra stor skillnad för gästens upplevelse hos oss. Du agerar värd tillsammans med övriga teamet på hotellet och skapar en gästupplevelse i världsklass med ett stort säkerhetstänk.



Hos oss får du ta ett stort eget ansvar för att ta de beslut som krävs för att göra gästen nöjd och teamen utvecklar och förbättrar arbetssätt och service i takt med att omvärlden förändras Vi tror starkt på att vi överträffar gästernas förväntningar när du får möjlighet att växa och bidra med din fulla kompetens och erfarenhet. På vägen dit har vi dessutom roligt på jobbet.



Så ta med dig dina erfarenheter, ditt engagemang och ditt sätt att tänka till oss – och bidra till en kultur där vi bryr oss på riktigt: om varandra, våra gäster och vår planet. Välkommen till Scandic!

  


**Vad är innebär rollen?**



Som nattreceptionist är du ansvarig för att våra gäster får en lugn och trygg nattsömn. Du trivs med att vara vaken när andra sover. Du uppskattar att arbeta självständigt med satta rutiner, efter en checklista och ta egna beslut när det behövs. Du är den som ser till att gästens behov alltid sätts i fokus. Du är den som går igenom ankomstlistan och lägger tid på detaljerna. Ser till att gästens önskemål uppfylls. Du har alltid ett leende på läpparna och har alltid en kreativ lösning i bakfickan. Med en lösningsorienterad attityd hanterar du eventuella problem och förvandlar missnöjda gäster till nöjda. Din arbetsplats är vår lobby där du ansvarar för administrativa uppgifter, säkerhetsarbete och försäljning.



Under ditt shift arbetare du ensam på din avdelning, och är då ansvarig för säkerheten på hotellet.



Arbetet i receptionen innebär att checka in och ut hotellets gäster, hälsa välkommen och ge gästen den information den behöver om sin vistelse. Du använder systemet Opera Cloud för att hantera bokningar och administrativt arbete kring gäster och säkerhet. Allt arbete sker med gästnöjdhet och försäljning i fokus.

  


**Vem är du?**



För att passa i rollen tror vi att du har en väl utvecklad social förmåga och är kapabel att hantera att det händer många olika saker samtidigt. Det är mycket viktigt att du kan förmedla ett gott värdskap till hotellets gäster.



Du har också vana och kunskap i att arbeta med dator som arbetsredskap.



Goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska är ett krav och ytterligare språkkunskaper är meriterande. Du är en person som ser hur fokus på detaljer spelar stor roll i ditt dagliga arbete att leverera service.



Du är uppmärksam och lägger stor vikt vid säkerhetsfrågor.



**Information om tjänsten**



Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning på deltid.


Vi tar enbart emot ansökningar via vår hemsida. Alla ansökningar kommer att behandlas löpande och tjänsten kan tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdag, varför vi ber dig att ansöka så snart som möjligt. I denna rekrytering använder vi oss av ett enklare test om service vid urvalet.

title: SAP Specialist
description:
### **Responsibilities**


* Responsible for the setting up of the SAP DMS & document structure for S/4HANA system.
* Integration process and installation/configuration of SAP DMS application component with other core module of SAP S/4HANA.
* Keeping the scope in mind, configure the system accordingly.
* Able to test and document the system.
* Train key users.
* Experienced with SAP Documents, Document Structure, Document Search, Document Distribution Version Management, Document Vaulting, Integrated Viewer Status Management, Document Conversion, Document workflow, Interfacing Table specification.
* Should be also versed with the integration aspects of SAP DMS applications with other core modules of S/4HANA.
* Experience with SER Doxis4 and SAP ECTR, SAP PLM Cloud will be an advantage.
* Setting up SAP Knowledge management, SAP content server, experienced with Metadata search & configuration and Integration with workflow configuration, Enterprise search, integration and Security associated with DMS implementation .
* Should have worked with associated standard workflows across MM, QM and PM.

  


**Required Skills**


* Experience in SAP Document Management implementation on S/4HANA.
* Experience in SAP Workflows configuration.
* Some knowledge and experience of SAP Enterprise Asset Management or further ERP modules making use of SAP DMS.
* Compliance with all IT security rules.
* Preferably has knowledge of SAP ECTR and SAP PLM Cloud.

  


**Desired Skills**


* Experience in the setup of archive link to support retention of POs and Invoices and other documents.
* Document migration from SAP DMS to other ECM solutions
* Fluent in Swedish & English.

title: API Gateway Engineer
description:
API Gateway Engineer


Swedium Global is the growing System Engineering and Solution Company, offers services like Semiconductor Engineering R&D Services, Embedded Systems Development, Custom Application Software Development, Web and Cloud Application Development, Testing Services, Consultancy and Outsourcing services to our clients across the globe for an onsite and offshore business model. Swedium Global is having presence in Sweden, Finland, Poland, Czech Republic and in India.


**Location:** Sweden/Remote


**Expected Start date:** ASAP


**Job Description:** API Gateway Engineer


We are seeking an experienced API Gateway Engineer to design, implement, and manage APIs within our organization. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of API management platforms, preferably AWS API Gateway, and a solid foundation in API development. You will be responsible for ensuring the efficient and effective delivery of API-based services, collaborating closely with development and operations teams.

  


**Responsibilities**


✓ Design and implement APIs using API management platforms (AWS API Gateway preferred).


✓ Create and maintain comprehensive API documentation.


✓ Integrate APIs with backend systems and services.


✓ Monitor API performance and troubleshoot issues.


✓ Collaborate with development and operations teams to ensure API alignment with business requirements.


✓ Implement security best practices for API protection.


✓ Stay up-to-date with API management trends and technologies.

  


**Requirements - Must have:**


✓ Strong understanding of API management concepts and platforms (AWS API Gateway preferred).


✓ Experience in API development and design.


✓ Proficiency in scripting languages (Python, Bash, etc.) for automation.


✓ Proficiency in Java, Node.js, and React.js.


✓ Experience with AWS services like CloudFront, S3, SQS, DynamoDB, AWS Lambda functions and AWS networking components.


✓ Experience with API security standards and protocols (OAuth, OpenID Connect).


✓ Knowledge of API testing and performance benchmarking tools.


✓ Proficiency in terraform for infrastructure as code.


✓ Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.


✓ Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.

  


Good to have:


✓ Understanding of cloud computing platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP).


✓ Agile ways of working, DevSecOps.


✓ Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines (Jenkins, GitHub Actions).

  


**Additional Information**


This role is critical in ensuring the successful delivery of API-based products and services. The ideal candidate will have a passion for API design and development, and a strong desire to contribute to the organization's overall digital strategy.

  


English only is sufficient language skill for this assignment


**Other relevant information**


* We are primarily looking for candidates who can work remote for this position


**You can reach out to us at** **Pratik.pandey@swediumglobal.com** **or** **careers@swediumglobal.com**


  
Job Overview


* Location : Stockholm, Sweden
* Vacancy : 1
* Key Skills : API Gateway Engineer, API Management, API Development, AWS API Gateway, API Security, API Performance, Java, Node.js, React.js, CloudFront, S3, SQS, AWS Lambda functions, OAuth, OpenID Connect, API testing, performance benchmarking, Agile, DevSecOps, CI/C

title: Senior Security Engineer - Platform Security (Remote, Sweden)
description:
**Security Engineer - Platform Security**
-----------------------------------------


### **About our Platform (at Grafana Labs):**



Grafana Cloud moves millions of metrics, log lines, and traces per second from our customers' environments into a highly available, low-latency stack that processes and stores these data, and serves them to dashboards and alerting tools. We aim to grow this to hundreds of millions per second, and it's critical that as we grow, we improve our performance, increase our reliability, and, of course, do it efficiently and effectively.



The Internal Engineering Platform delivered by the Platform department provides application engineers with the tools, systems and Kubernetes clusters they need to build, deploy and run their workloads. Platform roles at Grafana Labs have an eye for engineers with a passion for performance and reliability, and who enjoy taking projects from conception to production. We organize ourselves into squads to allow focus on Cloud Infrastructure, Networking and Security; engineering Productivity; Capacity management, Client Administrative Tooling (CAT); and US Federal compliance.



Because we deploy production services, we have on-call rotations to ensure the health of the system. Everyone at Grafana Labs tries to incorporate and use our product line up into their day-to-day, so being on call is an important way to understand our system and how people use our products.


### **About the squad & the role:**



We’re hiring for our Platform Security squad. This squad provides and owns automation and decision making around our underlying CSP and compute security features for Grafana Cloud. This includes cloud service provider IAM, Kubernetes access control, secret management, and workload security. We’re hands on with writing and shipping code as we aim to simplify secure decision making for engineers by providing pre-configured, secure templates and embedding security best practices into our development tools. We also help the rest of our engineers contributing to Grafana Cloud make the best security decisions possible for all the products we build, through security reviews and advisory.



The values behind scaling cloud native security at Grafana Labs


### **Who Are We Looking For?**


* You enjoy working with engineers, as well as with the management structures that are there to support you and enable you and your team to do your very best.
* You are **comfortable working in a remote-first company**; communication is key. For us, working together means being collaborative, friendly, kind, and respectful. We operate by consensus, you can contribute to a discussion but then commit to the team decision.
* As such, being such a highly distributed company, means we would love someone who is keen on working with **distributed systems**, too.
* You are eager to **learn and grow**. There is a lot of room for growth and development, and the team has quite a lot of knowledge to share for those who are wanting to learn.
* You approach development **holistically**. The team owns the full life cycle of our code; from writing design docs, to looking at developer feedback, and integration testing. We appreciate engineers who enjoy looking at the big picture, and also notice the details of the brush strokes. The Platform team mainly works with Go, Python, and Shell.
* You have experience with **operating your code**. Since a lot of operators and developers use our software, having some grounding in both of these spaces really helps us with building better platforms for our users. Kubernetes and Docker are what we use, mostly. We also work with a lot of Infrastructure as Code, so be sure to check out grafana/tanka.

### **Some skills/experience we like to see:**


* Familiarity with CSP IAM.
* Experience with cloud security posture management (CSPM).
* Infrastructure as Code with Terraform/Crossplane.
* Familiarity with Kubernetes administration - very cool if experience with Tanka.
* Experience in threat modeling, secure architecture reviews, and security tabletop exercises.

### **A few of our upcoming projects:**


* + Streamlining Just In Time Access through IAM and RBAC change process and automation.
	+ Automated assessment of running infrastructure and services, detection of misconfiguration and drift.
	+ Improving Cluster and Node level Security Posture and Observability.
	+ Refine CI/CD Platform Security Posture.

In Sweden, the base compensation range for this role is SEK 738,518 - SEK 923,148. Actual compensation may vary based on level, experience, and skillset as assessed in the interview process. Benefits include equity, bonus (if applicable) and other benefits listed here.

  

**About Grafana Labs:** There are more than 20M users of Grafana, the open source visualization tool, around the globe, monitoring everything from beehives to climate change in the Alps. The instantly recognizable dashboards have been spotted everywhere from a NASA launch and Minecraft HQ to Wimbledon and the Tour de France. Grafana Labs also helps more than 3,000 companies - including Bloomberg, JPMorgan Chase, and eBay - manage their observability strategies with the Grafana LGTM Stack, which can be run fully managed with Grafana Cloud or self-managed with the Grafana Enterprise Stack, both featuring scalable metrics (Grafana Mimir), logs (Grafana Loki), and traces (Grafana Tempo).

**Benefits:** For more information about the perks and benefits of working at Grafana, please check out our careers page.

**Equal Opportunity Employer:** At Grafana Labs we’re building a company where a diverse mix of talented people want to come, stay, and do their best work. We know that our company runs on the hard work and the dedication of our passionate and creative employees. If you're excited about this role but your experience doesn’t align perfectly with every qualification in the job description, we encourage you to apply anyways.

We will recruit, train, compensate and promote regardless of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, disability, age, veteran status, and all the other fascinating characteristics that make us different and unique. We believe that equality and diversity builds a strong organization and we’re working hard to make sure that’s the foundation of our organization as we grow.

*For information about how your personal data is used once you’ve applied to a job, check out our* *privacy policy**.*
company_description: Grafana Labs is the company behind Grafana, the leading open source software for visualizing time series data.

title: Full Stack Engineer
description:
Sinch is a global leader in the growing market for Communication Platforms as a Service (CPaaS) and mobile customer engagement. We are specialists in allowing businesses to reach everyone on the planet, in seconds or less, through mobile messaging, email, voice, and video.
  
With presence in more than 50 countries, whether you know us or not, you’ve definitely used our tech. We reach every phone on earth, with over 147 billion conversations every year.
  
Sinch's core values are Make it Happen, Dream Big, Keep it Simple and Win Together. These values describe how our global organization works and inspire every of our more than 3,000 employees across 55 different countries.
  
  

**Requirements:**  

Role and Responsibilities
  
Develop, architect and scale the core infrastructure for Sinch's web applications. Be part of in a small cross functional team that sets its own objectives and goals with responsibility for every stage of product development life cycle from planning and design to implementation, testing, deployment, monitoring and maintenance, you build It you run it.
  
Your work will be focused around the common platform used to that makes up the core of the product line; The code you write will be consumed by used by many different teams and is a key enabler in the product line. You will solve problems across the enterprise, focusing not only on how to deliver a great product today but setting the foundations for the future.
  
  

**Tech Stack:** NodeJS, Java, React, Typescript
  
Please apply your resume in English!
  
  

**In order to contribute to this role, you have:**  

* A strong software engineering background
* In-depth knowledge of the web platform and ecosystem
* Expertise in modern front-end technologies.
* Solid track record working with Typescript in a professional or open-source setting.
* Experience building services on the backend
* Fluency in English


Big Plus!
  
* Experience using design systems
* Experience making architectural decisions that have high impact
* Experience with Web components and the latest Web APIs
* Experience with AWS, Kubernetes and other cloud native technologies
* Experience with Server side rendering technologies such as Next.js


**Benefits:**  

Sinch is a global company composed of people from different countries and cultures. Our benefits adjust regionally to support employees and help them to thrive in every stage of life. We offer valuable benefits and resources, including health and life insurance, a flexible work environment, retirement savings plans, and more.
  
  

Our Hiring Process
  
In Sinch, we are committed to following a recruitment process that is fair, objective, consistent, and non-discriminatory. Our Talent Acquisition team, together with hiring managers and the rest of the interviewing team, persistently work towards identifying the candidates that best fit each open job, based on Sinch’ s hiring needs and candidates’ career expectations.
  
We encourage applications from strong candidates with relevant professional backgrounds for this role. Not all applicants will meet all job requirements exactly! Even if you do not meet all job requirements, don't let that stop you from considering Sinch for the next step in your career. We are always open to candidates that could bring new ideas and perspectives to Sinch!e
company_description: We help companies to communicate with customers via messaging, voice and video using multiple channels. Simplifying life by bringing all people and businesses together using technology is our purpose.

title: Territory Manager - Nordics, AWS
description:
* Experience in technology related sales, business development or new business experience in the tech industry; experience working with complex IT solutions
* Self-starter with highly developed interpersonal skills; you are motivated and result oriented
* Experience using CRM systems and or other sales prospecting tools
* Experience working with partners to drive scaling campaigns


As an AWS SMB Account/Territory Manager, you will increase adoption and shape the future of cloud technologies across your regional territory by identifying and developing new business opportunities and collaborating with partners to scale and accelerate customer success.
  
  

In this role, you will use your background in sales and technology to increase engagement at the CXO level, as well as with Software Developers, IT architects and partners. Your team will manage the entire lifecycle of new business opportunities from prospecting to closure and adoption, whilst delivering against a territory scaling plan to achieve quarterly revenue targets.
  
  

Do you look around corners for ways to engage and service customers? Are you passionate about using technology to solve business problems that have big customer impact?
  
  

Come build the future with us.
  
  

AWS Sales, Marketing, and Global Services (SMGS) is responsible for driving revenue, adoption, and growth from the largest and fastest growing small- and mid-market accounts to enterprise-level customers including public sector. The AWS Global Support team interacts with leading companies and believes that world-class support is critical to customer success. AWS Support also partners with a global list of customers that are building mission-critical applications on top of AWS services.
  
  

Key job responsibilities
  
* Develop and execute against a comprehensive account/territory plan.
* Create & articulate compelling value propositions around AWS services. Create & maintain an opportunity pipeline and drive consistent account-specific activities
* Work with partners to extend reach & promote adoption and manage complex customer interactions
* Develop long-term strategic relationships with key accounts and ensure customer satisfaction
* Expect moderate travel


About the team
  
Diverse Experiences
  
AWS values diverse experiences. Even if you do not meet all of the qualifications and skills listed in the job description, we encourage candidates to apply. If your career is just starting, hasn’t followed a traditional path, or includes alternative experiences, don’t let it stop you from applying.
  
  

Why AWS?
  
Amazon Web Services (AWS) is the world’s most comprehensive and broadly adopted cloud platform. We pioneered cloud computing and never stopped innovating — that’s why customers from the most successful startups to Global 500 companies trust our robust suite of products and services to power their businesses.
  
  

Inclusive Team Culture
  
Here at AWS, it’s in our nature to learn and be curious. Our employee-led affinity groups foster a culture of inclusion that empower us to be proud of our differences. Ongoing events and learning experiences, including our Conversations on Race and Ethnicity (CORE) and AmazeCon (gender diversity) conferences, inspire us to never stop embracing our uniqueness.
  
  

Mentorship & Career Growth
  
We’re continuously raising our performance bar as we strive to become Earth’s Best Employer. That’s why you’ll find endless knowledge-sharing, mentorship and other career-advancing resources here to help you develop into a better-rounded professional.
  
  

Work/Life Balance
  
We value work-life harmony. Achieving success at work should never come at the expense of sacrifices at home, which is why flexible work hours and arrangements are part of our culture. When we feel supported in the workplace and at home, there’s nothing we can’t achieve in the cloud.
  
  

* End-customer experience
* Partner and Channel experience
* Experience working with cloud technologies
* AWS Cloud Practitioner certified
* AWS Solutions Architect certification/training


Amazon is an equal opportunities employer. We believe passionately that employing a diverse workforce is central to our success. We make recruiting decisions based on your experience and skills. We value your passion to discover, invent, simplify and build. Protecting your privacy and the security of your data is a longstanding top priority for Amazon. Please consult our Privacy Notice (https://www.amazon.jobs/en/privacy\_page) to know more about how we collect, use and transfer the personal data of our candidates.

title: Salesforce Technical Solution Owner
description:
Since 2021, Atos Medical is the Voice and Respiratory Care division of Coloplast A/S
  
  

Do you want to take part in our ambitious Salesforce implementation journey? Become a true trailblazer using e.g. Health cloud, B2B Commerce and OMS And are you motivated by the chance to influence the solution which will play an important role for our future strategic initiatives?
  
  

In Coloplast, we are in the exciting process of rolling out Salesforce.com globally. Currently, we are live in 30 countries with 4000+ users, with more to come. So this is not just a sales or CRM system – this is THE system. And we use it to ultimately make life easier for people with intimate health care needs.
  
  

Welcome to Atos Medical, Coloplast and the Salesforce division
  
  

From our Atos Medical office in Malmö, you will be joining our global CRM and Commercial Solutions division, anchored in our Digital, Data & IT unit. Here, 3 teams with more than 50 committed and skilled colleagues across IT and business, a perfect mix of internal and external consultants, work every day to deliver a best-in-class CRM & Commercial solution – with a solid focus on our global Salesforce implementation.
  
  

“We work in a top priority program surrounded by extremely skilled colleagues, who strive to do a little bit better every day, having fun along the way – and when you also get to make a difference for people with health care issues, it is really a great place to work,” says Head of CRM Platform and Architecture, Jacob Karlstad.
  
  

**Responsibilities:**  

* Owner and refinement responsible of technical solutions in Salesforce where we are really working in a trailblazing environment with e.g. Health Cloud, B2B Commerce, OMS, Sales Cloud, etc.
* Bridging the gap between Coloplast business capability requirements and the solutions signed off by the architects
* Bring solutions together into an end-to-end product
* Understand selected customer facing solutions
* Secure a robust, global and scalable solution serving our 4000+ users globally in 30 markets
* Making sure solutions are maintainable not only from a development perspective but also from an operational perspective.
* Be involved in- and supervise the development. In some cases, manage the configuration yourself
* Define and ensure that best practices and development principles are communicated and followed including securing that external resources deliver according to guidelines and architectural cornerflags
* Sparring with but also challenge external vendors
* Manage technical risk in development phase and in operations
* Work with PI planning and proactively contribute to the entire sprint process signing off the technical solution including test scripting and test documentation


We offer
  
* A trailblazing team using e.g., Health cloud, B2B Commerce and OMS
* Flexible international working environment
* Working with a very skilled Salesforce team in a professional set-up
* Part of a company were values matters and the focus is “….so you can be you” both from a customer focus perspective and a employee perspective


Interested?
  
If you would like to know more about the position, please contact Head of CRM Platform and Architecture, Jacob Karlstad at dkjkar@coloplast.com. We will take candidates into the recruitment process continuously, so do not hesitate to apply. This position will remain open until a suitable candidate has been found.
  
  

**Requirements:**  

* Salesforce experience is a prerequisite and preferable + 3-5 years
* Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field
* Functional development skills
* Excellent technical, diagnostic, and troubleshooting skills
* Strong communication, motivational and interpersonal skills
* Visio diagrams and presentations
* You are used to work in JIRA or similar
* Speak fluent English
* Proactive and team player with a quality mindset
* Experience with working with integration systems like ERP and Mulesoft

title: Marketing Specialist to Etac
description:
Do you want to enhance the daily lives of wheelchair users? Join us at Etac, where our website is a crucial resource for healthcare professionals adapting wheelchairs to meet individual needs. We're seeking a Product Marketing Specialist to elevate this information hub to new heights.
  
You will be part of a dedicated team at our wheelchair factory in Småland, working alongside experts committed to making a difference. Properly adjusted wheelchairs are life-changing for users, and your communication efforts will support clinicians in this vital work.
  
About Etac
  
Etac has been a world-leading developer of innovative assistive devices since 1973. Headquartered in Stockholm, Etac operates globally with around 1,400 employees, sales in over 70 countries, and annual revenue of approximately EUR 400 million. Our wheelchair manufacturing and R&D department is located in Anderstorp, Småland.
  
Your Responsibilities
  
* As a Product Marketing Specialist for Etac adult wheelchairs and wheelchair seating, you will:
* Manage the full spectrum of marketing activities, with a focus on web and digital content.
* Collaborate with Product Managers to oversee product-specific marketing.
* Work within the group marketing network to ensure corporate alignment and sharing across the entire product portfolio.


Is This You?
  
* Experience with CMS and PIM (Etac uses Optimizely and Inriver), Adobe Creative Cloud.
* Excellent written and spoken English.
* Experience in layout work from previous work or education.
* Experience in organizing photo and video shoots with external photographers. Experience in producing in-house images and videos is a plus.
* Highly organized with a track record of timely delivery.
* Ability to work independently, while also thriving in a team environment.
* Creative and able to generate ideas that meet the needs of sales teams and comply with clinical and regulatory frameworks.
* Eager to learn the intricacies of wheelchair setup and seating, recognizing the significant impact on users' lives.


How to Apply
  
Interested? Please send your application and CV in English. Submit your application by August 28th to marika.tornqvist@etac.com. Interviews will be held continuously, so please send your application as soon as possible.
  
Join us in making a difference!
  
Others of importance
  
**Location:** Anderstorp in Småland, with a partly flexible work environment.
  
**Job title:** Product Marketing Specialist, Wheelchairs and Seating
  
**Industry:** Medical Equipment Manufacturing
  
**Employment Type:** Full-time

title: Senior Project Manager - Cloud
description:
Techster Solutions befinner i dagsläget sig i en spännande tillväxtfas och söker nu fler kollegor, inledningsvis dig med minst 5+ års erfarenhet och som kan stärka teamet.
  
Du kan förvänta dig en omväxlande miljö, dagarna kan se väldigt olika ut - men en sak är säkert, här får du använda dina kompetenser och sätter själv gränsen för hur mycket du vill utvecklas. Som ett kunskapsbolag är det viktigt för oss att våra specialister delar med sig av sin kompetens och får kollegorna att växa.
  
**Rollbeskrivning:** Gå med i vårt kundteam som Projektledare för CIR (Cloud Infrastructure Readiness), där du kommer att leda samordningen av utvecklingen av tekniska kapabiliteter, plattformar och processer inom IT. CIR samordnar flera IT-domäner för att implementera tekniska kapabiliteter, plattformar och processer för att stödja applikationsutveckling och molnoperationer. Rollen innebär att möjliggöra Multi-Cloud-strategin och bygga kärnfunktioner för molnmiljöer. CIR samordnar också utvecklingen och leveransen av nödvändiga verktyg och expertis för att integrera olika SaaS-lösningar i infrastrukturen. Dessutom utvecklar och levererar CIR utbildning, procedurer och operativa modeller för att säkerställa effektiv styrning, underhåll och serviceleverans. Denna omfattande ansats säkerställer en effektiv konsumtion och hantering av hanterade molntjänster.Du kommer att arbeta med flera "tribes" och team som ansvarar för att leverera gemensamma lösningar för en molnmiljö. Det övergripande målet är uppdelat i flera kapabilitetsområden där olika underströmmar ansvarar för att driva framsteg. Vissa team och "tribes" är mogna, medan andra just tar sina första steg mot målet. Dina ansvarsområden inkluderar att driva programmet som projektledare, säkerställa nära samarbete med underströmsledare, den överordnade Cloud Transformation Initiative-programhanteringen och framför allt med våra intressenter.- Skapa och underhåll projektplan- Facilitera samarbete och leda underströmsledare- Övergripande aktiviteter: Dokumentera och övervaka strukturella och stödjande aktiviteter.- Tydlig progression: Säkerställ en tydlig övergång från oordning till struktur och framsteg.- Distribuerat ägarskap: Klargör ansvar för leverabler och uppföljning.- Nära samarbete: Etablera ett produktivt samarbete och underlätta framsteg och samordning inom strömmar, tribes och team.- Tidslinjer: Förhindra förseningar genom proaktivt engagemang med underströmsledare och styrkommitté.- Säkerställ framsteg och leverans genom ett agilt arbetssätt.Hantera möten och kommunikationKonstruktiva möten: Främja en positiv och produktiv mötesmiljö som är effektiv.Tydlig kommunikation: Förhindra förvirring och frustration genom att presentera klara budskap och strukturerade material.Statusrapportering: Rapportera framsteg, utmaningar och resurskonflikter i tid med proaktiva förslag på lösningar.Roadmaps och leverabler: Tydliga roadmaps: Sammanställ roadmaps som visar kommande och genomförda leverabler.Syftebyggd översikt: Säkerställ roadmaps anpassade till våra intressenters behov samt leveransteamens arbetssätt.Framhäv utmaningar: Dokumentera och kommunicera potentiella utmaningar.Struktur och översikt över use-cases: Tidslinjer och krav: Skapa en översikt över use-cases, deras tidslinjer och krav.Uppföljning: Implementera en strukturerad uppföljning av use-cases och deras framsteg.
  
**Krav:** - Du ska ha senioritet, driv och struktur för att självständigt navigera för att säkerställa framsteg och framgång för denna väsentliga del av molnresan.- Bevisad förmåga att driva stora program från konceptuell nivå till framgångsrik implementering.- Hantera både hög nivå av ledning och tekniska utvecklingsteam inklusive att hantera intressekonflikter.- Förmåga att paketera och presentera komplexa frågor för att göra dem förståeliga och realiserbara.- Mycket strukturerad och kunna sätta robusta strukturer som förenklar översikt, samarbete och stödjer framsteg mot målet.- Förändringsledarskap och erfarenhet av att arbeta med agila utvecklingsmetoder.- Kompetens och erfarenhet av att arbeta med traditionell infrastrukturell IT och molnbaserad IT, helst molntransformation.- Erfarenhet från banksektorn eller arbete inom reglerade företag och efterlevnadsstyrning.- Erfarenhet av att arbeta i större företag.Personliga egenskaper- Drivande ledare, samtidigt som du får andra att leverera.- Transformativt ledarskap.- Öppen och inkluderande inställning gentemot intressenter och teammedlemmar.- Bekväm att hantera komplexa frågor i en transformativ miljö där traditionell IT ifrågasätts.- Självständig, initiativtagande och lätt att skapa en helhetsbild av vad som är viktigt.Språkkunskaper: - Du är flytande i svenska och engelska.
  
  

Ansökan Tror du att du är Techster Solutions nästa stjärna? Tveka då inte att skicka in din ansökan redan nu. Urval sker löpande och tillträde sker enligt överenskommelse.
  
Arbetsplats och kulturVi är ett entreprenördrivet IT företag, med både produktkunskap och försäljning (Techster AB) och konsultativa tjänster (Techster Solutions AB). Det innebär att vi är mycket öppna för nya tekniska lösningar, kunskapsutbyte och ständigt lärande. Att ha roligt och samtidigt behålla den familjära andan utan hierarkier är lika viktigt.
  
Vi vill skapa det konsultbolag som du alltid velat jobba för, men kanske inte hittat ännu. Redan idag har vi en blandning av seniora och yngre medarbetare, såväl som män och kvinnor. Det vill vi fortsätta att bygga på. Så välkommen med din ansökan!

title: Senior Integration / BTP architect
description:
**Primary Responsibilities:**  

Senior Integration / BTP Architect
  
Design, develop, and implement SAP Cloud Integration solutions for integrating SAP and Non-SAP Applications.
  
Lead the design of Interfaces and ensure their seamless integration with various systems.
  
Provide technical leadership and guidance to the integration team.
  
Collaborate with stakeholders to understand business requirements and translate them into technical design.
  
Ensure the successful integration of SAP S4HANA with other systems in a complex, heterogenous and challenging technology environment
  
  

* Additional Responsibilities:


Leverage SAP Integration technologies like IDoc, SOAP EDI, and AIF for effective integration.
  
Stay updated with the latest trends and advancements in SAP Cloud Integration.
  
Troubleshoot and resolve any issues that arise in the SAP Cloud Integration environment.
  
Maintain the SAP BTP Environment and Integration Guardrails in the customer environment
  
  

**Requirements:**  

Several years of experience in SAP Cloud Integration.
  
Deep understanding of the SAP Integration Suite and its capabilities.
  
Must be able to work independently
  
Expertise in API development and management.
  
Proven experience in integrating SAP and Non-SAP Applications.
  
Experience or knowledge of SAP S4HANA integrations.
  
Experience with SAP Integration technologies like IDoc and SOAP EDI and AIF.
  
Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to work under pressure.
  
  

**Desirable:**  

SAP Cloud Integration certification would be a plus.
  
Experience with integrating other SAP Cloud Services is an added bonus.
  
Experience with integrating non-SAP middlewares like Apache Kafka and WSO2 API Manager is an added bonus

title: Business Analyst ERP
description:
Vår kund växer snabbt och står inför en lång och spännande resa med aktuella samhällsnyttiga projekt. På denna resa spelar IT en väsentlig roll, och de driver innovation genom agilt arbete och samarbete.
  
  

Som Business Analyst inom ERP hos vår kund kommer du att hjälpa verksamheten att skapa bästa möjliga systemlösning utifrån verksamhetens krav. Din utmaning kommer vara att säkerställa att vi har kostnadseffektiva och förvaltningsbara system som tillgodoser användarnas behov på bästa sätt. Du behöver kombinera verksamhetsförståelse och IFS-kompetens för att göra analyser och föreslå lösningar. För den här rollen letar vi efter dig som är bred inom IFS och har kunskaper som spänner över flera områden. Särskilt intressant i det här fallet är Tillverkning (Manufacturing). Det är viktigt att kunna samarbeta och hålla leveranstidplaner. Du har erfarenhet från större ERP implementationsprojekt samt erfarenhet av eller certifiering inom IFS Cloud.
  
  

**För att lyckas i denna roll behöver du:**  

Bredd inom IFS, med särskilt fokus på Tillverkning (Manufacturing)
  
Kompetens för att göra analyser, dra slutsatser och föreslå lösningar
  
Erfarenhet från större ERP implementationsprojekt
  
Erfarenhet av eller certifiering inom IFS Cloud.
  
  

Anställningsformen är ett konsultuppdrag på ca 8 månader som anställd på NXT Interim, för att sedan gå över som fast anställd direkt hos vår kund.
  
  

Befattningen kräver att du genomgår och godkänns enligt vid var tid gällande bestämmelser för säkerhetsskydd. Bakgrundskontroll och säkerhetsintervju är en del av processen, och du behöver vara svensk medborgare.
  
  

Låter detta som en intressant roll?
  
Sök redan i dag så berättar vi mer. Vi behöver en ansökan, inkluderat CV, på svenska, som matchar vår kunds önskemål. Urval och intervjuer sker löpande så vänta inte med din ansökan då anbudstiden är kort.
  
  

NXT Interim och NXT Rekrytering är ett nischat och innovativt företag som är verksamma inom konsult och rekryterings branschen. Vi är verksamma inom HR, IT, Ekonomi, Sälj och Marknad och har 20 års erfarenhet i branschen. Vi erbjuder våra konsulter bl a sjukförsäkring, remote-arbetsplatser och flera andra förmåner som förgyller deras vardag. Vid projektanställning (som i denna) tillämpar vi kollektivavtal.

title: Nätverkskonsult
description:
**Har du en teknisk bakgrund med djup förståelse kring Nät & IT infrastruktur?** **Nu söker Advitum nästa specialist inom Nätverk & säkerhet.**

**Som nätverksspecialist kommer du att spela en nyckelroll i att designa, implementera och förvalta både nya och befintliga nätverkslösningar för våra kunder. Du kommer att ha nära dialoger med kunderna för att modernisera, förbättra och effektivisera deras nät & säkerhetsarbete.**

  

Efterfrågan på våra tjänster är stor i i södra Sverige och flera av våra kunder behöver stöttning kring, digitalisering, cloud, IT-säkerhet och infrastruktur. Advitum har ledande kompetens inom områdena med några av Sveriges duktigaste specialister.


### **Ditt uppdrag**


Som konsult hos Advitum kommer du ha en viktig roll gentemot våra kunder. I rollen som konsult jobbar du primärt med att bistå, alternativt leda kunder i olika projekt såsom migreringar och vidareutveckling nät och infrastruktur.


I din roll kommer du hjälpa kunderna med uppgifter som kräver hög, teknisk kompetens. Till exempel avancerade inställningar för identitet och säkerhet. Du jobbar tekniskt i såväl projekt som i en förvaltningsverksamhet.


Du kommer vara en naturlig rådgivare och kontakt för våra kunder inom ramen för ditt kompetensområde. Rollen omfattar också arbete med teknisk design, implementation och stöttning kring förvaltning och utveckling. Tillsammans med dina kollegor utformar och driver du utvecklingen av Advitums erbjudande till våra kunder och lägger stor vikt vid omvärldsbevakning inom ditt område.


### **Vem är du?**


Vi söker en person som är öppen och social. Vi tror att du ha en gedigen erfarenhet från branschen med tydlig inriktning på nät. Du tar egna initiativ, gillar förändring och är innovativ.


Du besitter egenskaper så som nyfikenhet, målmedvetenhet och är analytisk. Vidare är du en person som är positiv och tar dig an de utmaningar som jobbet medför.

### **Kompetenser och erfarenhet**


Vi tror att du checkar in på någon eller några av dessa:

* Erfarenhet av komplexa nätinstallationer för större organisationer. Att tidigare arbetat i system som Cisco DNA Center & SD-Access är meriterande.
* Djup kunskap inom switching, routing och trådlösa nät.
* Erfarenhet av arbete med någon av våra nyckelpartners, Fortinet Cisco eller HP Aruba.
* Erfarenhet av NAC-produkter som FortiNAC eller Cisco ISE.
* Arbetat med av Fortinetprodukter som FortiAnalyzer & FortiManager.

### **Vad kännetecknar Advitum och dig?**

* Vi tycker att IT-infrastruktur är roligt och vi vill hela tiden vill utvecklas inom våra  

specialistområden.
* Det är viktigt att ha nöjda kunder och det får man genom nöjda medarbetare.
* Genomför arbetsuppgifter och projekt med engagemang och beslutsamhet med hög kvalitet.
* Samarbetar effektivt med andra och bygger goda relationer med kunder och kollegor.
* Gillar att dela med oss av kunskap och erfarenheter samt stötta våra kollegor i strävan efter att uppnå gemensamma mål.

### **Varför välja Advitum?**


Vår vision om branschens mest nöjda kunder och medarbetare är inte tomma ord på papper utan vi verkar verkligen för att alla i vår närhet skall ha det bra och trivas på jobbet.  

Vi mäter kontinuerligt våra kunders och medarbetares "nöjdhet" och agerar utefter det. Historiskt har det gått bra och vi har under flera av åren varit 100%-iga i våra enkäter och undersökningar kring medarbetarnöjdhet och kundnöjdhet. Vi använder bland annat av NetPromoterScore och EmployeeNetPromoterScore.


Hos Advitum delar vi med oss av vår kunskap, därför finns goda möjligheter för dig som strävar efter att förkovra dig och bli bättre i din yrkesroll.


Vi har ett förmånspaket med frikostigt friskvårdsbidrag, träning på arbetstid, sjukvårdsförsäkring, pensionsparande, förmånsbil, föräldrarlön mm mm.


Vi gör roliga saker utanför jobbet, kickoffer, afterwork, sport-utmaningar, vi åker på leverantörers seminarier och happenings över hela världen.


### **Det praktiska**

* Tjänsten är heltid
* Intervjuer sker löpande så vänta inte med att skicka in din ansökan!
* Körkort behörighet B
* Svenska & Engelska i tal och skrift
* Flexibilitet kring hur, vart och när du jobbar bäst

title: Senior Project Manager within Cloud
description:
**Role:**  

You will be working with multiple tribes and teams responsible for delivering common solutions for a cloud environment. The overall target is divided into several capability areas where different sub-streams are responsible to drive the progress. Some teams and tribes are mature, while others are just taking their first steps towards the goal.  

Your responsibilities will include driving the program as a project manager, ensuring tight collaboration with sub-stream drivers, the parent Cloud Transformation Initiative program management, and foremost with our stakeholders. This includes:

 **Create and Maintain Project Plan:**

* Facilitate collaboration and lead the Substream Leaders:
* Overall Activities: Document and monitor structural and supportive activities.
* Clear Progression: Ensure a clear transition from disorganization to structure and progress.
* Distributed Ownership: Clarify responsibilities for deliverables and follow-up.
* Facilitate collaboration and lead the Substream Leaders
* Close Collaboration: Establish a productive collaboration and facilitate progress and alignment within streams, tribes, and teams.
* Timelines: Prevent delays through proactive engagement with substream leaders and steering committee.
* Ensure progress and delivery through our agile way of working.
* Manage Meetings and Communication:
* Constructive Meetings: Foster a positive and productive meeting environment that is efficient.
* Clear Communication: Prevent confusion and frustration by presenting clear messages and structured materials.
* Status Reporting: Report progress, challenges, and resource conflicts in a timely manner with proactive suggestions for solutions.
* Roadmaps and Deliverables:
* Clear Roadmaps: Compile roadmaps that show upcoming and completed deliverables.
* Purpose built overview: Ensure roadmaps suited to match our stakeholders need as well as our delivery teams’ way of working.
* Highlight Challenges: Document and communicate any potential challenges.
* Structure and Overview of Use-Cases:
* Timelines and Requirements: Create an overview of use-cases, their timelines, and requirements.
* Follow-Up: Implement a structured follow-up on use-cases and their progress.

**Essential requirements:**  

* We expect you to have the seniority, drive, and structure to navigate your way independently to ensure progress and success for this essential part of our Cloud Journey.
* Proven skill to drive major programs from conceptual level to successful implementation.
* Handle both high level management and technical development teams including managing conflict of interests.
* Ability to package and present complex matters to make it understandable and realizable.
* Highly structured and able to set robust structures that simplify overview, collaboration, and support progress towards the goal.
* Change leadership skills and experience in working with agile development methods.
* Competence and experience of working with traditional infrastructural IT and Cloud based IT, preferably Cloud transformation.
* Experience in the banking sector or worked within regulatory enterprises and compliance governance.
* Experience in working in larger enterprises.

  

**Please explain how you meet all the requirements** **when applying.**

**Location:** Stockholm

title: Business Analyst
description:
#### **We're looking for a Business Analyst to uncover the insights and recommendations to help us better serve the needs of our thousands of companies and millions of users.**

### **About Kivra**

We believe that digital postal services make life easier for both the sender and the recipient, while at the same time contributing to a more sustainable world. Over 1 billion envelopes are sent through Kivra every year, in Sweden alone. We think that there’s a better, faster, more secure and more environmentally friendly way to do this. That’s why we created Kivra.

**What you'll do**


You will be part of the Data Team at Kivra. You’ll work with product and function teams (your stakeholders) to understand the nuances of their business problems and help them find the insights to solve those problems and make better decisions. You’ll have three typical responsibilities:

* Work together with your stakeholders to develop, improve, and maintain the data, dashboards, reports and visualizations they need to make good business decisions; be responsible for driving the data capabilities within your product team/domain
* As part of the Data Team, be responsible for parts of the team’s processes and/or tooling; and maintain and improve the team’s capabilities - e.g. areas could include developing and sharing best practices for how we use Tableau in the team, or suggestions on how we design parts of our data warehouse
* Support the business on larger analytics projects - either cross team analytics projects, deep-dives on particular problems, or help drive data initiatives

**Who you are**


We believe that you have the relevant experience and qualifications. You want to join a fun and friendly team, and work hands-on in a high-paced environment with fast decision making. Moreover, you are analytical and like solving problems.


Furthermore we think that you:

* Have at least 3 years of relevant experience.
* Have experience working with BI/visualization tools, e.g. Tableau, Qlik, Looker, Power BI, Mode, Data Studio etc. Our Data team uses Tableau.
* Have good knowledge and understanding of SQL.
* Are able to combine data from various data sources, and are comfortable with basic data transformations and manipulation
* Can effectively communicate your insights and analytics to stakeholders - you will often be working directly with them.

  

And it would be a bonus if:

* You have a relevant degree (e.g. statistics, business, data science, mathematics etc.)
* You are familiar with GCP and BigQuery (or any other cloud data warehouse)
* You have experience working with data transformation tools (e.g. dbt) and notebooks (e.g. Hex or Jupyter Notebook)
* You have some experience with Python
* You have worked with Amplitude, Mixpanel or similar tools for product analytics on mobile apps
* You are familiar working with GitHub
* You have some experience with A/B testing and experimentation within mobile applications

  

We believe that you, just like us, care about your teammates and thrive in a work-dynamic built on collaboration and transparent communication. You are willing to learn and develop new skills and try new approaches.


**Additional information**


The role is full-time and our offices are based in Stockholm. However, the Data Team has a hybrid work location policy - in practice this means most of the team is in the office ~2 days a week, and come into the office as required for certain workshops or important meetings/discussions.


You will be part of the Data Team and report to the manager of the Data Team. Fluency in English is required and fluency in Swedish is a plus but not required. We are unfortunately not able to sponsor new work permits, but are able to sponsor/renew existing work permits.

**We offer**


Kivra offers a place in a committed team with the opportunity for a high degree of innovation. You will be involved in influencing Kivra's exciting business and product development of a service that is currently used by more than half of Sweden's population. One of Kivra's values is happy-happy, which is also reflected in the concern for Kivra's staff. In addition to collective agreements and wellness, we offer a number of other great benefits.

**How to apply**


Easy peasy, just send in your CV and cover letter (preferably in English) as soon as possible. If you have any questions, please don’t hesitate to contact Sarah Ohlsson, Talent Acquisition Partner, at sarah.ohlsson@kivra.com.

title: Psykologer för digitala konsultationer parterapi
description:
**Var med och skapa framtidens digitala hälsotjänster!**  

Som det första företaget i Norge lanserade Eyr videokonsultering via mobil år 2016, och sedan dess har vi levererat högkvalitativa och säkra digitala hälsotjänster till över 300 000 patienter i Sverige, Norge och Danmark. Hos Eyr värnar vi om att vården ska bli bättre och mer tillgänglig för alla. Vi har utvecklat en plattform som förenklar kommunikationen mellan patient och läkare både före, under och efter konsultationen. Att arbeta som psykolog hos oss innebär banbrytande arbete både på teknisk och medicinsk nivå, där vi främjar innovation inom trygga ramar. Som konsult hos Eyr får du erfarenhet av framtidens e-hälsolösningar. Vi är ett växande företag och genom att ansluta dig nu har du möjlighet att påverka företagets framtid.

**Jobba när och var du vill**  

Som konsultpsykolog med eget företag har du möjlighet att välja var du vill arbeta, hemifrån, på stugan eller till och med utomlands.  

Arbetet på Eyr är flexibelt och kan lätt kombineras med andra tjänster. Vi tillhandahåller ett cloud-based journalsystem.

**Lite om dig**  

Du är entusiastisk inför att arbeta med digitala hälsotjänster och ser positivt på teknisk innovation inom hälsan. Du har professionell integritet, är trygg i din yrkesutövning och har god kommunikationsförmåga. Du är serviceinriktad, lösningsorienterad och strävar efter att ge patienterna en bra upplevelse.  

Vi söker legitimerade psykologer i Sverige, samt minst två års erfarenhet som psykolog med parterapi. Det är en fördel om du även har dansk eller norsk psykologlegitimation och erfarenhet, samt att du behärskar antingen norska och svenska eller danska och svenska väl.


Var med och påverka framtidens sjukvård!


Jobbtyp: Deltid


Förväntad arbetstid: 1–5 timmar per vecka


Benefits:

* Jobba hemifrån


Schedule:

  

* Dag
* Kväll
* Måndag till fredag


Arbetsort: Distans


Sista ansökningsdatum: 2024-08-14  

Förväntat startdatum: 2024-08-19

title: Wholesale A2P SMS Sales Manager - Europe
description:
IDT Corporation seeks a charismatic and well-connected **A2P SMS Sales Manager** to join its rapidly growing wholesale business team in Europe/Remote.
### **About You:**

* Your sales style is to lead with value, and you can easily navigate objections.
* Having mastered the art of the deal, you know the right time to be persistent, which questions to ask, who to engage, and how to close.
* With a proven track record in telecoms and solid experience in the messaging industry, you are eager for a new challenge with a dynamic and innovative company.
* As a result-driven professional, you also understand and appreciate the power of analytics and know-how to leverage it to your advantage.
* You have trading in your DNA, and your entrepreneurial spirit gives you the competitive edge to differentiate and generate results.
* You enjoy healthy competition and thrive on hitting and exceeding your targets.

### **Your Job Role:**

* Accelerate the growth of the messaging services unit at IDT.
* Work closely with Commercial Operations to evaluate potential providers, test routes, and identify top destinations to be promoted.
* Dynamically negotiate SMS commercials to bring the most value to IDT.
* Establish and optimize internal processes to effectively manage SMS trading and buy-sell interaction with SMS partners
* Use your industry network and expertise to identify valuable SMS partners for IDT.
* Liaise with operators, aggregators, and industry groups to position IDT as a relevant service provider in the messaging market.
* Source niche SMS service providers to fill coverage gaps and increase delivery rates in key areas.
* Develop innovative and creative SMS trading models to secure USP and sustainable revenue streams.
* Maintain the SMS partner pipeline in IDT’s CRM and keep the information accurate and up to date.
* Work closely with Product Managers to improve and diversify IDT’s messaging offering.
* Negotiate SMS service contracts and SLAs working closely with legal.
* Leverage IDT’s product portfolio to drive and develop the SMS business.
* Be a primary point of contact for Business Development agents.
* Elaborate and report SMS performance reports regularly.
* Represent IDT at industry events and conferences.

### **Your Experience:**

* At least **2 years** of experience in a **SMS sales** role in the **Telecom industry.**
* Proven track record of success.
* Strong industry contacts
* A gift for communicating efficiently and effectively
* Fluent in both written and verbal English
* French or Spanish Speaking a plus
* A demonstrated inner drive for success.
* High level of proficiency with Excel, PowerPoint, and Word.

**About us:**  

IDT is a multinational provider of cloud communications, PoS systems, unified communications, and financial services for businesses and consumers, headquartered in New Jersey. We are listed on the NYSE, employ 1600 people across 20+ countries, and have revenues over $1.5 billion.  

At IDT, we understand the challenge of being apart from those who matter most, so we create products that enable people to keep in touch and share resources worldwide.  

We are not ”another big IT corporation” – we encourage and support any in-house entrepreneurs to develop their ideas into business action. **It seems like you are interested if you are here, so let’s chat!** **PLEASE SUBMIT YOUR CV IN ENGLISH.**
company_description: IDT understands the challenge of being apart from those who matter most. We connect friends, families, and communities around the world.

title: Key Account Manager - Large Enterprise
description:
* Ansök senast: 8 september 2024
* Kista
* Hybrid
**Arbetsuppgifter**
-------------------


*Är du en nyfiken och analytisk person som trivs med att arbeta nära kunder och utveckla långvariga relationer? Vill du vara en drivande kraft i kundernas digitala utveckling med ansvar att leda, kollegor och partners i arbetet med att utveckla affären mot kund? Då kan tjänsten som Key Account Manager – Large Enterprise vara rätt för dig! Vi söker just nu en Key Account Manager som kommer att ansvara för försäljning mot våra största kunder inom Large Enterprise.*



På Tele2 Företag (B2B) arbetar vi varje dag för att möjliggöra ett samhälle med obegränsade möjligheter genom vår breda portfölj av it- och telekomrelaterade produkter och tjänster. Med ett team av kunniga experter hjälper vi kunder inom privat och offentlig sektor att digitalisera sin verksamhet, bli mer hållbara och uppnå sin affärspotential. Vi söker nu nya medarbetare till vårt framgångsrika team som bidrar till vår tillväxt, förstklassiga kundupplevelser och högt engagemang.

  


**Om rollen**  

Som Key Account Manager – Large Enterprise kommer du att ha det övergripande ansvaret för några av Tele2 Företags största kunder. Din roll är att arbeta strategiskt för att utveckla våra befintliga kunder och agera som den ”vänliga experten” i våra kunders arbete med att leverera resultat för deras verksamhet. Du kommer att ha möjlighet att erbjuda kunderna hela Tele2’s produktportfölj med avancerade nätverks-, cloud- och säkerhetslösningar samt mobilt och privata nät. Här spelar du en nyckelroll i kundernas digitala transformation med utveckling av bland annat molntjänster.
  

  

**Dina huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter inkluderar:**  

* Arbeta nära dina kunder och förstå deras verksamhet för att kunna agera som en betrodd affärspartner och bidra till deras samt Tele2´s framgång.
* Ha det kommersiella ansvaret mot kund, med hjälp av flertalet viktiga interna stödfunktioner.
* Leda det interna kontoteamet som sätts upp för respektive kund.
* Säkerställa kundnöjdhet och ge kunderna den uppmärksamhet de förväntar sig tillsammans med försäljningschef.
* Ansvara för regelbunden forecast, resultat- och budgetuppföljning.
* Ha daglig kontakt med kunder och partners.
* Använda och erbjuda hela Tele2’s produktportfölj inklusive avancerade nätverks-, cloud- och säkerhetslösningar samt mobilt och privata nät.
* Hantera många kontaktytor inom kundens organisation för att bearbeta kunden brett och skapa långsiktiga relationer på flera nivåer.
* Driva kundernas digitala transformationsresa med hjälp av exempelvis molntjänster för att skapa långsiktig kundnytta och lönsamhet.
  


**Vem är du?**  

För att du skall trivas och bli framgångsrik i denna roll ser vi att du har:
  

* Flera års erfarenhet av försäljning mot större bolag och/eller offentlig sektor.
* Erfarenhet av att ha C-level kontakt.
* God kommunikativ förmåga och är duktig på att bygga långvariga relationer.
* En god förståelse för affärsmannaskap och vikten av ekonomiska och juridiska effekter av beslut.
* Erfarenhet av försäljning av helhetslösningar inom ICT och telekom.
* Svenska och engelska obehindrat, både i tal och skrift.
  


Meriterande (ej nödvändigt):
  

* Eftergymnasial utbildning inom relevant område.
* God nätverkskunskap är en fördel.
  



Vi söker dig som är socialt anpassningsbar, strukturerad och målmedveten. Du behöver vara analytisk och kunna läsa mellan raderna för att förstå vad som verkligen händer hos våra kunder och hur vi bäst kan stötta dem. Du bör vara flexibel och ha förmågan att leda flera olika kundteam parallellt.

  

**Vi har riktigt bra förmåner**
-------------------------------


* Pension and health care
* Hybrid and flexible work life balance
* Career opportunities
* Parental benefit
* Employee benefits and Tele2 discounts
* Inclusive workplace
* Stora utbildningsmöjligheter
* Tydliga karriärvägar och utvecklingsmöjligheter
* Lön och försäkringar enligt kollektivavtal
* Generöst förmånspaket
* Inkluderande arbetskultur där alla är välkomna
* Rabatter på Tele2s produkter och tjänster
* Convenient parking next to our office in Kista
* Leading in technology
* Tjänstepension
* Möjlighet till interna karriärvägar och utveckling
* Lön och försäkringar enligt kollektivavtal
* Inkluderande arbetskultur
* Rabatter på Tele2s produkter och tjänster
* Föräldralön
**Kvalifikationer**
-------------------


**Några ord från rekryterande chef**  

Rollen som Key Account Manager – Large Enterprise är central för att Tele2 ska lyckas med sina ambitioner. Du kommer att ingå i ett team som arbetar i ett högt tempo för att hjälpa Tele2’s allra största kunder. Affärsmässighet, integritet och ett strukturerat arbetssätt är viktiga delar för att bli framgångsrik och respekterad av såväl teamet som våra kunder och partners.



**Varför Tele2**  

* På Tele2 främjar vi en kreativ och flexibel arbetsmiljö. Hos oss har vi en kultur där teamwork och inkludering leder vägen framåt och du uppmuntras att vara dig själv som den unika person som just du är.
* Varje medarbetare är viktig och varje individs arbete har en stor påverkan för företagets framgång. Vi vill att du skall växa och du ges möjligheter till utveckling genom exempelvis interna karriärvägar.
* På Tele2 arbetar vi målmedvetet varje dag för att fortsätta vara ledande inom hållbarhet, vilket har lett till att vi blivit utnämnda klimatledare i Europa av Financial Times. Vi fortsätter att uppnå nya mål och vi hjälper våra kunder att uppnå sina hållbarhetsmål eftersom vi åtagit oss att övergå till en cirkulär ekonomi.
  


**Intresse och ansökan**  

Vill du bli en del av Tele2s värderingsstyrda och inkluderande företagskultur? Tryck då på “ansök” och låt oss ta reda på om vi är en match! Om du har några specifika frågor om tjänsten är du välkommen att kontakta ansvarig rekryterare på [email protected].

  

  

Vänligen notera dock att i enlighet med hantering av personuppgifter (GDPR) har vi inte möjlighet att ta emot ansökningar via e-post. Som ett steg i rekryteringsprocessen utför Tele2 en bakgrundskontroll på aktuella slutkandidater.



**Några av våra medarbetare**
-----------------------------


Emma
Digital Capabilities & Technology
*"Everyone at Tele2 always aim for the stars in order to create unlimited possibilities."*
Marika
Head of IT Operational Excellence
*"We’re serious about what we do, and we get things done."*
Emma
Digital Capabilities & Technology
*"På Tele2 siktar vi högt för att skapa obegränsade möjligheter"*
Marika
Head of IT Operational Excellence
*"Vi är ambitiösa i det vi gör, och vi får saker gjorda."*
**Om företaget**
----------------


På Tele2 arbetar vi målmedvetet varje dag för att fortsätta vara ledande inom hållbarhet och vi har blivit utnämnda till klimatledare i Europa av The Financial Times. Vi fortsätter att uppnå nya mål och vi hjälper våra kunder att uppnå sina hållbarhetsmål eftersom vi åtagit oss att övergå till en cirkulär ekonomi.


Vi är mycket stolta över att skapa värde för våra kunder genom att vara ”pålitliga, insiktsdrivna och genom att samarbeta”. Vi kallar det “The Tele2 Way”.

title: Marketing, Business Development & Content Creator Interns - Gain Hands-On Experience at an Award-Winning Google Cloud Partner

title: Enterprise Account Executive - Talent Solutions, Nordics
description:
**Company Description**
 LinkedIn is the world’s largest professional network, built to create economic opportunity for every member of the global workforce. Our products help people make powerful connections, discover exciting opportunities, build necessary skills, and gain valuable insights every day. We’re also committed to providing transformational opportunities for our own employees by investing in their growth. We aspire to create a culture that’s built on trust, care, inclusion, and fun – where everyone can succeed.
   

  

 Join us to transform the way the world works.
   

  

**Job Description**
 This role will be based in Stockholm
   

  

 At LinkedIn, we trust each other to do our best work where it works best for us and our teams. This role offers a hybrid work option, meaning you can both work from home and commute to a LinkedIn office, depending on what’s best for you and when it is important for your team to be together.
   

  

 We are looking for a Enterprise Account Executive to join our team in tapping into potential client opportunities and generating new business with our hiring and learning solutions..
   

  

 You will be responsible for responding to inbound inquiries and proactively engaging your region with outbound activities.
   

  

 You will strategically approach target companies and teams, identify the best technology options and sell LinkedIncorporate solutions for recruitment and learning. Although you strive to meet and exceed quota, you will always act in the best interest of the client.
   

  

**Responsibilities** 
 :
   

  

* Drive sales acquisition with an ambitious approach
* Prospect relentlessly to build pipeline and build strong professional relationships with prospects
* Close new business consistently at or above quota level
* Develop and execute on a strategic plan for the territory and document and distribute competitive information
* Create reliable forecasts and maintain transparency with management regarding the pipeline status.
* Invest in colleagues and work to develop and circulate the set of best practices that will be the foundation of this team
* Listen to the needs of the market and share insights with product and marketing teams
* Be proactive about solving problems even if it’s outside of your area and be ready to take on additional initiatives and responsibilities as they emerge
* Seek out opportunities to be a leader and do everything you can to help the company achieve its larger objectives


**Qualifications**
**Basic Qualifications** 
 :
   

  

* 4+ years of applicable sales experience
* Business fluency in English


**Preferred Qualifications** 
 :
   

  

* Fluency in a Nordic language, Swedish, Finnish, Danish, Norwegian
* Experience selling IT or HR technology SaaS solutions and manage opportunities through CRM (preferably Microsoft Dynamics)
* Strong negotiation and accurate forecasting skills
* Excellent communication, client and time management, negotiation and presentation skills
* Ability to communicate effectively and build relationships with c-suite executives
* Demonstrated ability to find, manage and close high-level deals in an evangelist sales environment
* Ability to assess business opportunities and use data to inform decision making and persuade others
* Ability to manage a large number of prospect situations simultaneously while positioning company solutions against direct and indirect competitors
* Evidence of growth mindset and continued personal and professional development


**Suggested Skills:** 

  

  

* Negotiation
* Forecasting
* Communication
* Analytical Skills

title: Data Engineer
description:
***We're looking for an ambitious and driven Data Engineer to join our team in building our modern scalable data platform!***
 Two is bringing the very best of B2C e-commerce to B2B. We're passionate about building solutions that enable B2B Merchants to sell more, faster, and more efficiently. Growing 30% month-on-month, our goal is to become the world's largest B2B payment solution by 2027. We're backed by the very best VCs in the world — raised over €30m from Sequoia, Shine, Local Globe, Antler, Posten and influential angel investors in Fintech.
