 Two is built by a passionate and energetic team with second-time founders with successful exits. We are a small, but mighty team leading Two into new countries. We have a global mindset, but deeply understand local nuance. We are entrepreneurs at heart, problem-solving to launch new countries end to end. We are team players that execute diligently from ideation to reality. We believe in diversity in opinions and ideas and expect all employees to think like an owner.
   

  

**Location**
 We are seeking a candidate to join one of our offices in London, Glasgow, Oslo or Stockholm. Our work model embraces a hybrid approach, offering employees the flexibility to work both onsite and from home.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are currently looking to expand our Data Team with an experienced and ambitious Data Engineer with a passion for building a highly scalable data platform!
   

  

 You'd be joining a fast-paced Data Team whose mission is to empower business decisions by provisioning quality data information and ML Engineers by building scalable Feature Engineering platform. We have a data-driven culture and believe that data wealth and the ability to leverage it effectively is what sets us apart!
   

  

 You will be working closely with stakeholders across business divisions to enable quality decisions based on clean, trusted, and enriched data.
   

  

 This is a fantastic opportunity in one of the most exciting and fast-growing start-ups of the global Fintech industry with the mission to revolutionise B2B payments!
   

  

**What You Will Be Doing**
 The role requires a proactive and independent individual, who understands the challenges of working in a startup, wants to own the problem, and is able to design data solutions with great attention to the quality of products being delivered. Your main responsibilities will be to:
   

  

* Lead the design and implementation of a scalable and reliable data platform at Two
* Scale our Data Analytics platform across the company in the most cost-effective way
* Help establish a data culture across the business by implementing a self-serve data platform
* Build pipelines to enrich internal data with data from 3rd parties by using different integration tools such as Airflow, Airbytes, etc
* Be the key player in architecting and building our Feature Engineering and Feature Store platforms to be leveraged by the Data Science and Machine Learning teams
* Ensure quality of data delivered to end user


**Technologies We Use:**
* Our foundational core products run as micro-services on Kubernetes
* Python and Golang for our back-end applications
* PostgreSQL, BigQuery, Spark for distributed data storage and compute
* Two cloud infrastructure is hosted on Google Cloud Platform
* Our CI/CD pipeline consists of Github Actions, Helm and Terraform


**Requirements**
* 2-5 years of experience in working with the cloud platforms, ideally GCP or AWS
* Experience in designing and building data pipelines in the cloud, working experience with data integration tools or APIs ( Airflow, dbt, Fivetran, Airbytes etc.)
* Strong SQL skills and ability to tune SQL performance in RDBMS (PostgreSQL) as well as columnar store (BigQuery, Redshift)
* Strong understanding of CI/CD principals
* DevOps experience is a bonus
* Track record of successfully achieving your set goals and meeting tight deadlines
* You are ambitious, reliable, and resilient with a can-do attitude, always with a suggestion for a solution rather than just explaining a problem!


**Benefits**
* 25 days paid time off per year + public holidays 🌴
* Annual allowance to spend on anything that will contribute to your mental or physical health 🤸
* Allowance towards a phone device every 24 months (from your 6th month anniversary) 📱
* Annual allowance for learning and training 📚

title: GMP Consultant - Life Sciences (SE)
description:
***We are now looking for new colleagues who want to work together with us and develop themselves as a consultant in our wonderful Life Sciences team in the greater Stockholm-Uppsala area!***




  





 As a Life Science consultant in ALTEN, you work with different interesting customers that we support in the Pharmaceutical Industry. We aim to make a difference for our clients as well as their end users, the patients! Our clients and colleagues are located in Stockholm, Uppsala, Södertälje and Strängnäs.
 



  





 You will support our customers in different areas, depending on your experience and interest, for example: quality, validation, process, method development and project management.
 



 As a person, it is important that you are flexible, driven, accurate, efficient, helpful and structured while being social and a team player. You must be able to plan, prioritise and perform your tasks independently and in a solution-oriented way.
 



  





**Your Development** 




 As a consultant, you have a great chance to impact your own development! With some experience as a consultant, you will have great opportunities to develop into expert roles as well as working in teams and work packages.
 



  





**The role** 



* Lead, plan, and coordinate project within pharma
* Lead cross-functional and diverse teams
* Engage, apply your leadership skills and collaborate with internal and external stakeholders
* Tracking of financial aspects of the projects
* Provide documentations, reports, and presentations about project progress vs timelines
* Risk analysis and management
* Initiate and manage change management operations



  





**Essential Requirements** 
 (Education and Experience)
 


* At least Bachelor degree in a relevant science/technical field; e.g. Pharmacy, Biology, Chemistry or Engineering
* At least 4 years of experience with project management or activities as a team lead within the pharmaceutical industry
* Ability to demonstrate knowledge in GxP
* Ability to work independently under your own initiative
* Excellent communication and presentation skills
* Fluent in Swedish and English in both written and speech



  





**Valuable Qualification and Experience** 



* Project Management certificate a plus (e.g. PMP, IPMA, Prince2)
* Knowledge in SAP, LIMS, Primavera
* Knowledge of validation
* Good experience of bioprocesses
* Excellent knowledge of interpretation of the demands in Eudralex and FDA.
* Strong focus on delivering results
* Strong soft skills typically required in stakeholder engagement (empowering people, influencing, negotiation, conflict management)
* Leadership towards the product owner, development team and the wider organization



  





**About ALTEN** 




*ALTEN is one of Europe’s largest consulting companies within Engineering, IT and Life Sciences with over 54,000 employees in more than 30 countries. We’re a global actor with a local presence with 1400 committed colleagues in offices from Lund in the south to Skellefteå in the north. Our engineers carry out complex and highly technical projects throughout the product development chain of the most prestigious companies in sectors such as Automotive, Aerospace & Defense, Energy, Manufacturing, Public Sector and Life Sciences.* 




*For four years in a row, ALTEN has been named one of Sweden's most attractive employers by Karriärföretagen, an award for employers that offer unique career and development opportunities.* 




  





 Are you already imagining yourself joining our team? Good, because we can’t wait to hear from you!
 



  





***Building tomorrow's future today!***

title: Cloud Technician till Cary Group
description:
Är du kunnig inom Azure och lockas av en roll där du får omvandla teknik till nytta för verksamheten och dess användare? Lockas du av en roll där du får vara ansvarig för att leda och designa infrastrukturen?
   

  

 Då kan rollen som Cloud Technician på Cary Group passa dig väl!
   

  

**DIN VARDAG**
 Som Cloud Technician är du en viktig del i våra nya och befintliga IT projekt.
   

  

 Du är ansvarig för att proaktivt leda, motivera och utmana kunder i projekt och hjälpa dem att omvandla teknik till nytta för vår verksamhet och dess användare.
   

  

 I rollen förväntas du också att utföra design av arkitektur och förstudier, tekniska implementationer, dokumentation och andra kringliggande uppgifter. För att lyckas i din roll förväntas du ha en kunskap om teknisk arkitektur som inkluderar både det tekniska och det affärsmässiga.
   

  

 Som Cloud Technician skall du vara med och utveckla Azure som affärsområde i samråd med de andra affärsområdena, med fokus på att hitta synergier mellan teamen för att skapa en optimerad process från kundförfrågan till avslutat projekt och förvaltning av kund i vår interna miljö.
   

  

 Du skall också:
   

  

* Ha ansvar för att leda och designa infrastruktur, fatta beslut om korrekt design och implementering av Azure.
* Designa en innovativ och praktisk strategi som står för en helhetslösning i linje med våra affärsmål.
* Hålla dig uppdaterad på förändringar i mjukvara och teknik som är mest relevant för verksamheten, och främjar användningen av nya lösningar för att maximera effektivitet, tillförlitlighet och värde.
* Planera och genomföra workshops internt och med samarbetspartners och leverantörer.
* Agera mentor och träna juniora tekniker samt granska arbete som utförs så arbetet håller högsta kvalitet.
* Ansvara för att dokumentera intern miljö.
* Utföra supportärenden som eskalerats till 3rd-line.
* Agera betrodd rådgivare till vår verksamhet och säkerhetsställa att vi håller högsta kvalitet i vår leverans -innan, under och efter projekt.
* Omvärldsbevakning- hålla dig uppdaterad om det senaste från Microsoft och andra leverantörer.


**VEM ÄR DU?**
 Vi letar efter dig som har goda kunskaper inom IT-infrastrukturteknologier och Microsoft Azure. Du har tidigare erfarenhet av leverantörstsyrning i en beställaroll och trivs i en roll med fokus på affärsnytta och användarvänlighet.
   

  

 Du skall också ha:
   

  

* God problemlösningsförmåga och god analytisk förmåga.
* Utmärkta kommunikations- och samarbetsförmågor och trivas med samarbete i team.
* Starkt tekniskt intresse och hålla sig uppdaterad på nya teknologier och bäst praxis.
* Tala och skriva flytande svenska och engelska.


 Det är meriterande om du har kännedom om ITIL (Information Technology Infrastructure Library) principer och praxis för IT-tjänstehantering.
   

  

 Som person ser vi att du är ansvarstagande och proaktiv. Du har lätt för att anpassa dig och vara flexibel i ditt sätt, och trivas med ansvar för IT-driften. Rollen kräver också att du är kundorienterad och trivs med att ge god service och support till användarna.
   

  

**OM CARY GROUP**
 Välkommen till
 **Cary Group** 
 – en snabbväxande internationell koncern med den perfekta mixen av entreprenöriell anda och trygg struktur. Vi är en av marknadsledarna i Sverige, Danmark, Norge, Storbritannien, Spanien, Portugal, Tyskland, Österrike, Luxemburg och Belgien inom reparation och byte av fordonsglas med ett kompletterande erbjudande inom reparation av plåt- och lackskador. Vi erbjuder tjänster som förlänger fordonens livslängd och bibehåller deras säkerhetsfunktioner, och vi strävar alltid efter att reparera i stället för att byta ut. Cary Group har under de senaste åren vuxit snabbt, bl.a. via förvärv både internationellt och nationellt. Med närhet till kunden, högkvalitativa produkter och smarta lösningar hjälper vi kunden att göra enkla och hållbara val.
   

  

 Vi månar om vår varma, inkluderande kultur och investerar i aktiviteter och event för att stärka vårt team.
   

  

 Vårt kontor är beläget i Hammarby sjöstad i Stockholm.
   

  

 För mer information besök, Hem - Cary Group
   

  

**ANSÖKAN & KONTAKT**
 I denna rekrytering samarbetar Cary Group med Wise IT. Om du vill veta mer om jobbet, kontakta ansvarig rekryteringskonsult, Sandra Åhs, på sandra.ahs@wiseit.se. Wise IT kan tyvärr inte ta emot ansökningar via e-post, då vi värnar om din personliga integritet.
   

  

 Du kan läsa mer om hur vi behandlar personuppgifter enligt GDPR i Wise Group-koncernens policy för behandling av personuppgifter. Urval för tjänsten sker löpande.
   

  

 Urval och intervjuer sker löpande.
   

  

 Välkommen med din ansökan!

title: Application Support Engineer, Totogi (Remote) - $60,000/year USD
description:
Crossover is the world's #1 source of full-time remote jobs. Our clients offer top-tier pay for top-tier talent. We're recruiting this role for our client, Totogi. Have you got what it takes?
   

  

 In the telecommunications industry, operational inefficiency and customer dissatisfaction are persistent issues, exacerbated by the complexity and volume of tasks that must be managed manually. Studies show that companies spend up to 30% of their operational budgets on manual task management, often resulting in service downtime and frustrated customers.
   

  

 Totogi is revolutionizing this landscape by leveraging cutting-edge, AI-driven systems to automate these tasks, significantly enhancing operational efficiency and customer satisfaction. By integrating advanced AI technology with deep technical expertise, we are not just solving problems reactively but proactively reshaping the entire support process. This approach is exciting because it sets a new standard in customer service efficiency and technical integration, making us a leader in the industry.
   

  

 This role is designed for those who thrive in high-tech, innovative environments. It is not a traditional engineering or support role; instead, it combines hands-on technical work with advanced AI tools to proactively optimize and automate complex support tasks. If you excel at scripting, system configuration, and deep technical troubleshooting, and are excited by the prospect of continuously improving processes through technology, this job is for you.
   

  

 In this role, you will be a crucial part of our dynamic team, implementing and managing AI-driven systems to enhance operational efficiency and customer satisfaction. You will configure and maintain network functions to ensure seamless service delivery, analyze data to derive actionable insights, and manage incidents to ensure timely resolution. Your work will directly contribute to our strategic decisions and elevate our customer support to new heights. If you are ready to empower your career with advanced AI technology and make a significant impact, we encourage you to apply and join our forward-thinking team.
   

  

**What You Will Be Doing**
* AI System Building: Designing and implementing AI-driven systems and monitoring tools to enhance operational efficiency.
* Service Configuration and Maintenance: Using AI tools to configure AAA, PCRF, SMSC, and MMSC network functions, ensuring seamless service delivery and customer satisfaction.


**What You Won’t Be Doing**
* Answering the same questions over and over again
* Providing trivial or basic troubleshooting
* Writing knowledge base articles


**Application Support Engineer Key Responsibilities**
* Enhance operational efficiency and customer satisfaction by optimizing and automating tasks using AI-driven systems and advanced technical skills


**Basic Requirements**
* Experience working with the following Telco network functions: AAA/PCRF/SMSC/MMSC
* Solid understanding of Radius, Diameter, SS7, and IMAP protocols
* Proficiency in Linux and Kubernetes
* Professional experience using generative AI tools (e.g. ChatGPT, Gemini, Claude) to boost productivity


**About Totogi**
 Totogi is focused on building telco software for the public cloud and is completely redefining how carriers engage with their subscribers to drive customer love! We are a product-driven telco software company made up of some of the best minds from the telecoms industry and the brightest engineering talent across the globe. Change the game with us.
   

  

 There is so much to cover for this exciting role, and space here is limited. Hit the Apply button if you found this interesting and want to learn more. We look forward to meeting you!
   

  

**Working with Crossover**
 This is a full-time (40 hours per week), long-term position. The position is immediately available and requires entering into an independent contractor agreement with Crossover. The compensation level for this role is $30 USD/hour, which equates to $60,000 USD/year assuming 40 hours per week and 50 weeks per year. The payment period is weekly. Consult www.crossover.com/help-and-faqs for more details on this topic.
   

  

**What to expect next:**
* You will receive an email with a link to start your self-paced, online job application.
* Our hiring platform will guide you through a series of online “screening” assessments to check for basic job fit, job-related skills, and finally a few real-world job-specific assignments.


**Important!** 
 If you do not receive an email from us:
   

  

* First, emails may take up to 15 minutes to send, refresh and check again.
* Second, check your spam and junk folders for an email from Crossover.com, mark as “Not Spam” since you will receive other emails as well.
* Third, we will send to whatever email account you indicated on the Apply form - by default, that is the email address you use as your LinkedIn username and it might be different than the one you have already checked.
* If all else fails, just reset your password by visiting https://www.crossover.com/auth/password-recovery if you already applied using LinkedIn EasyApply.


 Crossover Job Code: LJ-5281-SE-Stockhol-ApplicationSup.004

title: Data Scientist - Acceleration Nordics
description:
**Welcome to join an experienced and growing team of Data scientists and Consultants who work to drive increased marketing effectiveness for some of Sweden's and the world's largest brands.**
 As part of the leading media agency group GroupM, we at Acceleration work to transform large amounts of data into solutions to complex problems in media and marketing. The projects include a broad mix of econometrics, media buying algorithms, dashboards and strategy projects/consulting services.
   

  

 Acceleration drives GroupM and the rest of the industry forward through technology and data innovation and works closely with the largest advertisers, publishers and technology companies in the industry. This is a position with a plethora of opportunities for growth both professionally and personally.
   

  

**About The Position**
 The position includes working in a team with experienced colleagues:
   

  

* Be a driven data scientist for projects in econometrics, attribution, experiments, algorithms and other data science-related projects
* Together with the rest of the project team, analyze, package and present to our customers
* Participate in and drive development projects within automated reporting, algorithms and other data science commitments


**Professional And Personal Qualifications**
 We are a team with entrepreneurial drive. Professionally, we believe that you are a recent graduate or have worked for a number of years in data science or analysis with the following skills:
   

  

* Education with a solid foundation in mathematics and statistics (e.g. MSc in mathematics, industrial economics, alternatively economist or statistician)
* Experience with PowerPoint
* Experience in project management
* Ability to present and communicate your results in a convincing manner
* Knowledge of different Excel, R, PowerBI is an advantage (but not a requirement)
* Knowledge of applications within Cloud environments is an advantage (but not a requirement)
* Knowledge of the ecosystem for digital media and environments within, for example, Google Marketing Platform, Facebook and Xandr is an advantage (but not a requirement)


**On a personal level, we believe you are interested in:**
* Present and communicate your results to relevant stakeholders
* Drive dialogues and deliver projects in both Swedish and English
* Work thoroughly, detail-oriented and independently (proactive and entrepreneurial)
* Be a "team player" with a willingness to work both individually and in a team


**Our offer**
 With us, you get the opportunity to work with many of Sweden's and the world's most ambitious brands, together with a team that is passionate about digital marketing, and with market-leading technologies.
   

  

 You will sit in central premises on Birger Jarlsgatan with inspiring colleagues from different backgrounds, who together drive digital marketing to the next level through innovation and solid work. Furthermore, there are great opportunities for personal development and career development within GroupM Sweden, as well as within our global network.
   

  

 We are part of WPP, a large international group, and we work to combine the best of these two worlds. You are offered to work in a stimulating and developing workplace with a high comfort factor and colleagues who are close to laughing.
   

  

 In addition to the obvious, such as good working conditions, pleasant working environment and exciting challenges, there are a couple of things that make working here a little extra good:
   

  

* Great participation and opportunity to be involved and influence your daily work
* Family spirit, short decision-making paths and great closeness between management and employees
* We think that a balance between work, leisure and personal development is important
* Wellness allowance of SEK 3,000/year and several attractive staff benefits
* We offer market-adapted pension terms and private pension advice via our partner Nordea
* We have occupational health care via Feelgood and additional health insurance via Euro Accident
* Conferences, kick-offs and other fun that we do together
* Office centrally located in the middle of Stockholm city on Birger Jarlsgatan


**Application**
 The position is a full-time permanent position with entry as soon as possible. We apply a six-month probationary period.
   

  

 Selection and interviews take place continuously, so submit your application with CV and personal letter as soon as possible.
   

  

**Contact**
 If you have questions about the position, you are welcome to contact Filip Stjernfeldt, Senior Data Scientist & Team Lead at filip.stjernfeldt@groupm.com. We do not accept applications via e-mail.
   

  

**About GroupM**
 GroupM is one of Sweden's largest media agency groups and consists of Wavemaker, EssenceMediacom, Mindshare, Nexus and Acceleration. GroupM's primary goal is to create benefits for our clients through collaborations with the group's agencies. We do this, among other things, through economies of scale in trading, technology and data. We are part of WPP, which is one of the world's largest groups in marketing communications with over 190,000 employees on a global basis. GroupM Sweden has around 375 employees in Stockholm, Gothenburg, and Malmö.

title: SCADA System Integrator
description:
Veritaz is a leading IT staffing solutions provider in Sweden, committed to advancing individual careers and aiding employers in securing the perfect talent fit. With a proven track record of successful partnerships with top companies, we have rapidly grown our presence in the USA, Europe, and Sweden as a dependable and trusted resource within the IT industry.
 



  





**Assignment Description:** 





 We are looking for a Senior SCADA System Integrator to join our dynamic team.
 




  





**What You Will Work On:** 



* Participate in new development, maintenance, and daily operation of the customer's SCADA system.
* Set up databases and perform data analysis.
* Work with virtualization and network configuration.
* Identify and implement improvement actions to enhance system performance.
* Collaborate with your team to ensure projects are delivered on time, meet quality requirements, and stay within budget.



**What You Bring:** 



* At least five years of experience in SCADA system integration with solid competence in Citect.
* Fluency in Swedish, both spoken and written.
* Flexibility and a problem-solving mindset.
* Enjoyment of being in dynamic environments where things are happening.
* A positive and open attitude, with excellent communication skills.
* A high degree of service orientation and team collaboration.

title: Principal Solution Architect (Nordics & Benelux)
description:
**Description**
 What makes us Qlik?
   

  

 A Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ Leader for 13 years, Qlik transforms complex data landscapes into actionable insights, driving strategic business outcomes.
   

  

 Serving over 40,000 global customers, our portfolio leverages pervasive data quality and advanced AI/ML capabilities that lead to faster and better decisions.
   

  

 We excel in integration and governance solutions that work with diverse data sources. Our real-time analytics uncover hidden patterns, empowering teams to address complex challenges and seize new opportunities.
   

  

 The Solution Architect Role
   

  

 Are you ready for a role with diverse responsibilities, constant excitement, and the opportunity to work closely with our largest regional customers and partners?
   

  

 As a Solutions Architect at Qlik, you'll be a key player in our Sales Organization, collaborating with various teams and staying at the forefront of the latest developments in the Data, Analytics, and AI market. If you thrive in a dynamic, agile work environment and are motivated by technical challenges, this position might be the perfect fit for you!
   

  

 What makes this role interesting?
   

  

* Take complete ownership of technical relationships and the sales cycle by effectively showcasing the technical and business value of Qlik's next-generation data analytics, ML/AI, and data integration platform to customers, partners, and internal teams.
* Engage with key customer stakeholders through exceptional solution presentations and custom demonstrations. Position proposed solutions to technical, end-users, operations, and senior management staff.
* Stay informed about Qlik's latest product developments and competitors in the Data, Analytics & AI market. Work closely with Sales, Marketing, Customer Success, Product, R&D, and Consulting teams.


**Here's How You'll Be Making An Impact**
* Technical Ownership: Demonstrate end-to-end ownership of technical relationships and the technical sales cycle.
* Sales Qualification: Contribute to the technical qualification and closure of sales opportunities, predominantly involving Qlik's Data Integration, Automated Machine Learning, and AI platform. Collaborate


 with colleagues to address customers' data integration and governance requirements utilizing Qlik Talend Data Integration solutions.
   

  

* Presales Activities: Engage in initiatives to boost regional revenue, delivering outstanding solution presentations and tailored demonstrations.
* Solution Positioning: Present potential solutions to stakeholders within the prospect's or Qlik partner's organization.
* Proof-of-Concept Execution: Execute Proof-of-Concepts successfully to demonstrate the value of Qlik's solutions to potential customers.
* Regional Business Development: Support regional business development activities, such as marketing events, trade shows, and partner events.
* Internal Enablement and Content Creation: Create valuable content for our team and across teams. This could include writing white papers, community articles, customer success stories, etc.


**We're Looking For a Teammate With The Following**
* 3-5 years of experience in a Presales, Consulting, or similar technical capacity
* Excellent communication skills to convince both business and technical audiences
* Highly driven with strong interpersonal skills. Proven track record of developing relationships at technical, commercial, and executive levels throughout large enterprises
* Experience in BI, data visualization, and analytics. Proficient with cloud solutions like SaaS, PaaS, and iPaaS.
* Strong knowledge of areas like Data Integration (ETL/ELT), Data Warehousing, APIs, Data Quality, and Data Governance
* Ability to work independently and manage multiple complex opportunities
* Previous experience with Data Integration products is a strong advantage.
* Proficient knowledge of web development technologies such as JavaScript, HTML5, .NET, and Python is beneficial.
* A solid understanding of Machine Learning tools and Generative AI concepts is advantageous.
* Expertise in Cloud technologies, including certifications for specific hyperscalers (AWS, Azure, GCP), is a plus.
* This position requires willingness and ability to travel.
* Fluent in one of the Nordic languages and English


 The location for this role is:
   

  

 The role is located in Stockholm.
   

  

**More About Qlik And Who We Are**
 Find out more about life at Qlik on social media: Instagram, LinkedIn, YouTube, and X/Twitter. To see all other opportunities to join us and learn about our values, check out our Careers Pag e.
   

  

 What else do we offer?
   

  

* Genuine career progression pathways and mentoring programs
* Culture of innovation, technology, collaboration, and openness
* Flexible, diverse, and international work environment


 Giving back is a massive part of our culture. Alongside an extra "change the world" day plus another for personal development, we also highly encourage participation in our Corporate Responsibility Employee Programs.
   

  

 If you need assistance applying for a role due to a disability, please email your request to accessibility @ qlik.com. Any information you provide will be treated according to Qlik's Recruitment Privacy Notice. Qlik may only respond to emails related to accommodation requests.
   

  

 Qlik is not accepting unsolicited assistance from search firms for this employment opportunity. Please, no phone calls or emails. All resumes submitted by search firms to any employee at Qlik via email, the Internet, or in any form and method without a valid written search agreement for this position will be deemed the sole property of Qlik. No fee will be paid if Qlik hires the candidate due to the referral or through other means.

title: Information Technology Application Specialist
description:
*Do you want to work for a company with a vision to create a more productive and sustainable world?* 




*Are you an experience IT Application Specialist with a drive to develop your skills?* 




*Keep on reading as we might just have the opportunity for you!* 




  





**ABOUT THE COMPANY** 




 Linde is a leading global industrial gases and engineering company. Linde live their mission of making our world more productive every day by providing high-quality solutions, technologies and services which are making their customers more successful and helping to sustain, decarbonize and protect our planet.
 



 Linde's industrial gases and technologies are used in countless applications including production of clean hydrogen critical for the energy transition, life-saving medical oxygen and high-purity & specialty gases for electronics, among others. For over 50 years, Linde has been a global leader in hydrogen and is leveraging its engineering capabilities, along with a significant asset base and expertise, to make cleaner energy a reality worldwide.
 



 Read more about Linde
 **here** 
 .
 



  





  





**ABOUT THE ROLE** 




 As IT Application Specialist at Linde Gas you will be responsible for two platforms. Your work tasks will include:
 


* Provide 2nd line support in conjunction with application owners.
* Undertake required maintenance activities for your platforms.
* Define and enforce development guidelines for the platforms.
* Manage development enhancements once approved.
* Ensure all new applications are registered in the application portfolio and undertake a service transition review before they go live.
* Ensure suitable knowledge transfer is undertaken for applications developed with external partners.



  





  





**WHO ARE YOU?** 




 To be successful in this role we believe that you are/have:
 


* A relevant post-secondary education within IT
* Minimum 2 years experince in application development
* Experience in managing IT development/enhancement, preferable related to SAP
* A wide understanding of IT technologies, preferable including Java, JavaScript and/or Azure
* Fluent in English, both verbally and written. Swedish knowledge is benefical.



 But most importantly we believe that you are/have:
 


* Able to work
 **independently** 
 in a virtual organisation and to take
 **responsibility** 
 of your tasks.
* A good
 **cooperation** 
 and
 **communication** 
 with internal customers, peers and suppliers.
* A
 **structured** 
 approach to tasks and
 **positive attitude.**



  





  





 Does this sound like you? Great, we look forward to your application.
 



  





**OTHER INFORMATION** 




**Start:** 
 Autumn 2024
 



**Location:** 
 Stockholm, Solna
 



**Type of employment:** 
 Fulltime employment directly with Linde Gas.
 



 The recruitment process is managed by A-hub. Therefore, Linde Gas requests that all inquiries regarding the position be directed to A-Hub.

title: Full Stack Engineer
description:
Sinch is a global leader in the growing market for Communication Platforms as a Service (CPaaS) and mobile customer engagement. We are specialists in allowing businesses to reach everyone on the planet, in seconds or less, through mobile messaging, email, voice, and video.
   

  

 With presence in more than 50 countries, whether you know us or not, you've definitely used our tech. We reach every phone on earth, with over 147 billion conversations every year.
   

  

 Sinch's core values are Make it Happen, Dream Big, Keep it Simple and Win Together. These values describe how our global organization works and inspire every of our more than 3,000 employees across 55 different countries.
   

  

**Requirements**
**Role and Responsibilities**
 Develop, architect and scale the core infrastructure for Sinch's web applications. Be part of in a small cross functional team that sets its own objectives and goals with responsibility for every stage of product development life cycle from planning and design to implementation, testing, deployment, monitoring and maintenance, you build It you run it.
   

  

 Your work will be focused around the common platform used to that makes up the core of the product line; The code you write will be consumed by used by many different teams and is a key enabler in the product line. You will solve problems across the enterprise, focusing not only on how to deliver a great product today but setting the foundations for the future.
   

  

 Tech Stack: NodeJS, Java, React, Typescript
   

  

**Please apply your resume in English!**
**In Order To Contribute To This Role, You Have**
* A strong software engineering background
* In-depth knowledge of the web platform and ecosystem
* Expertise in modern front-end technologies.
* Solid track record working with Typescript in a professional or open-source setting.
* Experience building services on the backend
* Fluency in English


**Big Plus!**
* Experience using design systems
* Experience making architectural decisions that have high impact
* Experience with Web components and the latest Web APIs
* Experience with AWS, Kubernetes and other cloud native technologies
* Experience with Server side rendering technologies such as Next.js


**Benefits**
 Sinch is a global company composed of people from different countries and cultures. Our benefits adjust regionally to support employees and help them to thrive in every stage of life. We offer valuable benefits and resources, including health and life insurance, a flexible work environment, retirement savings plans, and more.
   

  

**Our Hiring Process**
 In Sinch, we are committed to following a recruitment process that is fair, objective, consistent, and non-discriminatory. Our Talent Acquisition team, together with hiring managers and the rest of the interviewing team, persistently work towards identifying the candidates that best fit each open job, based on Sinch' s hiring needs and candidates' career expectations.
   

  

 We encourage applications from strong candidates with relevant professional backgrounds for this role. Not all applicants will meet all job requirements exactly! Even if you do not meet all job requirements, don't let that stop you from considering Sinch for the next step in your career. We are always open to candidates that could bring new ideas and perspectives to Sinch!e

title: Manager - Enablement Team, AI and embedded software
description:
Work at the heart of the Industry 5.0 transformation – the integration of artificial intelligence, robotics and the human factors of manufacturing - as manager for a multinational research and development team in Sickla!
   

  

 Our systems empower industry users to control their assembly process and create world class products. The solutions we develop are used to improve efficiency, quality, safety, speed, ergonomics, and environmental performance.
   

  

**Your role**
 As our new Team Manager for the Enablement Team, you coach, develop and inspire a highly skilled team and ensure the development of software for a broad range of products and systems. The team is part of a larger agile initiative with cross-functional teams in Stockholm and Auburn Hills, MI, USA.
   

 Together with your team, you:
   

  

* Create a motivating and learning environment where people grow.
* Push the boundaries on how we utilize the latest advancements in AI internally.
* Cooperate with Marketing and other R&D teams to develop customer centric solutions.
* Drive efficiency and quality improvements on our products.
* Drive initiatives to continuously improve our way of working - collaborations and processes.


 Station Critical Software consists of eight teams with the mission to secure and govern our software platforms, the foundation for the next generation of controllers and tools. You report to the Manager of the Station Critical Software Department and is part of the management team.
   

  

**City:** 
 Nacka, Stockholm. We have a hybrid workplace. A few trips abroad are included in the position.
   

  

**You will need**
 You have a technical academic degree, or equivalent, and have experience in software development for complex or large embedded industrial systems. You have experience from leading teams as manager or project leader. Experience of product development, industrial production, marketing and working with Inclusion & Diversity is a plus. Good communication skills and a genuine interest in leadership are important. You have an entrepreneurial mindset, are solution oriented and have a sense of urgency.
   

  

**We offer you**
 At Atlas Copco, we have a friendly atmosphere and a culture known for respectful interaction and ethical behavior. We value personal development and wellbeing, and we are proud of how we help and support each other. We offer opportunities to see your ideas realized and make an impact. As part of the Atlas Copco Group, you have access to global job opportunities.
   

 You are welcome to contact recruiting manager Tobias Söreling, [email protected] , for more information. We are looking forward to your application via our job site!
   

  

 As part of the selection process, Atlas Copco Industrial Technique AB may perform a background check on final candidates.
   

  

**Diverse by nature and inclusive by choice**
 Bright ideas come from all of us. The more unique perspectives we embrace, the more innovative we are. Together we build a culture where difference is valued and we share a deep sense of purpose and belonging.

title: Sales Enablement Manager
description:
**Xensam: SAM Disrupters** 




 Xensam is the leading provider of AI-powered, cloud-hosted Software Asset Management technology. We’re looking for key players to join us as we scale our impact and build the Xensam team together. We take our culture seriously and strive to maintain the excellence, energy & enthusiasm that flows through the organization today.
 



  





 We look for candidates who are passionate about what they do and ready to work the Xensam way. We know that experience counts, but we also know that it’s you, the person behind the experience, that makes it count.
 



  





**About the role** 




 Our Sales Enablement Manager plays an important role in optimizing our sales team's performance by developing and enabling tools, and processes that increase efficiency and effectiveness. This position is responsible for creating and delivering training programs, managing sales content, and ensuring our sales team has the necessary resources to succeed in our competitive marketplace.
 



  





**Responsibilities** 



* **Training & Development:** 
 Design, develop, and deliver comprehensive sales training programs that enhance the skills, knowledge, and performance of our sales team. Establish and promote sales best practices and ensure training is aligned with our business goals and sales objectives.
* **Content Management:** 
 Develop and maintain a global storage of sales materials, including case studies, product information, onboarding material, and sales scripts. Ensure content is up-to-date, relevant, and accessible.
* **Collaboration with Sales & Marketing:** 
 Work closely with sales and marketing teams to ensure alignment on messaging, lead generation activities, and content creation.
* **Sales Onboarding:** 
 Develop and execute onboarding plans and material for new sales hires ensuring they are equipped with the knowledge and tools needed to succeed from day one.



  





**Qualifications** 



* Bachelor's degree in Business, IT, or related field.
* 1-2 years of experience as a trainer for sales teams, preferably in the tech industry.
* Highly organized individual with experience in project management.
* Can effectively teach with a pedagogical approach and remarkable patience.
* Excellent communication skills in fluent English.
* Bonus points for knowledge of Software Asset Management/software licensing.



  





**What we offer** 



* A dynamic role that focuses on "freedom under responsibility"
* 3 days in-office schedule (remote Mondays & Fridays)
* A generous work culture with free access to beverages & snacks, gym, bi-weekly massages at the office, shuffleboard, and other games etc.
* If sales targets are met, an annual destination trip awaits all employees
* Work with a diverse group driven by ambition as well as having fun together with different activities
* Great opportunity to influence your career development as well as the company's
* Work with the latest technology in the fastest-growing SAM software in the market



  





**At Xensam, our core values define our workplace atmosphere** 




**REBELLIOUS** 
 We foster a rebellious spirit, promoting freedom within responsibilities and encouraging initiative.
 



**HUMANE** 
 Our team promotes a caring, inclusive environment where diversity is valued, and individuals are respected and empowered to be themselves.
 



**HARMONIOUS** 
 We prioritize harmony, valuing work-life balance, and creating a pleasant atmosphere.
 



  





 Join Xensam for a balanced, collaborative, and caring workplace. If you're a team player eager to grow professionally,
 **APPLY now!**

title: Business Solutions Consultant
description:
At Volue we are realizing the Green Transition. Our mission is to provide innovative services critical to society, unlocking a cleaner, better and more profitable future. Working towards this goal, Volue has become a leading technology supplier and enabler of the green transition, helping energy companies simplify and optimize everyday operations.
 



 We are now looking for a Senior Business Solution Consultant to join our team in Volue who can help us to continuously improve Volue’s ability to provide value to customers in line with the Volue mission. In this area, we deliver a comprehensive suite of decision support tools for power production planning, optimization and trading to energy companies in more than 20 countries.
 



 In this role, you will enable energy companies to use their resources most efficiently by utilizing Volue software solutions. In order to achieve this, you will be working together with other Volue consultants and customers worldwide on our software delivery projects.
 



 Senior Business Solution Consultant role involves frequent and close customer and internal contact (Sales, Product Management, Development, Support) regarding software solutions.
 



 Therefore, we are looking for communicators and explorers, who know their way around technology and energy.
 



  





**What you will be doing to make a difference:** 




  




* Understanding what our customers’ needs, challenges and requirements are.
* Configuring our software according to the customer's needs
* Assessing clients' current processes, systems, and workflows and setting up the customer’s business processes in our tools
* Facilitating integration with the customers’ other IT solutions
* Attending customer meetings and workshops
* Supporting Project Managers and Product Managers on the necessary
* Contributing to closing sales cases by estimating new projects, running demos, giving input to solution design



  





**What you need to succeed:** 




  




* Min. 3+ years of experience within energy sector
* Knowledge about European power markets
* Experience with software implementation and project management
* Ability to build and maintain strong client relationships
* Experience with facilitating workshops tailored to customer needs
* Proactivity and ability to manage own workload and work in the team
* In addition, it would be valuable if you have experience with leading teams, but it is not a must.



  





**Reasons to join Volue team and what we offer:** 




  




* Large degree of influence in shaping and developing the role further
* Exciting position with the newest technology for the energy business
* Great colleagues in one of Europe’s most exciting green tech companies with innovative and international work environment
* Flexible working hours
* Competitive compensation package



  





 In Volue, we cherish each employee’s competence, ideas and personality. Let your skills and talent be a part of our team – and let us leave our mark on the world together!
 



  





**Company Culture** 




  





 In Volue, we believe that in order to be a successful company, we need to bring everyone to the table.
 



 We look at diversity as a competitive advantage. A diverse workforce enables better decision-making and creates more value. By inclusion, we refer to the sense of belonging and being part of a community at work. We want the people of Volue to feel welcome, valued and not least encouraged to bring their whole, unique selves to work.
 



 Volue is about people. From staff to client, people are at the center of all our operations, and we always strive for a flat structure where everyone feels included, appreciated and recognized for their individual efforts. Or as we call it "ONE Volue". We hire talented individuals, regardless of gender, race, ethnicity, ancestry, age, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, cultural background or religious beliefs.

title: Channel Sales Executive, GFI Software (Remote) - $60,000/year USD
description:
Crossover is the world's #1 source of full-time remote jobs. Our clients offer top-tier pay for top-tier talent. We're recruiting this role for our client, GFI Software. Have you got what it takes?
   

  

 Are you ready to step into the future of sales and channel management? The channel management industry often grapples with inefficiencies in scaling operations, maintaining consistent growth, and effectively integrating technology to enhance partner interactions. Many companies still rely on traditional methods that lack data-driven decision-making and advanced analytical capabilities.
   

  

 At GFI, we revolutionize this space by integrating Generative AI across all facets of our channel management processes. Our cutting-edge approach not only optimizes operations but also drives sustained revenue growth by enhancing the efficiency and effectiveness of our network of distributors, resellers, and MSPs. This is an electrifying opportunity to be at the forefront of tech-driven sales innovation, leveraging AI to transform standard practices into dynamic, strategic engagements that deliver measurable results.
   

  

 This role is not your typical channel sales role. You will be expected to master and deploy Generative AI tools, ensuring our partnerships are not just maintained but also optimized and expanded through strategic data-driven methodologies. Your work will involve rigorous partner recruitment, dynamic training sessions, and stringent performance assessments—all enhanced by advanced AI.
   

  

 You'll fit into a team of forward-thinkers where each member is crucial in sculpting the future landscape of channel sales. Your role is pivotal in shaping how partnerships flourish in a tech-driven environment, ensuring both the growth of GFI and our partners. If you are eager to redefine industry standards and possess a robust blend of GenerativeAI proficiency, professional communication, and channel sales management, we encourage you to apply. Join us in transforming the blueprint of channel management and take your place as a leader in a cutting-edge sales revolution.
   

  

**What You Will Be Doing**
* Partner Recruitment and Onboarding: Identifying, recruiting, and onboarding new partners to expand the channel network. This involves evaluating potential partners' alignment with the company's values and goals, as well as their market reach and capabilities.
* Training and Development: Providing partners with the necessary training and resources to effectively sell and support the product. This includes product training, sales techniques, and ongoing professional development to enhance their capabilities.
* Performance Monitoring and Management: Continuously monitoring the performance of partners against predefined benchmarks and metrics. This includes regular assessment of sales figures, customer feedback, and other performance indicators to identify areas for improvement.


**What You Won’t Be Doing**
* Directly selling to end-user customers
* Prioritizing the quantity of interactions over the quality of your engagements with partners
* Worrying about unpredictable earnings and relentless travel demands


**Channel Sales Executive Key Responsibilities**
* Sustained revenue growth from efficiently managing and optimizing a network of distributors, resellers, and MSPs using GenerativeAI tools


**Basic Requirements**
* Professional experience leveraging multiple LLMs (ChatGPT, Gemini, Claude, etc.) and AI tools to automate manual tasks and boost your company's productivity (if you've only ever used ChatGPT, that's probably not enough)
* 1+ year of indirect channel sales experience in the software industry (direct sales experience does not count)


**About GFI Software**
 GFI Software develops essential applications for small and medium businesses. Over 80,000 customers choose GFI solutions for network management and performance, security, and collaboration applications. GFI Software available through thousands of channel partners dedicated to serving specific countries and regions worldwide.
   

  

 GFI has a fully remote, global workforce. GFI has partnered with Crossover to administer its hiring and global workforce management.
   

  

 There is so much to cover for this exciting role, and space here is limited. Hit the Apply button if you found this interesting and want to learn more. We look forward to meeting you!
   

  

**Working with Crossover**
 This is a full-time (40 hours per week), long-term position. The position is immediately available and requires entering into an independent contractor agreement with Crossover. The compensation level for this role is $30 USD/hour, which equates to $60,000 USD/year assuming 40 hours per week and 50 weeks per year. The payment period is weekly. Consult www.crossover.com/help-and-faqs for more details on this topic.
   

  

**What to expect next:**
* You will receive an email with a link to start your self-paced, online job application.
* Our hiring platform will guide you through a series of online “screening” assessments to check for basic job fit, job-related skills, and finally a few real-world job-specific assignments.


**Important!** 
 If you do not receive an email from us:
   

  

* First, emails may take up to 15 minutes to send, refresh and check again.
* Second, check your spam and junk folders for an email from Crossover.com, mark as “Not Spam” since you will receive other emails as well.
* Third, we will send to whatever email account you indicated on the Apply form - by default, that is the email address you use as your LinkedIn username and it might be different than the one you have already checked.
* If all else fails, just reset your password by visiting https://www.crossover.com/auth/password-recovery if you already applied using LinkedIn EasyApply.


 Crossover Job Code: LJ-5278-SE-Stockhol-ChannelSalesEx

title: (Associate) Payment Software Specialist – based in Luxembourg
description:
The
 **EIB** 
 , the European Union's bank, is seeking to recruit for its Group Corporate Services Directorate - Group Digital Office (GCS-GDO), Business Solutions Department (BSD), Finance Division (FD), Back Office Debt & Payment Unit (BODP), at its headquarters in Luxembourg, an
 **(Associate) Payment Software Specialist\*.** 
**This position is based at our Luxembourg headquarters and requires regular office presence.** 
 The EIB offers you the opportunity to live and work in a truly international and multi-cultural environment. We also offer relocation support.
   

  

**This is a full-time position at grade 4/5 for which the EIB offers a permanent contract.**
* internal benchmark (Associate) Officer IT Applications


***Panel interviews are anticipated for September 2024.***
 Purpose
   

  

 You will contribute to transform the way we manage critical IT software solutions, including ION D&C, SWIFT messaging and more. Your expertise will be key in analyzing business requirements, designing technical solutions, and configuring software to meet our digitalization, technology, security, and regulatory needs.
   

  

 If you're passionate about shaping the future of finance through cutting-edge technology and innovation, apply now and let's make impact together!
   

  

 Operating Network
   

  

 You will report to the Head of Back Office Debt & Payment Unit and collaborate closely with IT colleagues and wider user community.
   

  

 The scope of the post includes the domain of payment & settlement. The activities could range from implementing new software, digitalize business processes, and strengthen payment and settlement solutions for cyber resilience.
   

  

 Accountabilities
   

  

* Carry out the technical configuration and maintenance of ION D&C, SWIFT products and associated interfaces
* Conduct analysis with business representatives to formulate technical solution design/specifications, identify and prioritise new business requirements
* Take project management responsibilities for assigned IT projects, coordinating the implementation of new or enhanced software solutions with business users and other IT technical teams in order to ensure the completion of project within set time, budget and quality objectives.
* Provide 1st level user support, channel and prioritise enquiries from end-users; including the analysis of technical incidents, identification of temporary workaround, follow-up of resolutions in co-operation with other IT teams and the external software vendor
* Ensure that IT policies and initiatives in the domain of SWIFT messaging are implemented and key operational processes are run in the most effective and efficient way
* Streamline the communications with the software vendor and internal business counterparts for problem resolution
* Under the responsibility of the Head of Unit, coordinate consultants involved in maintenance and project activities so as to ensure the delivery of expected solutions to internal business customers


**Qualifications**
* University degree (minimum an equivalent to a Bachelor) preferably in computer science or related fields
* At least 3 years’ professional experience involving requirements analysis, software design, development or 1st or 2nd level support ideally in a mixed IT / Finance environment, with experience in back-office payment software
* Experience in payment and reconciliation software like ION/Wallstreet D&C, SWIFT Alliance Access, AWP installation, ESMIG, Alliance Cloud, SWIFT API, Accurate NXG, MT/MX Standards would be an advantage
* Solid technical background in programming and scripting languages (such as Unix shell, SQL, Python, Java) and DBMS Systems
* Knowledge of a financial back-office software (ION Wallstreet TRM - CLM or similar) would be an advantage
* Good knowledge of project management principles, methods and practices
* SWIFT certifications would be an advantage
* Excellent knowledge of English and/or French (\*\*), with a good command of the other. (Knowledge of other EU languages would be an advantage).


 Competencies
   

  

*Find out more about EIB core competencies* 
 here
   

  

*(\*\*) Unless stated explicitly as a required qualification, a good command of French is not a pre-requisite for hire. As both English and French are however official working languages of the EIB, proficiency in both languages is a pre-requisite for your future career development. Any language clause in your contract must be fulfilled in order for you to be eligible for a promotion (either via the annual appraisal cycle or via an internal selection process). Proficiency is understood to mean the attainment of* 
*level 5 of the Inter Institutional language courses, corresponding to B1.2 of the Common European Framework of Reference for Languages (CEFRL). The Bank offers appropriate training support.*
 We hire and value talent with unique characteristics, creating a work environment where they can be themselves. We believe that Diversity, Equity and Inclusion makes us a performing and innovative organisation. We encourage all suitably qualified and eligible candidates to apply regardless of their gender identity/expression, age, racial, ethnic and cultural background, religion and beliefs, sexual orientation, disability or neurodiversity.
   

  

*To find out more about our eligibility criteria click* 
*here* 
*.*
 Applicants with specific needs are encouraged to request reasonable accommodations at any stage during the recruitment process. Please contact the EIB Recruitment team Jobs@eib.org who will ensure that your request is handled.”
   

  

 By applying for this position, you acknowledge the importance of maintaining the security and integrity of the Information of the EIB Group. In case of selection for the position you agree to comply with all measures (policies, controls, document classification and management) implemented by the EIB Group to prevent unauthorised disclosure of any information or any damage to the EIB Group reputation.
   

  

**This is an open campaign to consecutively fill open positions. The campaign will remain open until position is filled. Applications will be reviewed in order of receipt.**

title: SW developer for Telecom domain - 10062
description:
We are looking for a Software Developer to join our dynamic team.
 




  





**Summary:** 




  




* Seeking experienced Embedded Software Engineers from the Telecom domain.
* Responsible for developing, testing, and integrating new software features for Telecom Cloud applications.



  





**Who You Are:** 



* Confident in your specific area and capable of contributing to various fields within the team (T-shaped).
* Must have previous telecom experience.



  





**Typical Work Tasks:** 



* Develop and test new radio network features in a cloud environment.
* Perform integration and verification tasks.



  





**What you bring :** 




  




* **Telecom Expertise:**
* Telecom baseband, radio, RAN, and 3GPP/MSR-BS Architecture knowledge.
* Good understanding of telecom protocols (4G/LTE, 5G/NR, TCP/IP).
* Experience working with L1/L2 in the Telecom Network protocol stack.



  




* **Cloud Competence:**
* CPM, Docker, Kubernetes, and Microservices.



  




* **Programming:**
* Proficiency in C/C++ programming.
* Good understanding of Linux platforms.



  




* **Tools and Methodologies:**
* Code versioning tools (GIT/Gerrit).
* Experience in agile methodology.



  





**Desirable Qualifications:** 



* Experience with software testing, integration, and verification work.
* Proficiency in Python, Go, Java.



  





**Additional Information:** 



* Opportunity to work on cutting-edge telecom cloud projects.

title: IT Architect
description:
**I rollen får du:** 




 • Driva och vidareutveckla IT arkitekturen på ATG
 



 • Stödja verksamheten och IT med att ta fram hållbara och stabila lösningar
 



 • Bidra och driva framtagandet av mål arkitektur, strategiska tekniska planer och taktiska anpassningar
 



  





 Som IT Arkitekt hos oss får du möjlighet att maximera effekten av vår digitala transformation. Du ansvarar för att skapa lösningsalternativ och utföra konsekvensanalyser för att säkerställa framtidssäkra och hållbara tjänster, produkter och kundupplevelser. Din roll inkluderar att utveckla taktiska och strategiska lösningar, kontinuerligt anpassa produkter efter aktuella och framtida krav, samt se till att lösningarna är skalbara, långsiktiga, och i linje med ATG:s visioner och affärsplan. Du arbetar i en agil organisation tillsammans med utvecklingsteam, ingenjörer, specialister och verksamhetsansvariga för att säkerställa smidig och kostnadseffektiv produktutveckling. En viktig del av din roll är att coacha och säkerställa att målarkitektur och planer är tydliga och förstådda inom organisationen. Vårt team, bestående av sju personer, präglas av öppenhet, motivation och tillit. Under de senaste fem åren har ATG moderniserat sin infrastruktur med en hybridleverans från egna datacenter och molnleverantörer som AWS. Vi har hög automatisering i våra leveranskedjor och strävar efter att hantera allt som kod. Vår standardplattform för nya applikationer är Kotlin/Java/Spring Boot, körda i Kubernetes. För frontend använder vi React, React Native, Redux och Micro Frontend arkitektur.
 



  





**Är det här du?** 




 Vi lägger stor vikt vid personliga egenskaper och för att vara framgångsrik i rollen ser vi att du har en teknisk kunskapsbas. Du behöver tycka om att använda dina kunskaper och erfarenheter för att coacha andra. Som person är du analytiskt och har god problemlösningsförmåga. Vidare är du resultatorienterad och passionerad att driva förändringsarbete. Vi ser att du har ett intresse för såväl det affärsmässiga som det tekniska och kan se situationer ur ett helhetsperspektiv. Du har erfarenhet från medelstora och stora affärssystem och har varit med och drivit förflyttningar och förändringsarbete. Vi söker dig med en god kommunikativ förmåga på både engelska och svenska.
 



  





 Vi ser att du har:
 



 • Erfarenhet av att arbeta som IT Arkitekt, applikationsarkitekt eller liknande inom tekniskt ledarskap.
 



 • Fler års erfarenhet av mikrotjänster, både inom införande och vidareutveckling
 



 • Erfarenhet av messaging ramverk, system och asynkron kommunikation mellan applikationer
 



 • Fler års erfarenhet av transaktionsintensiva system och eventbaserad arkitektur
 



 • Erfarenhet av att definiera icke funktionella krav och kapacitetsplanering
 



 • Erfarenhet av att skapa strategiska roadmap och riktlinjer
 



 • Erfarenhet av analys av prestanda, tillgänglighet och tillförlitlighet inom medelstora affärssystem
 



 • Erfarenhet av att utföra kostnad/värdeanalyser
 



 • Erfarenhet och bra kunskaper inom applikationsarkitektur och infrastruktur (moln och om-prem)
 



 • Övergripande kunskaper eller erfarenhet inom IT-säkerhet, AML och Compliance är ett plus
 



  





**” På ATG får man aldrig tråkigt”** 




 Jag är en målinriktad, kvalitetsmedveten och strukturerad person som brinner för verksamhetsutveckling och för att skapa och vidareutveckla hållbara och framtidssäkra lösningar. Jag har ett holistiskt och pragmatiskt tillvägagångssätt för problemlösning. Som ledare har jag ett stort förtroende för individernas potential och förmågor. Jag trivs bäst i en arbetsmiljö där det händer spännande saker hela tiden och hela organisationen driver mot samma mål och samlas under samma värderingar. Jag brinner för det moderna ledarskapskonceptet och för att hitta smidiga anpassningar mellan organisation och människor, processer och system och jag är ständigt nyfiken på nya utvecklingsmöjligheter. På ATG får man aldrig tråkigt och att driva förändringar är en del av vardagen. På fritiden umgås jag med vänner, lär mig musikteori och läser non-fiktion litteratur. Jag kodar och underhåller även en och annan app.
 



**- Rekryterande chef, Jahan Jahanshahi, Head Of IT Architecture** 




  





**We are the game** 




 I närmare 50 år har vi på ATG levererat spänning och underhållning till svenska folket. Vi drivs av att trygga den svenska hästnäringen och att fortsatt vara ett ansvarsfullt spelbolag i framkant. Vår vision att leverera världens bästa spelupplevelse. Hos oss är du en del av en innovativ miljö – med hjälp av den senaste tekniken utvecklar vi spelupplevelser i världsklass. Självledarskap och kompetensutveckling är viktiga delar för oss. Sedan starten 1974 har vi byggt och förvaltat systemen för våra produkter som hanterar 4 500 000 transaktioner per dag.
 



  





**Join the game!** 




 Varmt välkommen med din ansökan via vår rekryteringsportal antingen med ditt cv eller din LinkedIn-profil – det som är enklast och smidigast för dig. Läs gärna mer om oss på vår karriärsida och tveka inte att höra av dig om du har frågor om tjänsten.
 



 Vi tillämpar 6 månaders provanställning och gör bakgrundskontroller för alla roller. Tjänsten är på heltid och utgår från vårt kontor vid Solvalla, alldeles intill travbanan. Vi har ett flexibelt arbetssätt vilket innebär att du, beroende på roll, har möjlighet att kombinera distansarbete med arbete från kontoret. Var med och bygg världens bästa spelupplevelse tillsammans med oss!

title: Frontend SW developer
description:
**Do you love programming and want to be part of a creative team working with the latest technologies creating a cutting-edge electrical vehicle charging solutions?** 




  





 We are now looking for a frontend developer to join the Cloud & App development team in Solna, Stockholm. We are developing our own charger management system which continuously communicates with, monitors and manages installed chargers. Some key features are supporting installation and configuration of chargers, dynamic load balancing, monitoring and maintenance of chargers during their lifetime. Our users interact with the management system via a web frontend, mobile Apps for Android and iPhone, or using External API integrations.
 



  





 You are motivated by building and improving solutions that abstracts a complex and technical domain into a simple and easy-to-use experience for the users. You will be working in an agile cross-functional team. We are proud of our helpful and learning environment and expect you to grow and to share your knowledge. At Charge Amps we take pride in our work, and quality is important to us. We have a test-driven mindset and strive towards continuous deployment.
 



  





**We expect you to:** 



* Have some years of web or full-stack development experience and to be known by your colleagues as a great programmer.
* Take initiative to solve problems and always try to find the best solutions.



  





**Be fluent in:** 



* React
* UI design



  





**Have experience of:** 



* .NET C#)
* Databases / SQL



  





**May have experience of:** 



* Previous work at a product development company
* Azure
* Tools for user analytics
* NPM
* Kubernetes



  





**Skills and Qualifications:** 



* Communicative in both Swedish and English.
* Master of Science degree or equivalent.
* 2-5 years’ experience in web or full-stack development.



  





**What you can expect from us:** 



* A chance to build solutions that make a difference within the green tech industry and has a large set of users.
* A great learning environment in a supportive team.
* A high pace environment within an awesome company.



  





**What we offer:** 



* Competent colleagues dedicated to creating a brighter world
* A chance to be part in accelerating the transition to an electrified life
* A dynamic environment in a growing company and industry
* An opportunity to work with electrifying products which is smart, beautiful, and sustainable
* An opportunity to grow personally and professionally
* Hybrid work and flexibility



  





**About Charge Amps** 




 Charge Amps is a pioneering provider of charging solutions for electric vehicles. Through intelligent and sustainably produced products, Charge Amps accelerates the shift towards electric mobility. Charge Amps was founded in 2012 in Stockholm, Sweden. Today, the company has 100 colleagues, operates in five countries and works toward end consumers, retailers and larger companies. Find out more at chargeamps.com
 



  





 We are continuously reviewing the applications, so don’t hesitate to apply as soon as possible.

title: Sales Capture Associate Director - H&PS - SW
description:
**Senior Sales Director**
**Accenture Nordic**
**Health and Public Service**
**Base: Sweden**
 Want to make excellent ideas happen for some of the world's most dynamic companies? Join Accenture!
   

  

 Accenture is a global management consulting, technology services and outsourcing company with approximately 750,000 employees. With broad global resources, deep operational, and technical know-how collaborate with clients to nurture ideas and deliver results.
   

  

 We are currently looking for a
 **Senior Sales Director** 
 for the
 **strategic sales** 
 team that is comprised of sales professionals passionate about generating potential opportunities and on contracting work with clients within the
 **Health and Public Service** 
 area in Sweden.
   

  

  

**Job Description**
 Your primary role will be to drive growth by increasing the flow of prospective deals into the Sales Pipeline and leading the qualified opportunities through all deal maturity phases to successful wins.
   

  

**Key responsibilities may include:**
- Identifying potential leads by positioning deep industry-based value propositions using Accenture’s industry insight, assets, references, and campaigns

- Shape differentiated value propositions building on deep industry insight demonstrating Accenture’s broad capability areas including technology operations, DevOps, digitalization, technology transformation, journey to cloud, business process outsourcing, digital marketing operations, data/value led transformation, and strategy advisory services

- Develop strategies and tactics for penetration of new accounts and cross selling to establish accounts

- Initiate and qualify opportunities that are acceptable to Accenture and have a justified business case for the client

- Set and lead pursuit teams from initial client meetings through all phases of the sales and deal cycle

- Maintain a keen sense of marketplace intelligence of trends and competition to provide market leading perspectives, emerging trends, tools, and techniques that can be successfully utilised to develop and promote business

- Track and communicate progress against sales goals and targets

**Qualifications**
- Several years of selling/business development experience; against multiple million-dollar sales targets

- Deep insight and understanding of Health and Public Service

- Ability to meet travel requirements, when applicable

- A relevant master’s degree or equivalent

- Advanced sales and deal orchestration/leadership skills

- Excellent business insight and industry competence

- Shown global expertise and perspective; executive level presence and influence

- Outstanding communication in English (written and oral) and interpersonal skills

- Strong organisational, multi-tasking, time-management, and analytical skills

**Investing in you**
 At Accenture, we believe that quality comes from within, and we invest considerable resources in the development of your professional proficiencies. You will receive ongoing training and leadership development that builds and extends your skills on a continuous basis. The training takes place both in the home office and at our various locations around the world.
   

  

**Balancing your priorities**
 Our employees are our most important asset, and we provide an environment that encourages a healthy work/life balance. You will get your own career counsellor (People Lead) who interacts with you on a regular basis, ensuring you a career path that suits your needs and ambitions. By using laptops, mobile phones, internet access and technological innovation, you will furthermore benefit from our flexible working arrangements.
   

  

 Are you interested in developing your career opportunities in an extraordinary environment? Submit your application and CV online today.
   

  

 Please submit your application in English by clicking the link below. If you have any questions regarding this position or if you want to find out how you can develop your career opportunities at Accenture in general, please contact recruitment; Annette Kleisdorff +45 29999041.

title: Power Platform Specialist Nexer Enterprise Applications
description:
**Vill du arbeta på ett bolag som är välkänt inom Microsoft 365? Microsoft 365 utvecklas ständigt därför får du möjlighet att skapa framtidens lösningar hos våra kunder med den senaste tekniken. Brinner du för utveckling, sök redan nu!**
**Hur ser rollen ut?**
 Som konsult med fokus på Power Platform och Microsoft 365 kommer du att vara en central del i att skapa mervärde för våra kunder. Din roll innefattar hela kundprocessen, från kravinsamling, kunddialog, skissa på nya lösningar till att implementera och förvalta existerande system.
   

  

 Du kommer vara med och driva utvecklingen av Best Practice inom Power Platform området och stötta både kunder och kollegor genom hela processen. Huvudfokus kommer ligga på Power Automate och Power Apps, även andra delar av Power Platform kan komma att användas.
   

  

 På Nexer Enterprise Applications kommer du att vara en del av ett bolag med en egen identitet och strategi, samtidigt som du har stöd från övriga delar av Nexer.
   

  

**Vad kan vi erbjuda dig?**
* En stimulerande arbetsmiljö där kompetensutveckling och möjligheten att ligga i framkant av teknikutvecklingen
* Ingå i ett omfattande team av experter där vi gemensamt strävar efter att stödja våra kunder att uppnå sina mål.
* Kompetensutveckling via egna forum samt möjligheten att gå kurser via Nexer Academy.
* Ett stöttande team och en organisation som genomsyras av en familjekänsla, mångfald och entreprenörsanda.
* Möjlighet att delta i Corporate Social Responsibility, exempelvis genom Star for Life, Pink Programming eller Nexer Network Women.
* En rolig arbetsplats där vi älskar att hitta på saker tillsammans. Vi har bland annat regelbundna spelkvällar, träningsutmaningar och årliga konferenser!


**Hur är det att arbeta på Nexer Enterprise** 
**Applications** 
**?**
 Vi är det lilla företaget i det stora, vår verksamhet präglas av en entreprenöriell anda och en stark vilja att leverera mervärde för våra kunder. Tillsammans arbetar vi för att ligga långt framme i teknikutvecklingen och skapa positiva resultat för både våra kunder och vår organisation.
   

  

 Arbetsmiljön genomsyras av en kamratlig stämning och ett nära ledarskap. Vi är ett välbekant namn när det gäller Microsoft 365 inom Sverige och internationellt. Du får möjlighet att arbeta inom Sverige och globalt eftersom det är där våra kunder finns.
   

  

 Vi har en stark vilja att driva affärer och firar våra framgångar genom regelbundna events, resor och konferenser. Här kan du läsa mer om oss: https://nexergroup.com/careerhub/come-on-in-nexer-ea/
   

  

**Vem är du?**
 Vi söker en driven och erfaren Power Platform konsult som brinner för att skapa innovativa och effektiva lösningar på Microsoft 365-plattformen. I denna roll kommer du att vara ansvarig för att planera, driva och implementera projekt inom Microsoft 365, med fokus på att bygga skräddarsydda lösningar som möter våra kunders behov.
   

  

 Vi tror att du:
   

  

* Är en lagspelare som strävar efter att leverera högkvalitativa lösningar som skapar verkligt värde för våra kunder.
* En stark förståelse för det snabbt föränderliga tekniklandskapet.
* Är bekväm med att hålla presentationer
* God kommunikativ förmåga på svenska och engelska i tal och skrift


 Det viktigaste för oss är att du gillar att arbeta i ett härligt team där mångfald och jämställdhet är viktigt och där du bidrar till din, teamets, våra kunders och företagets framgång.
   

  

**Ansökan**
 Du är varmt välkommen att skicka in din ansökan nedan. Vi har tyvärr ingen möjlighet att ta emot ansökningar via e-post, men har du frågor om tjänsten eller Nexer får du gärna höra av dig till Claudia Henrichsén på claudia.henrichsen@nexergroup.com. Vi hanterar ansökningarna löpande, så vänta inte med att söka!

title: Flutter Developer
description:
**Imagine something you can do today that you couldn’t do in the past – like paying for groceries without opening your wallet. At Extenda Retail, we are a dream team of different experts that creates frictionless, game-changing software for major retail and supply chains around the globe. Our innovations touch everyday lives. Join a company that simplifies shopping and inspires retailers and logistics businesses to go further.** 




  





 We are looking for a strong Flutter Developer to join our team! As a Flutter Developer, you will have to have a strong understanding of Flutter and Dart and the mobile platforms.
 



  





 You will perform duties and tasks to support a complete life cycle management (example: Analysis, Technical Requirements, Design, Coding, Testing and implementation of Systems, etc.).
 



  





 You will work closely with the Product and Technical teams across different regions as part of an Agile Team. The role includes research and Continuous Development of new Products and enhancing existing products based on new Technologies. This position collaborates with the operations team routinely and henceforth excellent English communication skills (both written and verbal) are essential.
 



  




* A clean coder who will always leave the code in better shape than they found it.
* A curious person who never stops learning and loves to try new things, even when they don’t succeed on the first try
* A team-oriented developer with the motivation to bring out the best in others
* A person who shares our appreciation for transparency and is willing to share their experience and knowledge for the benefit of the team
* Someone who is willing to take a stand for something they believe in.
