title: Frontend Engineer
description:
**About Gilion:** 




 We're a team of engineers from top innovators like Spotify, King, Anyfin, Sinch, and Einride, now working with leading banking minds to help entrepreneurs grow their businesses smarter and faster. Traditionally, founders navigated fundraising alone. Today, the industry is shifting towards data-driven investments, with investors seeking data-backed pitches. We welcome this change as it promotes a more diverse and unbiased innovation ecosystem. Gilion's mission: create tools and funding options to simplify life for innovative founders.
 



 Connecting to the Gilion platform gives founders immediate access to a comprehensive analytics tech stack. Our platform offers stunning visualizations that tell their company's story, without requiring any SQL or CSS. Historical data and Gilion's forecasting capabilities simulate future scenarios, providing a unique understanding of performance compared to peers. Check out this video to learn more about us.
 



 “
 *I’ve never seen my company like this. We use Gilion to make strategic decisions and also to pitch our growth journey to investors.* 
 ”
 



 - Founder of a tech company based in Denmark
 



  





**About the job:** 




 As a frontend engineer at Gilion, you will be part of a cross functional product team working alongside other developers, designers and machine learning specialists. The tech team iterates fast. Being data nerds, we measure user behaviour and verify our bets through user testing. We balance rapid iteration experiments with long-term strategic bets and continuous improvements to our infrastructure. In this role you will:
 


* Take part in a low overhead, product development process where ideas go to production in days and deployments to production happen multiple times a day.
* Contribute to architectural decisions as part of a functional team working across the product teams.
* Focus on frontend development using modern frameworks



  





**About you:** 



* At least 2+ years experience working as a software engineer with a frontend focus (
 *we're looking for multiple frontend developers, at different levels of seniority* 
 )
* Experience working with React, Typescript and Next.js
* Experience of working in a cross functional team
* An openness to learn and thrive in tackling a variety of problems that you might not have seen before
* A collaborative mindset where you leverage your colleagues expertise for coming up with a better solution together



  





**What we offer:** 



* Work-life balance, hybrid-remote model and attractive compensation package
* Diverse, inclusive, collaborative and knowledge-sharing culture
* Secured runway (recently funded), experienced founders, backed by top investors
* Live product, great traction but still very early in our growth journey (tons of development opportunities)
* Leading Fin-Tech product within Machine Learning
* A globally scalable product



  





 At Gilion, we’re all about Growth. We believe in hiring great people with the right values and giving them a platform to grow with. Our unique combination of startup mentality, experienced team and ambitious vision make room for endless possibilities.
 



 Does this sound interesting? We look forward to your application!

title: Software engineer - Powerboard
description:
**Create moments that matter. Decode the future.**
 At the Electrolux Group, a leading global appliance company, we strive every day to shape living for the better for our consumers, our people and our planet. We share ideas and collaborate so that together, we can develop solutions that deliver enjoyable and sustainable living.
   

  

 Come join us as you are. We believe diverse perspectives make us stronger and more innovative. In our global community of people from 100+ countries, we listen to each other, actively contribute, and grow together.
   

  

 Join us in our exciting quest to build the future home!
   

  

**All about the role:**
 As software is playing an increasingly significant role in enabling digital consumer experiences, we are gearing up to become more agile, faster in responding to market demands and quicker in identifying new market opportunities. This involves elevating our appliances to digital, software-defined products in a seamless integration of modular electronics, software, and connectivity platform.
   

  

**We’re looking for a Powerboard Software Engineer to join us on our journey.**
**What you'll do:**
* Contribute to Powerboard Development: Work on the forefront of powerboard technology, focusing on the design and optimization of firmware to enhance system performance and reliability, appreciating the complexity and detail-oriented nature of embedded and the management of physical systems.
* Engage in Cross-Functional Collaboration: Participate as a key member of a cross-functional platform team, collaborating closely with hardware, software and control engineers to create a cohesive and robust platform.
* Enhance System Integration: Facilitate the integration of powerboard solutions within the broader system architecture, ensuring compatibility and efficiency across different components.
* Implement Modern Software Practices: Apply modern software development methodologies and best practices in the embedded domain, aiming to elevate the quality and maintainability of our firmware.
* Influence System-Wide Vision: Contribute insights and expertise to the overall system vision, helping to shape innovative solutions that meet complex technical challenges.
* Design new software features through agile development practices such as chartering, story-mapping, and regular stand-up meetings.


**Who you are:**
* Skilled in C Programming for Embedded Systems: You have extensive experience and skill in C programming, specifically for embedded systems, with a deep understanding of low-level peripherals and microcontroller programming. Experience with ARM microcontrollers is highly regarded.
* Experienced in Power System Firmware: You have a strong background in developing firmware for power systems, including experience with power electronics, sensors, and actuators.
* Knowledgeable in Control Algorithms and Real-Time Systems: You have experience with control algorithm development or integration, and are familiar with the challenges of hard real-time systems, including scheduling and performance optimization.
* Modern Software Development Advocate: You are passionate about bringing modern development practices and technologies to embedded software development, aiming to improve efficiency, reliability, and team collaboration.
* Eager to Learn and Lead: You are not just open to learning new technologies and methodologies but are also eager to lead by example, sharing your knowledge and expertise with team members as you all grow together.
* You are familiar with Continuous integration tools (Jenkins, etc.), and Atlassian toolset: Jira & Confluence;


**You demonstrate:**
* Collaboration - contributes to a highly collaborative environment that enables a cross functional team to flourish.
* Communication - effectively exchanges information and ideas with confidence and respect, able to demonstrate progress, raise issues and articulate changes on a frequent basis.
* Empathy - can understand and acknowledge the emotions and perspectives of others during conversations.
* Problem-Solving - able to connect the dots between insights, strategy, and conceptual direction; is outcome - as opposed to task - orientated.
* Adaptability & Resilience - can effectively navigate change, challenges, and setbacks while maintaining a positive and flexible approach.
* Proactivity - eager to learn and grow, sees challenges as opportunities, seeks and - is responsive to - feedback.
* Responsibility - accountable, reliable, and proactive in building systems and handling dependencies, contributing to a trustworthy and effective team dynamic.


**Where you'll be:**
 This is a full-time position, based at our Global Headquarters in Stockholm/Stadshagen (Sweden) or in Porcia or Forlì (Italy).
   

  

 At our Global Headquarters in Stockholm/Stadshagen (Sweden) we are 60+ nationalities under the same roof and we enjoy the look and feel of the office! Porcia and Susegana (Italy) are about 1-hour distance from the city of Venice. Whereas Forlì (Italy) is 1-hour away from Bologna.
   

  

 Regardless of the chosen location, you will be part of a dynamic international team where English is the natural language.
   

  

 Benefits highlights:
   

  

* Flexible work hours/hybrid work environment
* Discounts on our award-winning Electrolux products and services
* Family friendly benefits
* Insurance policy plan
* Extensive learning opportunities and flexible career path


**As part of Electrolux, we will continuously invest in you and your development. There are no barriers to where your career could take you.**
**Find out more on:**
 Electrolux Group: https://www.linkedin.com/company/electrolux/life/lifeatelectrolux
   

  

 Italy: https://www.linkedin.com/company/electrolux/life/649881a8-78d7-48bc-b692-4b6ccc70b6b9

title: Java Developer – Consumer Notifications
description:
Receiving parcels should be a joyful experience. Do you want to make everyday life easier and shape the digital user experience for millions of recipients? If so, this might be the perfect opportunity for you.
   

  

**About The Team And The Role**
 You will join an experienced team of engineers dedicated to delivering value through software craftsmanship. We believe in self-organizing teams and we get motivated by being accountable, with the pre-requisite that mandate must be in the team for how the solutions should be implemented. If you seek this position, you will be interviewed and evaluated by the team, we also choose our teammates.
   

  

 As a team we are guided by our users, stakeholders within the rest if Group IT, and the business units. When we get confused, we take a glimpse at the agile manifesto.
   

  

 The role as a software engineer in our team not only entails technical know-how, but also great communication skills, reaching out to other colleagues outside the team is one important thing being a developer.
   

  

 Follow us on LinkedIn and find out more
   

  

**About The Job**
 With over 245M traceable parcels and letters per year, our job is to notify recipients about important shipments events via app push, sms, email or letters. Our mission is to do so in the most reliable and user-friendly way possible.
   

  

 As a backend engineer you will work with infrastructure, microservices and scalable systems that must cope with high data traffic and complex logic for logistics.
   

  

**Some Of Our Technologies/techniques**
* Microservices/Serverless
* Typescript/Javascript
* Java (Spring Boot)
* Kubernetes
* NodeJS
* AWS - Lambda, DynamoDB, SQS, S3, Kinesis to name a few
* Azure
* React, Vue 3
* Grafana, Loki, ELK


**Who are you?**
 Above everything else you love to code and your belief is that a good software architecture is developed, not specified, secondly you like Java and you think you are pretty good at it.
   

  

 Work-life balance is crucial for maintaining the energy needed to excel in your job. If you have hobbies and interests outside of work, we are eager to hear about them!
   

  

 The team is experienced but learning and being open to new things is very important, so we think that you are a person that likes to share mistakes and insights.
   

  

**You Have Knowledge And Experience Of**
* Java including Spring Boot
* AWS or similar cloud platforms (Azure, OpenStack or Google Cloud)
* High data traffic/load services
* 4-5 years of related work experience
* Academic education in computer science or equivalent experience
* English in speech and writing


**We offer you**
* Good work/life balance.
* Flexibility of working from our office or from a location of your choice
* To work with our modern tech stack with great opportunities to influence the choice of technologies used.
* Developing your technical skills. As an example, we sponsor you to get AWS certified.
* A job where the value you deliver is important to hundreds of thousands of users.
* Wellness allowance & access to the office´s gym and indoor swimming pool.
* Employee benefits through PostNord´s own personnel foundation PostNord Plus.
* Good occupational pension terms.
* To be a part of a really nice and supportive team.


**We make everyday life easier**
 PostNord is the leading supplier of communication and logistics solutions to, from, and within the Nordic region. We ensure the provision of a postal service to households and businesses in Sweden and Denmark. We aim to make everyday life easier and more sustainable for everyone who lives and works in the Nordic region. We are accountable, brave and committed, effectively leading change regardless if we lead our self or others. We emphasize teamwork, sincerity and positive relationships in the workplace. We build on our success and learn from both colleagues and mistakes. People with different backgrounds work with us. You will therefore be part of a workplace with great diversity, which contributes to better results for the business. Visit us at postnord.com.
   

  

**Apply**
 We look forward to receiving your application! If you have any questions or concerns, you are welcome to contact Gustav Forsberg on gustav.forsberg@postnord.com
   

  

 For union representatives, visit: Facklig kontakt | PostNord
   

  

 We are looking forward to hearing from you!
   

  

 #

title: Security Engineer to Mainframe Security team | SEB, Stockholm
description:
Are you interested in working with SEB Mainframe environment that is facing major changes? Are you a driven sysprog with experience from working with mainframe? Do you want to work proactively with modernization and have a commitment in IT security? If so, this might be a great opportunity for You!
   

  

 We need to strengthen our Security team that works towards the mainframe platform. The team is part of SEB Technology and located in Solna in the Stockholm area. Mainframe is a vital platform within SEB where we work a lot with modernization and where many different initiatives are ongoing in the area of security.
   

  

**About The Role**
 As an engineer in the security team, you will be working with authentication and authorization including ICSF, encryption and key management for the platform. Another part in the job includes development and management of various code connected to this area of responsibility. Testing and developing solutions in connection with new products or other changes together with other teams is also part of the work.
   

  

 You will also be responsible, together with the team of six persons, for daily maintenance, support to other teams and system development for security related issues. Security is of highest importance for SEB as we are exploring and acting in a new landscape of banking such as Open Banking, API-ecosystem and AI.
   

  

 Your job is to be on the edge of security matters as well as being our evangelist of our security journey we need to embark.
   

  

 To thrive in this role, we believe you have
   

  

 You are a skilled technician/engineer/developer with experience of the Mainframe platform with an expertise on security.
   

  

 We presume you have worked with z/OS and TSO, and also is familiar with SMP/E installations. Knowledge and previous experience working with industry standards within the area (e.g., PCI-DSS, NIST, STIG) is eligible.
   

  

 Experience within ACF2 or RACF, zSecure and zMFA is advantageous.
   

  

 Development experience is beneficial and helpful in this job, preferable REXX and Assembler.
   

  

 You are a team player who appreciates and understands the importance of teamwork and working in an agile team. For this role, we also see that you have good knowledge of Swedish and English, both spoken and written.
   

  

 What we offer
   

  

 We offer many experiences and benefits to our employees, and there is nuance to every individual’s career experience, but the elements that define the core of our offering are:
   

  

* Friendly and welcoming culture.
* Innovative company at the forefront of technology.
* Agile and modern way of working.
* Extensive training and learning opportunities.
* We apply a hybrid model where we work both from the office and home.


 Ready to take the next step on your career journey?
   

  

 Welcome to our inclusive culture, where our shared values inspire and uplift our team. We celebrate diversity and strive to ensure every employee feels seen, heard, and valued.
   

  

 Since we select candidates continuously, feel free to send in your application today, but no later than 31 Aug 2024. If you have questions about the position, please contact Anneli Risberg, team manager for MI Infrastructure & Security on anneli.risberg @seb.se
   

  

 Learn more about working at SEB here: www.sebgroup.com/techcareers
   

  

 It is our fundamental belief that inclusion and diversity is crucial for our future success. We strive to have an inclusive, value-driven culture where employees feel valued, respected and involved irrespective of who they are, what they believe or where they come from.

title: Senior Data Engineer to work with Big Data
description:
**Job ID: 25161** 








 #IT #Developer #Data #Engineering
 







 Would you like to work with Big Data? We are now looking for a Senior Data Engineer to develop, maintain, test and evaluate Big Data solutions within Nordea’s next generation Big Data Platform.
 







 In Nordea, we’re harnessing the power of technology to reinvent the future of banking. A tech revolution is underway – and you can make an impact. Though we’re a Nordic bank, we’re also one of the largest IT employers in Tricity and Warsaw. Working with international teams in an inspiring working environment, you’ll have lots of opportunities to expand your skills and advance your career. 
   

  



**About this opportunity**


 Welcome to the Capability Area Data Engineering team. We add value by building distributed and highly parallelized data processing pipelines which process a massive amount of data. We leverage Scala and Spark to enrich and transform corporate data to enable searching, data visualization and advanced analytics. As the Senior Data Engineer, you will play a valuable role in creating high-performing, flexible, robust, scalable and easily maintainable global reporting solution for the Bank.
 







**What you’ll be doing:** 





* Building distributed and highly parallelized big data processing pipeline which process massive amount of data (both structured and unstructured data) in near real-time
* Leverage Spark to enrich and transform corporate data to enable searching, data visualization, and advanced analytics
* Working closely with analysts and business stakeholders to develop analytics models
* Continuous delivery on Hadoop and other Big Data Platforms
* Automate processes where possible and are repeatable and reliable
* Work closely with QA team





 You’ll join a where your personal development is our number one priority. In regular one on ones and quarterly feedback talks, you and your manager will identify possible paths for you to grow and the right amount of guidance needed to reach you. The role is based in Stockholm; Gdańsk; Gdynia; Helsinki; Oslo; Warszawa.
   

  



**Who you are**


 Collaboration. Ownership. Passion. Courage. These are the values that guide us in being at our best – and that we imagine you share with us.  
   

  

**To succeed in this role, we believe that you:** 





* Are collaborative and achieve your expectations through communication and teamwork
* Are curious, responsive and can understand the needs of others to ensure delivery of the desired results
* Work qualitatively and strive to always do things better
* Have a high level of self-motivation





  
 

**Your experience and background:** 





* Experience working in Agile methodologies
* Unit testing experience with framework ScalaTest or similar
* Programming experience with Scala or Java and willingness to learn Scala
* Experience with distributed data processing engines like Spark





  
 

**As an advantage, familiarity with one or more of the below technologies:** 





* Robot Framework
* Atlassian Suite: Confluence, JIRA
* Hadoop ecosystem (hive, oozie, Impala etc.)
* Snowflake



  
 





 If this sounds like you, get in touch!
 





  
 





**Next steps**




 Submit your application no later than 10/08/2024. Interviews will be held on an ongoing basis.
   

  

 At Nordea, we know that an inclusive workplace is a sustainable workplace. We deeply believe that our diverse backgrounds, experiences, characteristics and traits make us better at serving customers and communities. So please come as you are.
 





  
 





**Only for candidates in Sweden:** 
 For union information, please contact finansforbundet@nordea.se or SACONordea@nordea.com.
 





  
 





**Only for candidates in Poland:** 
 Please include permit for processing personal data in CV as following:
   

  

 In accordance with art. 6 (1) a and b. Regulation (EU) 2016/679 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 27 April 2016 on the protection of natural persons with regard to the processing of personal data and on the free movement of such data, and repealing Directive 95/46/EC (General Data Protection Regulation) hereinafter ‘GDPR’. I agree to have: my personal data, education and employment history proceeded for the purposes of current and future recruitment processes in Nordea Bank Abp.
   

  

 The administrator of your personal data is: Nordea Bank Abp operating in Poland through its Branch, address: Aleja Edwarda Rydza Śmiglego 20, 93-281 Łodź. Your personal data will be processed for the recruitment processes in Nordea Bank Abp. You have a right to access your personal data, right to rectify and right to delete. Disclosing the personal data in the scope specified by the provisions of Polish Labour Code from 26 June 1974 and executive acts are mandatory. Providing personal data is necessary to conduct the recruitment processes. The request for the deletion of your personal data means resignation from further participation in recruitment processes and causes the immediate removal of your application. Detailed information concerning processing of your personal data can be found at: nordea.com/en/doc/nordea-privacy-policy-for-applicants.pdf
   

  

 We reserve the right to reply only to selected applications.

title: Data Engineers till Stockholm
description:
Data Engineer till Stockholm som vill lösa uppgifter genom modern teknik, tillsammans med ett stort nätverk Data- och Analysexperter.
   

  

*Är du en erfaren Dataingenjör, BI-utvecklare/BI-konsult eller ETL-utvecklare? Drömmer du om att fortsätta din professionella resa tillsammans med ett team kunniga kollegor? Motiveras du av att arbeta med moderna teknologier och lösa problem för kunder inom olika branscher kan DU vara vår nästa Dataingenjör!*
 På Solita handlar allt om att förbättra företag och forma en ljusare framtid genom att dra nytta av kraften av data i vår uppkopplade värld. Tänk dig detta: våra kunder sträcker sig över alla olika branscher och områden, vi finns överallt! Som ett sammanhållet team av IT-experter är vi för närvarande 1700 personer spridda över sex länder. I Sverige arbetar våra dataexperter med en stor och mångsidig projektpool där de bygger datamodeller, skapar innovativa dataplattformar och skapar molnbaserade datapipelines, samt mycket mer!
   

  

**Träffa en Solitan**
 Möt
 **Clara Lundström,** 
 en Data Engineer här på Solita. Hon arbetar i ett projekt för ett globalt företag inom facility service, det största i Norden. Clara, tillsammans med ett team av Solita-entusiaster, belyser datalandskapet och använder data från olika källor för att skapa visualiseringar. Erfaren med molnverktyg arbetar hon med data, automation och transformation.
   

  

*“Att arbeta som konsult på Solita är varierat samtidigt som du har tillgång till ett stort nätverk av experter inom många olika områden. Det ger utmärkta möjligheter att utvecklas i din roll, vare sig det handlar om att bredda dina kunskaper eller specialisera dig. Anledningen till att jag trivs så bra på Solita är den vänliga, stödjande och opretentiösa atmosfären.”*
**Hur är det att jobba på Solita?**
 Solitas företagskultur är annorlunda många andra företags, den handlar om autonomi, att stötta och växa tillsammans med våra kollegor samt att leva våra värdeord – passion, courage, easy-going och caring.
   

  

 Rent konkret innebär det ett företag som har genomtänkta interna tillväxtvägar, att det finns spännande kundprojekt och erfarna kollegor som är omtänksamma och passionerade. Du kommer också få chansen att arbeta med en stor bredd av projekt och branscher där du stöttar och hjälper kund med faktiska affärspåverkande beslut som lämnar avtryck och består. Utöver detta har vi även partnerskap med en mängd tech-företag såsom, GCP, AWS, Snowflake för att nämna några.
   

  

**Vem är du?**
 På Solita värdesätter vi att du har erfarenhet av teknik och kommunikation på både svenska och engelska. Tekniska förmågor som ETL/ELT, python, SQL, DBT, Snowflake och verktyg inom orkestrering samt datamodellering och datawarehousing är något som ofta används i det dagliga arbetet. Våra kunder arbetar ofta i cloud-miljöer så kunskap i tekniker som Azure, GCP och AWS behövs. Om du kan något visualiseringsverktyg är även det ett plus i kanten, gärna PowerBI eller Tableau.
   

  

 Som konsult på Solita handlar arbetet inte bara om det tekniska – att kommunicera med kund i förklaring av tekniska lösningar, tolkande av deras behov och att hantera potentiella problem du kommer få hantera så vana med att kommunicera med stakeholders och kunder är en bra erafarenhet. Vi arbetar autonomt på Solita, så att vara van att diktera och planera upp sitt arbete självständigt behövs.
   

  

**En Dag På Solita**
 En dag på Solita kan ofta starta med ett standup-möte med kund och dina team-medlemmar, där ni stämmer av agendan för dagen för veckan. Sen kliver du in i ditt kodnära arbete: byggande av data pipelines, programmering i python/SQL, arbete med data och byggande i cloud. Under dagen kan det dyka upp ad-hoc möten med kund, kollegor som behöver stöttning eller helt enkelt att du lyssnar på våra interna utbildningsmöten; infosessions, som kan handla om allt relaterat till Solita och branschen. Dagen fortsätter ofta med det kod nära arbetet, möten med kollegor och kund och inte minst – fika!
   

  

 Du kan även ha interna projekt såsom att köra en dragning på vår Data Academy eller annat på din to-do list!
   

  

 Do you want to learn more about what it is like working at Solita as a Data Engineer? Read more about Lisa and her Story here! https://www.solita.fi/blogs/people-of-solita-lisa-kyhlberg-senior-data-engineer/
   

  

**Intresserad?**
 Vid frågor; kontakta jacob.beck(at)solita.se eller ansök här. Du kan också connecta med Jacob på LinkedIn på https://www.linkedin.com/in/jacob-beck-/. Vi uppskattar dina färdigheter, men vi är också ivriga att lära oss om essensen i din motivation och hur du ser din tillväxt framför dig. Dela ditt CV nedan så återkommer vi så fort vi kan!

title: Senior Frontend Developer till Shared Bet Channel
description:
**I rollen får du:** 




 • arbeta i ett team som har kul tillsammans.
 



 • vara delaktig i att kontinuerligt förbättra teamets utvecklings- och kvalitetsprocesser.
 



 Vi söker nu en senior frontend-utvecklare till Shared Bet Channel. Välkommen till ett team som har kul tillsammans och som tror på öppenhet och transparens i arbetet. För att lyckas i denna roll ser vi att du har erfarenhet av arbete med agila team och värdesätter effektivitet. Vi har dagliga möten och samarbetar tvärfunktionellt med andra team inom IT. Vidare ser vi att du gillar att hålla dig uppdaterad om nya tekniska lösningar eftersom du i denna roll kommer att vara delaktig i att kontinuerligt förbättra teamets utvecklings- och kvalitetsprocesser.
 



  





**Är det här du?** 




 Vi lägger stor vikt vid personliga egenskaper och för att lyckas i rollen ser vi att du som söker har högskoleutbildning eller motsvarande inom systemutveckling. Du har även några års relevant arbetslivserfarenhet inom utveckling. Du är nyfiken, lyhörd och ambitiös. Vidare ser vi att du är prestigelös och gillar att dela med dig av din kunskap. Vidare söker vi dig med en god kommunikativ förmåga på både engelska och svenska, eftersom en stor del av arbetet sker på engelska. Det är meriterande om du har erfarenhet av liknande roller från företag med högintensiva transaktioner.
 



  





 Vi ser att du har några års erfarenhet av:
 



 • React
 



 • Typescript
 



 • GraphQL
 



 • Redux
 



 • Redux Saga
 



 • React Native
 



  





**” Det finns inget bättre än att se sina medarbetare växa och utvecklas i sin roll”** 




 För mig är det viktig att teamet har dom förutsättningar som krävs för att lyckas utvecklas hela tiden. Jag släpper mycket ansvar till teamen och uppmuntrar till att prova nya saker. Jag ser mig mer som en coach än en chef och det finns inget bättre än att se sina medarbetare växa och utvecklas i sin roll och sina team. Jag och ATG tror mycket på innovation och att det är det som driver oss framåt. När jag inte är på ATG så umgås jag med min familj och är också engagerad i sjöräddningssällskapet.
 



**- Rekryterande chef, Håkan Sandström, Manager IT Shared Bet Channel** 
 .
 



  





**We are the game** 




 I närmare 50 år har vi på ATG levererat spänning och underhållning till svenska folket. Vi drivs av att trygga den svenska hästnäringen och att fortsatt vara ett ansvarsfullt spelbolag i framkant. Vår vision att leverera världens bästa spelupplevelse. Hos oss är du en del av en innovativ miljö – med hjälp av den senaste tekniken utvecklar vi spelupplevelser i världsklass. Självledarskap och kompetensutveckling är viktiga delar för oss. Sedan starten 1974 har vi byggt och förvaltat systemen för våra produkter som hanterar 4 500 000 transaktioner per dag.
 



  





**Join the game!** 




 Varmt välkommen med din ansökan via vår rekryteringsportal antingen med ditt cv eller din LinkedIn-profil – det som är enklast och smidigast för dig. Läs gärna mer om oss på vår karriärsida och tveka inte att höra av dig om du har frågor om tjänsten.
 



 Vi tillämpar 6 månaders provanställning och gör bakgrundskontroller för alla roller. Tjänsten är på heltid och utgår från vårt kontor vid Solvalla, alldeles intill travbanan. Vi har ett flexibelt arbetssätt vilket innebär att du, beroende på roll, har möjlighet att kombinera distansarbete med arbete från kontoret. Var med och bygg världens bästa spelupplevelse tillsammans med oss!
